MESSAGE.JP: 夜が明けた。
MESSAGE.EN: It was dawn.
MESSAGE.Translation: It was dawn.

MESSAGE.JP: ずっと沙耶さんのことを考えていた気がする…。
MESSAGE.EN: It felt like I'd been thinking about Saya-san forever...
MESSAGE.Translation: It felt like I'd been thinking about Saya-san forever...

MESSAGE.JP: あとは、今は忌々しいのかよくわからない、地下迷宮のことも。
MESSAGE.EN: And about the underground labyrinth that no longer seemed as much a nuisance.
MESSAGE.Translation: And about the underground labyrinth that no longer seemed as much a nuisance.

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「素晴らしい朝じゃないか、諸君」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Isn't it a great morning, dear fellows?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Isn't it a great morning, dear fellows?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「晴れてリトルバスターズは野球チームとなり、土曜の試合に向け、琢磨していけるというものだな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝I'm really pleased that our Little Busters has finally turned into a proper baseball team. Let's practice hard for Saturday's match.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝I'm really pleased that our Little Busters has finally turned into a proper baseball team. Let's practice hard for Saturday's match.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「…はぁ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝...Hah.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝...Hah.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「うお、恭介のテンションがついに下がった!?」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Whoa, he's finally lost his passion!?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Whoa, he's finally lost his passion!?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「昨日からやけくそ気味だったけど、これは珍しい…！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝He did look kind of desperate since yesterday, but this is rare...!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝He did look kind of desperate since yesterday, but this is rare...!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「いや、違う、みんな落ち着いてくれ、今のはため息じゃない」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝No, it wasn't a sigh. Just calm down and hear me out, everyone.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝No, it wasn't a sigh. Just calm down and hear me out, everyone.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「冷え切った両手を暖めようとしただけだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝I was just trying to warm my cold hands.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝I was just trying to warm my cold hands.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「おまえ今までどこにいたんだよ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Where have they been until now...?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Where have they been until now...?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「冷凍庫」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝In a freezer.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝In a freezer.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「どうして」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Why?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Why?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「楽しかったから」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Because it was fun.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Because it was fun.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「何が」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝What was?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝What was?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「発掘。古いアイスとか、霜に埋まって外れない製氷機とか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Excavating. Finding stuff like old ice cream, or an ice maker buried in frost.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Excavating. Finding stuff like old ice cream, or an ice maker buried in frost.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「くそぉ…二回とつけ込める隙を見せねぇぜ…さすが恭介といったところか…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Crap... He doesn't give us two chances to put him on the spot... You're great, Kyousuke...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Crap... He doesn't give us two chances to put him on the spot... You're great, Kyousuke...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「おまえほんとに就活中の人間か？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Is that what a person hunting for a job should be doing?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Is that what a person hunting for a job should be doing?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「鈴、だからこそ、だと言ってるだろう？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Rin, didn't I tell you? That's precisely why.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Rin, didn't I tell you? That's precisely why.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「うちの兄貴は、就活中に野球したり、冷凍庫に入って発掘したりしてた、なんて、恥ずかしくて人に言えない」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝I'm too embarrassed to tell people that my brother's playing baseball or digging in a freezer while job hunting.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝I'm too embarrassed to tell people that my brother's playing baseball or digging in a freezer while job hunting.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「言わなくてもいいさ。おまえが感じ取ってくれればな。この兄の生きる姿を、その目にとくとな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝You don't have to tell them. I just want you to feel it. Etch how your brother lives completely into your eyes.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝You don't have to tell them. I just want you to feel it. Etch how your brother lives completely into your eyes.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「きしょいっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝You make me sick.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝You make me sick.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「おはよう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Morning.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Morning.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「おう、おはよう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Oh, morning.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Oh, morning.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 僕と真人は恭介に挨拶をしていつもの席につく。
MESSAGE.EN: Masato and I greeted Kyousuke and took seats.
MESSAGE.Translation: Masato and I greeted Kyousuke and took seats.

MESSAGE.JP: その恭介は、今日出た週刊誌なのか、漫画を読んでいる。
MESSAGE.EN: Kyousuke was reading a manga magazine released today.
MESSAGE.Translation: Kyousuke was reading a manga magazine released today.

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「ゼリー食べるなら最後までくえ、底のほうつまってる」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝You can have the rest of the jelly. There's always some stuck in the bottom of the cup.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝You can have the rest of the jelly. There's always some stuck in the bottom of the cup.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴も猫と話したまま座る。
MESSAGE.EN: Rin also sat down, talking to a cat.
MESSAGE.Translation: Rin also sat down, talking to a cat.

MESSAGE.JP: 最後に現れたのは謙吾。
MESSAGE.EN: Finally Kengo appeared.
MESSAGE.Translation: Finally Kengo appeared.

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「おはよう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝Morning.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝Morning.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「おう、おはよう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Morning.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Morning.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 雑誌を読みながら恭介。
MESSAGE.EN: Kyousuke replied without looking up from his magazine.
MESSAGE.Translation: Kyousuke replied without looking up from his magazine.

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「おは…
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Mor...
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Mor...

MESSAGE.JP: って、ちょっと待ったあぁぁーーっ！」
MESSAGE.EN: Noo, wait a minuuuuuuuuuute!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: Noo, wait a minuuuuuuuuuute!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人が学食内に響き渡る大声を上げる。
MESSAGE.EN: Masato cried loud enough for everyone in the cafeteria to hear.
MESSAGE.Translation: Masato cried loud enough for everyone in the cafeteria to hear.

MESSAGE.JP: おかげで全生徒の注目を集めてしまう。
MESSAGE.EN: Thanks to that, all of the students in the cafeteria turned to stare at us.
MESSAGE.Translation: Thanks to that, all of the students in the cafeteria turned to stare at us.

MESSAGE.JP: その中心は…変貌を遂げた謙吾だ。
MESSAGE.EN: The one in the center of the attention was Kengo. He was totally different from yesterday.
MESSAGE.Translation: The one in the center of the attention was Kengo. He was totally different from yesterday.

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「なんだ、騒がしい奴だな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝What's up? You guys are so loud.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝What's up? You guys are so loud.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 本人は至って冷静に朝食の盆を置いて、席につく。
MESSAGE.EN: He calmly set his breakfast tray on the table and sat down.
MESSAGE.Translation: He calmly set his breakfast tray on the table and sat down.

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「はぁー!?　はぁー!?　はぁー!??」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Hahh!? Hahh!? Hahh!??❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Hahh!? Hahh!? Hahh!??❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「朝っぱらから誰かが３わけわからんポイントを取得か…何事だよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Somebody's got 3 what-the-hell points now... What happened?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Somebody's got 3 what-the-hell points now... What happened?❞

MESSAGE.JP: ようやく雑誌から目を離し、それが真人の見定める目標に向く。
MESSAGE.EN: At last, Kyousuke stopped reading and looked up to see what Masato was fussing about.
MESSAGE.Translation: At last, Kyousuke stopped reading and looked up to see what Masato was fussing about.

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「はぁー!?　なんだよ、おまえ、それ、はぁー!?」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Hahh!? What the hell is that!? Hahh!?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Hahh!? What the hell is that!? Hahh!?❞

MESSAGE.JP: あの恭介までもが、混乱に陥る。
MESSAGE.EN: Even Kyousuke lost his composure in confusion.
MESSAGE.Translation: Even Kyousuke lost his composure in confusion.

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「なんかよくわからんが、計５わけわからんポイントだな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝I'm not sure what's going on, but it's a total of 5 what-the-hell points now.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝I'm not sure what's going on, but it's a total of 5 what-the-hell points now.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「で、なんなんだ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝So what is it?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝So what is it?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴がゼリーのカップを猫の口からはずし、話題の中心に目を移す。
MESSAGE.EN: She withdrew the cup of jelly from the cat's mouth and glanced at Kengo.
MESSAGE.Translation: She withdrew the cup of jelly from the cat's mouth and glanced at Kengo.

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「こわっ！　なんだ、こいつ、こわっ！　うわっ、こわっ！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Scary! What the heck is he!? Scary! He's so scary!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Scary! What the heck is he!? Scary! He's so scary!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 途端、鈴も混乱に陥った。
MESSAGE.EN: She too instantly lost her wits.
MESSAGE.Translation: She too instantly lost her wits.

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「今のも集計に加えていいのか…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Can I count her shouts...?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Can I count her shouts...?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「いいぜ…鈴のこわっ！は、わけわからんと同義語だ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Do it... Rin says ❛scary❜ when she gets confused...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Do it... Rin says ❛scary❜ when she gets confused...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「なら、計８わけわからんポイントだぜ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝All right. 8 points in total, then...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝All right. 8 points in total, then...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 僕は恋患い中なため、このノリには合わせられなかった。
MESSAGE.EN: Because of my lovesickness, I couldn't get into it.
MESSAGE.Translation: Because of my lovesickness, I couldn't get into it.

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「ぶっちぎりで優勝だ、謙吾」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Kengo wins by a landslide.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Kengo wins by a landslide.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「僕もふたつ言っておくよ…はぁ？　はぁ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Can I add 2 more points... Hahh? Hahh?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Can I add 2 more points... Hahh? Hahh?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「おっと、これで１０わけわからんポイント、よくわからんが、ぶっちぎりで優勝だ、謙吾」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Good, you got 10 what-the-hell points, Kengo. I'm not sure what's going on, but it's your victory!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Good, you got 10 what-the-hell points, Kengo. I'm not sure what's going on, but it's your victory!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「よくわからんが、ありがとう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝Me neither, but thank you.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝Me neither, but thank you.❞

MESSAGE.JP: わけのわからない握手を交わすふたり。
MESSAGE.EN: Kyousuke and Kengo shook hands for some reason.
MESSAGE.Translation: Kyousuke and Kengo shook hands for some reason.

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「で、どうかしたのか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝So, tell me what happened.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝So, tell me what happened.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「いや、スルーしろというほうが無理だから…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝It's impossible to ignore it...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝It's impossible to ignore it...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「え？　ああ、このジャンパーのことか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝Eh? Ah, you guys are talking about my jumper?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝Eh? Ah, you guys are talking about my jumper?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾はなぜだか今日に限って、ジャンパーを羽織っている。胴衣の上に。
MESSAGE.EN: I don't know why, but Kengo is wearing a jumper today.
MESSAGE.Translation: I don't know why, but Kengo is wearing a jumper today.

MESSAGE.JP: そこまでは、１はぁ？で済むとしよう。皆がそれ以上はぁ？を連ねた理由それは…
MESSAGE.EN: That fact is only worth one what-the-hell point. The reason he got the rest was...
MESSAGE.Translation: That fact is only worth one what-the-hell point. The reason he got the rest was...

MESSAGE.JP: 背中と胸にあしらわれているロゴ。
MESSAGE.EN: The logos on his back and chest.
MESSAGE.Translation: The logos on his back and chest.

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「これはな、手作りの…リトルバスターズジャンパーだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝This is a Little Busters jumper... which I made.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝This is a Little Busters jumper... which I made.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「て、手作りぃぃぃぃぃ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝You maaaaaaaaade?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝You maaaaaaaaade?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「こわっ！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Scary!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Scary!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「このロゴも自分で作ったのか…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Is this logo your original design as well...?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Is this logo your original design as well...?❞

MESSAGE.JP: その生地を指で触って確かめる恭介。
MESSAGE.EN: Kyousuke touched it with his finger.
MESSAGE.Translation: Kyousuke touched it with his finger.

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「ああ、一晩かけてな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝Ah, I spent the night on that.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝Ah, I spent the night on that.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「一晩って…先にいなくなったと思ったらそんなことしてたのかよっ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝The night... That's why you went back to your room early last night...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝The night... That's why you went back to your room early last night...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「できたら、正式に認めてほしいぐらい、自分でもいたく気に入っている」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝If you don't mind, I'd like you to recognize this as the official logo of our team; I'm extremely fond of it.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝If you don't mind, I'd like you to recognize this as the official logo of our team; I'm extremely fond of it.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「どうだ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝What do you think?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝What do you think?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「どうだといわれても…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝I can't find the words...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝I can't find the words...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「もう飛躍しすぎてて、会話の繋ぎ方すら覚束ない状況だが…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝This dialogue is so messed up I can't make heads or tails of it...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝This dialogue is so messed up I can't make heads or tails of it...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「ああ…いきなりトップギアだな…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Yeah... He's suddenly geared up to the max...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Yeah... He's suddenly geared up to the max...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「まあ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Well...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Well...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 咳払いひとつして、恭介は雑誌に目を戻す。
MESSAGE.EN: Kyousuke cleared his throat and resumed reading his magazine.
MESSAGE.Translation: Kyousuke cleared his throat and resumed reading his magazine.

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「皆も見習えよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Everyone learn from him.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Everyone learn from him.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「おまえも引いてただろ！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Don't act like it didn't freak you out too!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Don't act like it didn't freak you out too!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「らんらんら～」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Lan lan la～.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Lan lan la～.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「はんはんは～ん♪」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Han han ha～n♪❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Han han ha～n♪❞

MESSAGE.JP: …教室に入ると、なにやら小毬さんが葉留佳さんのおさげをいじっていた。
MESSAGE.EN: After entering the classroom, I saw Komari-san braiding Haruka-san's hair.
MESSAGE.Translation: After entering the classroom, I saw Komari-san braiding Haruka-san's hair.

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「あ、理樹君おはよう～」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Oh, Riki-kun, mo～rning.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Oh, Riki-kun, mo～rning.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「おはよう、なにしてるの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Morning. What are you guys up to?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Morning. What are you guys up to?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「ん？　いやー、なんか今日はおさげの位置がビシっと決まらないんですヨ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Hm? Well, I couldn't decide how to set my braids myself.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Hm? Well, I couldn't decide how to set my braids myself.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「んで小毬ちゃんに直してもらってるの」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝So I asked Komari-chan for help.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝So I asked Komari-chan for help.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「へえ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Heh...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Heh...❞

MESSAGE.JP: まあ、確かに小毬さんはそういうの上手そうだ。
MESSAGE.EN: Well, Komari-san certainly seems good at doing it.
MESSAGE.Translation: Well, Komari-san certainly seems good at doing it.

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「できたよ～」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Finished～.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Finished～.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 小毬さんが手鏡を取り出し、仕上がったおさげを葉留佳さんに見せる。
MESSAGE.EN: She took out a hand mirror and let Haruka-san see the results of her work.
MESSAGE.Translation: She took out a hand mirror and let Haruka-san see the results of her work.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「さすがこまりん、バッチシ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝You're awesome, Komarin. It's perfect.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝You're awesome, Komarin. It's perfect.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「やっぱそういうのはこだわるんだねえ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝You sure are particular with your hair.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝You sure are particular with your hair.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「あはははそりゃー女の子ですから」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Ahahaha, of course. I'm a girl, you know.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Ahahaha, of course. I'm a girl, you know.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「小毬ちゃんもお洒落さんだしね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝And Komari-chan has good fashion sense as well.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝And Komari-chan has good fashion sense as well.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「星とか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝You mean her star?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝You mean her star?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「うん、私のトレードマークなんだよ～」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Yes, it's my trademark.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Yes, it's my trademark.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「へえ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Ah...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Ah...❞

MESSAGE.JP: そういえば、なんで星なんだろう。
MESSAGE.EN: I wonder though, why a star?
MESSAGE.Translation: I wonder though, why a star?

MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝.........❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝.........❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「ヒトデは食べられるんでしょうか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝I wonder if starfishes are edible.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝I wonder if starfishes are edible.❞

MESSAGE.JP: …必死に頭の星を両手で隠す。
MESSAGE.EN: ...Komari-san desperately covered the star on her head with her hands.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...Komari-san desperately covered the star on her head with her hands.

MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝......?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝......?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「た、食べないで～」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝D, don't eat it～.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝D, don't eat it～.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「いえ…食べませんが」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝No... I won't eat it.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝No... I won't eat it.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「みおちん、甘いなっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝You're too naive, Mio-chin.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝You're too naive, Mio-chin.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「はい？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝What do you mean?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝What do you mean?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「これはヒトデじゃなくて…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝That is not a starfish...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝That is not a starfish...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「星なんですヨっ!!　イッツ・スター!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝It is... a star!!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝It is... a star!!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「知ってます」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝I knew that.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝I knew that.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「うん、知ってる」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Me too.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Me too.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「なにーっ!?」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Whaaat!?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Whaaat!?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「どうでもいいですが、ウニを最初に食べた人は尊敬に値すると思いませんか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝This is off topic, but don't you think the one who first ate sea urchins is deserving of praise?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝This is off topic, but don't you think the one who first ate sea urchins is deserving of praise?❞

MESSAGE.JP: あー、確かに、と思うものの、それは口にできなかった。
MESSAGE.EN: I definitely agreed, but I couldn't say it.
MESSAGE.Translation: I definitely agreed, but I couldn't say it.

MESSAGE.JP: 普段通り喋ることができそうもないので、僕はひとり席に向かって、授業を受ける準備をすることにした。
MESSAGE.EN: I couldn't talk like normal, so I went back to my seat and got ready for class.
MESSAGE.Translation: I couldn't talk like normal, so I went back to my seat and got ready for class.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「はぁ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Haa....❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Haa....❞

MESSAGE.JP: このため息はなんのため息なんだろう？
MESSAGE.EN: Why was I sighing?
MESSAGE.Translation: Why was I sighing?

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「あー、確かにあれ食べようと思ったのはすごいよね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Ah, yes, that's really something.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Ah, yes, that's really something.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「しかも速攻話変えられたーっ!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Don't change the subject so quickly!!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Don't change the subject so quickly!!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「うには美味しいねえー」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Sea urchins taste yummy.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Sea urchins taste yummy.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「えー？　私あんまり好きじゃないんだけど」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Eh? I don't like them much.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Eh? I don't like them much.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「なんかぐちゃぐちゃしてるしさ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝They look like squashed tomatoes...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝They look like squashed tomatoes...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「…あなたはわたしの大切なものを土足で踏みにじりました」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝...You've trampled down one of my precious things.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝...You've trampled down one of my precious things.❞

MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝......Huh?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝......Huh?❞

MESSAGE.JP: …余程好きらしい。
MESSAGE.EN: ...I guess Nishizono-san really likes them.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...I guess Nishizono-san really likes them.

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「うむ、ウニは美味いな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Umu, sea urchins are delicious.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Umu, sea urchins are delicious.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「うわあ、姉御もっスかっ！　私だけ孤立っ!?」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Oh no, you too, Anego!? I'm all alone now!?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Oh no, you too, Anego!? I'm all alone now!?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「はるちゃん、好き嫌いはよくないんだよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Haru-chan, you shouldn't be picky about food.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Haru-chan, you shouldn't be picky about food.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「うむ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Yeah...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Yeah...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「ところでこれを見てくれコマリマックス」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝By the way, take a look at this, Komari-max.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝By the way, take a look at this, Komari-max.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「ふえ？　なに？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Fue? What is that?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Fue? What is that?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 来ヶ谷さんは何やら海洋生物の図鑑を取り出した。
MESSAGE.EN: Kurugaya-san opened up a picture book of marine life.
MESSAGE.Translation: Kurugaya-san opened up a picture book of marine life.

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「小毬君はウニが好きなようだが、これはなんだか判るか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝You like sea life, right? So do you know what this is?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝You like sea life, right? So do you know what this is?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「うん、むらさきうにだよー」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Yes, it's a purple sea urchin.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Yes, it's a purple sea urchin.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「これは」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝What about this one?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝What about this one?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「ばふんうにー」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝A cockatoo waspfish.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝A cockatoo waspfish.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「もう一回」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Say it again.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Say it again.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「ばふんうに」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Cockatoo waspfish.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Cockatoo waspfish.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「もう一回」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝One more time.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝One more time.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「ば、ばふん…うに…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Co... cocka... cockatoo waspfish...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Co... cocka... cockatoo waspfish...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「うあああーーんっ!!　なんか名前読んでるだけなのにすごいやだぁーーーっ!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Uwaaaaah!! I'm just saying an animal name. Why is it so embarrassing!!!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Uwaaaaah!! I'm just saying an animal name. Why is it so embarrassing!!!❞

MESSAGE.JP: …小毬さん、泣きながら逃走。
MESSAGE.EN: ...She fled the room in tears.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...She fled the room in tears.

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「ああ、可愛い…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Ahh, she's so adorable...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Ahh, she's so adorable...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「…めちゃくちゃマニアックだね…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...You're a complete maniac...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...You're a complete maniac...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 小毬さんにシモ系の言葉を連呼させるのが、いたくお気に入りらしい。
MESSAGE.EN: Forcing Komari-san to repeat dirty words seems to be one of her favorite pastimes.
MESSAGE.Translation: Forcing Komari-san to repeat dirty words seems to be one of her favorite pastimes.

MESSAGE.JP: とりあえず、来ヶ谷さんは間違いなくドＳだと思った。
MESSAGE.EN: For the time being, I believe we can conclude that Kurugaya-san is a hard ❛S.❜
MESSAGE.Translation: For the time being, I believe we can conclude that Kurugaya-san is a hard ❛S.❜

MESSAGE.JP: 廊下の窓際でクドが嬉しそうに何かを太陽に透かしていた。
MESSAGE.EN: Kud was standing by the window in the hallway, and holding something to the sun.
MESSAGE.Translation: Kud was standing by the window in the hallway, and holding something to the sun.

MESSAGE.JP: 真人たちはそれに気づかず、教室に入っていく。
MESSAGE.EN: Masato and the rest entered the classroom without noticing her.
MESSAGE.Translation: Masato and the rest entered the classroom without noticing her.

MESSAGE.JP: なんなんだろう？　僕は話しかけてみる。
MESSAGE.EN: What is she doing? I'd better ask her.
MESSAGE.Translation: What is she doing? I'd better ask her.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「窓から落とさないようにね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Be careful not to drop it from the window.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Be careful not to drop it from the window.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「あ、はろ～。ですー」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Ah, Haro～.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Ah, Haro～.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「…はろー」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...Haro-.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...Haro-.❞

MESSAGE.JP: …本当に力の抜ける棒読みの挨拶だ。
MESSAGE.EN: ...Her completely monotone greeting was so lifeless.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...Her completely monotone greeting was so lifeless.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「何見てるの…鍵？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝What are you looking at? ...Is that a key?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝What are you looking at? ...Is that a key?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「はい、鍵です」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Yes.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Yes.❞

MESSAGE.JP: クドが示したのは作りたての鍵だった。
MESSAGE.EN: She showed me a brand new key.
MESSAGE.Translation: She showed me a brand new key.

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「部屋の鍵です」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝They're my room keys.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝They're my room keys.❞

MESSAGE.JP: ふたつある鍵をクドは僕に見せてくれる。
MESSAGE.EN: She showed me two identical keys.
MESSAGE.Translation: She showed me two identical keys.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「あ、なるほど。片方は合い鍵か」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Ah, I see. One is a duplicate, right?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Ah, I see. One is a duplicate, right?❞

MESSAGE.JP: つまりルームメイト用の鍵、というわけだった。
MESSAGE.EN: I mean, a duplicate key for her new roommate.
MESSAGE.Translation: I mean, a duplicate key for her new roommate.

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「鍵屋さんで作ってもらいました」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝I got them from the locksmith.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝I got them from the locksmith.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「マスターの鍵は寮長が持ってるんだっけね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝The dorm head has the master keys, doesn't she?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝The dorm head has the master keys, doesn't she?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 部屋の住人が変わるたびに安全面を考慮して、付け替えるらしい。
MESSAGE.EN: Every time people changed rooms, she replaced the keys for safety.
MESSAGE.Translation: Every time people changed rooms, she replaced the keys for safety.

MESSAGE.JP: マスターの鍵を貰って、合鍵を二本か三本作る。
MESSAGE.EN: She always took a master key, so three copies were made.
MESSAGE.Translation: She always took a master key, so three copies were made.

MESSAGE.JP: 卒業と同時にそれは寮生活の思い出の品となるわけだった。
MESSAGE.EN: After graduating, those keys will become mementos for them.
MESSAGE.Translation: After graduating, those keys will become mementos for them.

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「リキは部屋の鍵は持ってますか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Riki, do you have a key to your room?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Riki, do you have a key to your room?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「もちろんあるよ。持ってないと色々不都合だし」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Of course I do. It'd be very inconvenient to go without one.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Of course I do. It'd be very inconvenient to go without one.❞

MESSAGE.JP: とはいえ、真人はこれまでも何回かなくしていたりする（一度は食べたとか言っていた）。
MESSAGE.EN: Speaking of which, Masato has lost his key a few times (he told me he ate it, once).
MESSAGE.Translation: Speaking of which, Masato has lost his key a few times (he told me he ate it, once).

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「真人なんかなくしちゃうから持たない、とか言ってるし」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Masato lost his key several times, so he decided not to keep one.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Masato lost his key several times, so he decided not to keep one.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「それだとリキが部屋にいないときはどうしているですか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝But what does he do while you're away from the room?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝But what does he do while you're away from the room?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「どこか余所で時間を潰しているらしいね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝It seems he just kills time somewhere.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝It seems he just kills time somewhere.❞

MESSAGE.JP: それも非効率的だとは思う。
MESSAGE.EN: I really think it's inefficient.
MESSAGE.Translation: I really think it's inefficient.

MESSAGE.JP: でも、鍵をなくして始末書と反省文を書かせられるよりはマシ。
MESSAGE.EN: Even so, it's better than losing the key and having to write a letter of apology.
MESSAGE.Translation: Even so, it's better than losing the key and having to write a letter of apology.

MESSAGE.JP: とは、真人の弁。
MESSAGE.EN: That's what Masato said.
MESSAGE.Translation: That's what Masato said.

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「鍵をなくすと怒られますか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Does the dorm head get angry if you lose a key?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Does the dorm head get angry if you lose a key?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「怒られるね。僕はなくしたことはないけど」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Sure does. Not that I've ever lost mine.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Sure does. Not that I've ever lost mine.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「じゃ、なくさないようにしないとダメですねぇ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Then, I need to be careful not to lose mine.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Then, I need to be careful not to lose mine.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「…でもそれをくっつけるのはやめた方がいいよ、クド」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...But I don't think that thing is really appropriate to stick to the keys.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...But I don't think that thing is really appropriate to stick to the keys.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「え、そ、そうですか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Eh, you, you think so?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Eh, you, you think so?❞

MESSAGE.JP: クドはどこかで見たことがあるヒヨコグマ（だっけ？）のキーホルダーを取り出している。
MESSAGE.EN: There was a weird, fluffy animal (a Sesame Street character I guess?) hanging on the keychain.
MESSAGE.Translation: There was a weird, fluffy animal (a Sesame Street character I guess?) hanging on the keychain.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「夜中にどこか鍵を持って行っちゃいそうだから、それ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I could totally imagine that animal running away with the key in the dead of night.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I could totally imagine that animal running away with the key in the dead of night.❞

MESSAGE.JP: すごくリアルで不気味だし。
MESSAGE.EN: The creature looked so animate that it was scary.
MESSAGE.Translation: The creature looked so animate that it was scary.

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「可愛いんですけど…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝It's cute, though...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝It's cute, though...❞

MESSAGE.JP: クドの趣味はやっぱり変だ。
MESSAGE.EN: I can't understand her tastes.
MESSAGE.Translation: I can't understand her tastes.

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「あ、二木さん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Ah, Futaki-san.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Ah, Futaki-san.❞

MESSAGE.JP: クドが声を掛けたほうを見る。
MESSAGE.EN: I looked in the direction toward which she called out.
MESSAGE.Translation: I looked in the direction toward which she called out.

MESSAGE.JP: そこには二木さんが立っていた。
MESSAGE.EN: Futaki-san was standing there.
MESSAGE.Translation: Futaki-san was standing there.

MESSAGE.JP: 目の前に立っているのは。クドのルームメイトになった少女だ。
MESSAGE.EN: She was the girl who had taken it upon herself to be Kud's roommate.
MESSAGE.Translation: She was the girl who had taken it upon herself to be Kud's roommate.

MESSAGE.JP: この間の、二木…下の名前は何だったか？
MESSAGE.EN: Hmm, Futaki... I wonder what her first name was...
MESSAGE.Translation: Hmm, Futaki... I wonder what her first name was...

MESSAGE.JP: 思い出せない。
MESSAGE.EN: I couldn't remember.
MESSAGE.Translation: I couldn't remember.

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「お呼びしてすみません」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Sorry for calling you out.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Sorry for calling you out.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「通り道だから、別に」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝I needed to walk through here anyway.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝I needed to walk through here anyway.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 彼女は髪の毛に右手を当て、ふぁさ、と払った。
MESSAGE.EN: She brushed her hair with her right hand.
MESSAGE.Translation: She brushed her hair with her right hand.

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「鍵が出来たので、お渡ししようかと思ったんです」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Your key has arrived. I thought I should give it to you straight away.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Your key has arrived. I thought I should give it to you straight away.❞

MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝My key...?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝My key...?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 彼女は顔をしかめ、それから思い至ったのか、頷いた。
MESSAGE.EN: She frowned, but after looking like she'd realized something, nodded.
MESSAGE.Translation: She frowned, but after looking like she'd realized something, nodded.

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「…そう、ありがとう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝...Okay, thank you.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝...Okay, thank you.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鍵を受け取って二木さんはそれをポケットに入れた。
MESSAGE.EN: She took the key and put it in her pocket.
MESSAGE.Translation: She took the key and put it in her pocket.

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「よろしくね、能美さん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝I look forward to living with you, Noumi-san.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝I look forward to living with you, Noumi-san.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「はい、こちらこそ、よろしく…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Yes, me too. Welcome...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Yes, me too. Welcome...❞

MESSAGE.JP: クドはぺこんとお辞儀をしかけて、何か思いついたのか、顔を上げた。
MESSAGE.EN: Kud bowed her head then raised it as if she'd remembered something.
MESSAGE.Translation: Kud bowed her head then raised it as if she'd remembered something.

MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「ルームメイトさんになったのでお願いがひとつ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝You're going to be my roommate, so I have a request.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝You're going to be my roommate, so I have a request.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「私のことは、名前で呼んでください。呼び捨てでもおっけーです」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Please call me by my first name. Without the honorific.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Please call me by my first name. Without the honorific.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「でも、嫌なら能美さんのままでもいいんですけど」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝But if you don't want to, Noumi-san is fine.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝But if you don't want to, Noumi-san is fine.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「毎度毎度、誰にでもそう頼んでるの、あなたは？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝Do you go around asking people to do that every day?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝Do you go around asking people to do that every day?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「そういうわけではないんですけど…やっぱり嫌ですか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Of course not... but does that mean you won't?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Of course not... but does that mean you won't?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「…別に…そういうわけじゃないけど」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝...No... that's not what I meant.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝...No... that's not what I meant.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 二木さんは微かに苦笑した。
MESSAGE.EN: Futaki-san showed a faint, bitter smile.
MESSAGE.Translation: Futaki-san showed a faint, bitter smile.

MESSAGE.JP: 何故か少し、さみしそうにも見えた。
MESSAGE.EN: She looked kind of sad for some reason.
MESSAGE.Translation: She looked kind of sad for some reason.

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「あなたが望むならそうするわ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝If that's what you want, I'll do it.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝If that's what you want, I'll do it.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「よろしくね…クドリャフカ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝I'm counting on you... Kudryavka.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝I'm counting on you... Kudryavka.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「はい！　よろしくお願いします」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Yes! Let's take care of each other.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Yes! Let's take care of each other.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 改めて頭を下げるクド。
MESSAGE.EN: Kud bowed down her head again.
MESSAGE.Translation: Kud bowed down her head again.

MESSAGE.JP: よかった。円満に行きそうだ。
MESSAGE.EN: Thank goodness. It looked like things would go smoothly for her.
MESSAGE.Translation: Thank goodness. It looked like things would go smoothly for her.

MESSAGE.JP: 彼女は顔をしかめ、それから思い至ったのか、頷いた。
MESSAGE.EN: She frowned, and then nodded like she'd realized something.
MESSAGE.Translation: She frowned, and then nodded like she'd realized something.

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「…これは何？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝...What is that?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝...What is that?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鍵を受け取り、ぶら下がったそれを指差しながら二木さんは言う。
MESSAGE.EN: She took the key and asked about the thing dangling from it.
MESSAGE.Translation: She took the key and asked about the thing dangling from it.

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「キーホルダーです。無くすと怒られるらしいですし」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝It's a key holder. They say you'll get scolded if you lose your key.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝It's a key holder. They say you'll get scolded if you lose your key.❞

MESSAGE.JP: クドがキーホルダーを付けたほうの鍵は相手に渡すものだったのか。
MESSAGE.EN: It looks like the reason why Kud had attached the key chain was out of concern for her roommate.
MESSAGE.Translation: It looks like the reason why Kud had attached the key chain was out of concern for her roommate.

MESSAGE.JP: 僕は彼女を見た。彼女はちゃりちゃりと音をさせてキーホルダーの輪をいじる。
MESSAGE.EN: Hearing a metallic cling, I looked at Futaki-san and found her fiddling with the key chain.
MESSAGE.Translation: Hearing a metallic cling, I looked at Futaki-san and found her fiddling with the key chain.

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「要らないわよこんなの」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝I don't need something like this.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝I don't need something like this.❞

MESSAGE.JP: キーホルダーをぽい、と捨てた。
MESSAGE.EN: She threw the chain away.
MESSAGE.Translation: She threw the chain away.

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「あぁっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Ah!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Ah!❞

MESSAGE.JP: クドは慌てて廊下に投げられたそれを拾いに行く。
MESSAGE.EN: Panicked, Kud quickly went to rescue it from the floor.
MESSAGE.Translation: Panicked, Kud quickly went to rescue it from the floor.

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「何するんですかー」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Why did you do that?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Why did you do that?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「要らないから捨てたんだけど？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝I threw it away because I don't need it.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝I threw it away because I don't need it.❞

MESSAGE.JP: とりつく島がない。
MESSAGE.EN: She wouldn't give Kud the time of day.
MESSAGE.Translation: She wouldn't give Kud the time of day.

MESSAGE.JP: クドは困った表情を浮かべた。
MESSAGE.EN: Kud wore a troubled look.
MESSAGE.Translation: Kud wore a troubled look.

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「…何よ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝...What?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝...What?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「な、なんでもないです。そうですよね、好みはやっぱりありますもんね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝N, nothing at all. That's right. Everybody has their own likes and dislikes.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝N, nothing at all. That's right. Everybody has their own likes and dislikes.❞

MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝...?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝...?❞

MESSAGE.JP: クドは屈み込むと鞄からじゃらじゃらとキーホルダーを取り出した。
MESSAGE.EN: Kud bent down onto her knees, and produced a whole bunch of key chains from her bag.
MESSAGE.Translation: Kud bent down onto her knees, and produced a whole bunch of key chains from her bag.

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「はい、どうぞ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Please.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Please.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「どうぞ、ってなに、その中から選べっていうの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝Please what? Are you asking me to choose one from those things?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝Please what? Are you asking me to choose one from those things?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「そうです。選んでください」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Yes. Please pick one.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Yes. Please pick one.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 彼女は眉根を寄せた。
MESSAGE.EN: She frowned again.
MESSAGE.Translation: She frowned again.

MESSAGE.JP: 僕が見る限り、ヒヨコグマに負けず劣らず変なのばっかりだ。
MESSAGE.EN: In my opinion, most of the chains looked as weird as the one with the Sesame Street character.
MESSAGE.Translation: In my opinion, most of the chains looked as weird as the one with the Sesame Street character.

MESSAGE.JP: まるで観光地に売っているキーホルダーの博覧会。
MESSAGE.EN: It was like the key chain collection of a souvenir shop.
MESSAGE.Translation: It was like the key chain collection of a souvenir shop.

MESSAGE.JP: よくわからない人形やら得体の知れない仮面がくっついているもの。
MESSAGE.EN: There was one with a strange small doll, one with a mysterious mask.
MESSAGE.Translation: There was one with a strange small doll, one with a mysterious mask.

MESSAGE.JP: あるいは幾何学模様が組み合わさった知恵の輪みたいなもの。
MESSAGE.EN: There was even one that looked like a disentanglement puzzle.
MESSAGE.Translation: There was even one that looked like a disentanglement puzzle.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「クド、キーホルダー集めが趣味なの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Kud, is collecting key chains a hobby of yours?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Kud, is collecting key chains a hobby of yours?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「あ、いえ。そういうわけじゃないんですけど」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Er, no. It's not like that.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Er, no. It's not like that.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「小さい頃から色々転々としていたものですから…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝I've had to move many times since I was small...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝I've had to move many times since I was small...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「色々なところの記念に、と買い求めるうちに集まってしまって」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Every time I moved, I bought a key chain or two as a memento.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Every time I moved, I bought a key chain or two as a memento.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「あぁ、そっか…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Ah, I see...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Ah, I see...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 商社の仕事をしているおじいさんの都合であまりひとところに居なかったんだっけ。
MESSAGE.EN: I remember she mentioned changing her home lots of times due to her grandfather's business.
MESSAGE.Translation: I remember she mentioned changing her home lots of times due to her grandfather's business.

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「どうぞっ。どれでもいいですよ。差し上げますっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Please. Anything is okay. Pick any one!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Please. Anything is okay. Pick any one!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「どれも」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝All of them...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝All of them...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「どれも？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝All of them?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝All of them?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「変だわ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝...look odd.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝...look odd.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「ガーンっ!?」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Gahhhn!?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Gahhhn!?❞

MESSAGE.JP: クドが泣きそうな顔でこっちを見る。
MESSAGE.EN: Kud's face looked like she was about to cry.
MESSAGE.Translation: Kud's face looked like she was about to cry.

MESSAGE.JP: いや、彼女の感想に激しく同感だ。
MESSAGE.EN: I must agree with Futaki-san, though.
MESSAGE.Translation: I must agree with Futaki-san, though.

MESSAGE.JP: しかしそれでは話が進みそうにないので、僕は助け船を出した。
MESSAGE.EN: It didn't look like the conversation was making any progress. I decided to give her a hand.
MESSAGE.Translation: It didn't look like the conversation was making any progress. I decided to give her a hand.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ま、まぁそう言わず選んでやってよ…鍵をなくすと困るのはきみだし」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝H, hey, don't say that... Please choose one... You'll get in trouble if you lose your key.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝H, hey, don't say that... Please choose one... You'll get in trouble if you lose your key.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 二木さんは僕を睨んだ。
MESSAGE.EN: She glared at me.
MESSAGE.Translation: She glared at me.

MESSAGE.JP: うっ。何か気に障ったのだろうか。
MESSAGE.EN: Uhhh. Did I make her angry?
MESSAGE.Translation: Uhhh. Did I make her angry?

MESSAGE.JP: 思わず後ずさる。
MESSAGE.EN: I instinctually took a step back.
MESSAGE.Translation: I instinctually took a step back.

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「…これでいいわ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝...This one will do.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝...This one will do.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 二木さんは小さなぬいぐるみがついたキーホルダーを選んだ。
MESSAGE.EN: She had chosen a chain with a small stuffed animal.
MESSAGE.Translation: She had chosen a chain with a small stuffed animal.

MESSAGE.JP: 押すと音が出るのか、ピコピコと謎な鳴き声（？）がする。
MESSAGE.EN: It made some kind of noise when she picked it up... maybe it was supposed to be an animal cry? It sounded something like ❛pikopiko❜.
MESSAGE.Translation: It made some kind of noise when she picked it up... maybe it was supposed to be an animal cry? It sounded something like ❛pikopiko❜.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「それ、動物…だよね？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝That thing is an animal... right?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝That thing is an animal... right?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「はい。犬ですけど」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Yes. It's a dog.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Yes. It's a dog.❞

MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝A dog!?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝A dog!?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 綿玉に目玉がくっついているようにしか見えない。
MESSAGE.EN: It only looks like a pair of eyeballs stuck on a ball of cotton, to me.
MESSAGE.Translation: It only looks like a pair of eyeballs stuck on a ball of cotton, to me.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「これ、犬？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Are you sure this is a dog?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Are you sure this is a dog?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「はい、犬です。どこからどこを見ても犬ですよ。ほら、足ありますし」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Yes, I am. This is a dog in every respect. Look, it has legs.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Yes, I am. This is a dog in every respect. Look, it has legs.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「…いや、足っぽいのはあるけど、でもこれ犬…？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝But, even if it has some kind of legs, to say it's a dog...?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝But, even if it has some kind of legs, to say it's a dog...?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「悪趣味なのばっかりでコレが一番まともそう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝At least this one looks better than any of the others.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝At least this one looks better than any of the others.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「そ、そうかな…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I, I'm not really sure about that...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I, I'm not really sure about that...❞

MESSAGE.JP: なんかケセランパサランのでっかいのみたいで不気味なんだけど…。
MESSAGE.EN: I think it's pretty eerie... it looks like a ghost or something with that white body and big eyes...
MESSAGE.Translation: I think it's pretty eerie... it looks like a ghost or something with that white body and big eyes...

MESSAGE.JP: クドは鞄にじゃらじゃらとキーホルダーをしまった。
MESSAGE.EN: Kud put the rest of the key chains back in her bag.
MESSAGE.Translation: Kud put the rest of the key chains back in her bag.

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「…じゃ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝...Later.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝...Later.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 二木さんは鍵をスカートのポケットに入れるとぴこぴこ音をさせながら歩き去った。
MESSAGE.EN: Futaki-san stuck her key in her skirt pocket and walked away.
MESSAGE.Translation: Futaki-san stuck her key in her skirt pocket and walked away.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「相変わらず愛想の悪い子だな…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Such an unfriendly girl...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Such an unfriendly girl...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「キーホルダー、受け取ってくれましたからいいひとです」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝She's a good person, since she accepted my key chain.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝She's a good person, since she accepted my key chain.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「そうかな…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Is that so...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Is that so...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「そういえばあの子の名前、なんだっけ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝What is her name, by the way?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝What is her name, by the way?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「二木さんですよ。二木佳奈多さん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝She's Futaki-san. Kanata Futaki-san.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝She's Futaki-san. Kanata Futaki-san.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「あ、そうそう、佳奈多、って名前…だっけか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Ah, that's right. Her name was... Kanata.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Ah, that's right. Her name was... Kanata.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「どうかしましたか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Is there something wrong?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Is there something wrong?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ううん。別に何でもない」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝No. Nothing.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝No. Nothing.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 僕は二木さんが去っていったほうへ視線を向けた。
MESSAGE.EN: I looked in the direction Futaki-san had walked to.
MESSAGE.Translation: I looked in the direction Futaki-san had walked to.

MESSAGE.JP: 当然二木さんは居ない。
MESSAGE.EN: Of course, she wasn't there any longer.
MESSAGE.Translation: Of course, she wasn't there any longer.

MESSAGE.JP: なんだろうな。何か疑問があったんだけれど。
MESSAGE.EN: I wonder... There was something that had got me thinking about.
MESSAGE.Translation: I wonder... There was something that had got me thinking about.

MESSAGE.JP: 思いつかないのはどうでもいいことなのだろう。
MESSAGE.EN: But I couldn't remember what it was, so I guess it wasn't anything very important.
MESSAGE.Translation: But I couldn't remember what it was, so I guess it wasn't anything very important.

MESSAGE.JP: 僕は思考を切り替えて、クドと一緒に教室に入った。
MESSAGE.EN: I gave up trying to recall it, and got in the classroom with Kud.
MESSAGE.Translation: I gave up trying to recall it, and got in the classroom with Kud.

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「あ、三枝さん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Ah, Saigusa-san.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Ah, Saigusa-san.❞

MESSAGE.JP: クドが声を掛けたほうを見る。
MESSAGE.EN: I looked in the direction toward which she called out.
MESSAGE.Translation: I looked in the direction toward which she called out.

MESSAGE.JP: そこには葉留佳さんが立っていた。
MESSAGE.EN: Haruka-san was standing there.
MESSAGE.Translation: Haruka-san was standing there.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「あれ、クド公に理樹くん。どうしたの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Oh? What are you guys doing here?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Oh? What are you guys doing here?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「お部屋の合い鍵を作って貰ったのでお渡ししようかと…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝I thought you'd pass here so I could give you your key...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝I thought you'd pass here so I could give you your key...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「ほいほい…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Okay, okay...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Okay, okay...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「ってなんかへんなのくっついてるんだけど」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Hey, what is this weird thing on my key?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Hey, what is this weird thing on my key?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「お気に召しませんか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝You don't like it?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝You don't like it?❞

MESSAGE.JP: クドは屈み込むと鞄からじゃらじゃらとキーホルダーを取り出した。
MESSAGE.EN: Kud bent down onto her knees, and produced a whole bunch of key chains from her bag.
MESSAGE.Translation: Kud bent down onto her knees, and produced a whole bunch of key chains from her bag.

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「はい、どうぞ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Here, help yourself.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Here, help yourself.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「この中から選んでいいの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Can I pick one of them?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Can I pick one of them?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「そうです。選んでください」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Yes. Please choose one.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Yes. Please choose one.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「へー、面白いの持ってんねー、クド公」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Wow, you have such interesting ones here, Little Kud.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Wow, you have such interesting ones here, Little Kud.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 興味津々で覗き込む葉留佳さん。
MESSAGE.EN: Haruka-san looked fascinated by them.
MESSAGE.Translation: Haruka-san looked fascinated by them.

MESSAGE.JP: 僕が見る限り、変なのばっかりだ。
MESSAGE.EN: In my opinion, all of them looked odd.
MESSAGE.Translation: In my opinion, all of them looked odd.

MESSAGE.JP: まるで観光地に売っているキーホルダーの博覧会。
MESSAGE.EN: It was like the key chain collection of a souvenir shop.
MESSAGE.Translation: It was like the key chain collection of a souvenir shop.

MESSAGE.JP: よくわからない人形やら得体の知れない仮面がくっついているもの。
MESSAGE.EN: There was one with a strange small doll, one with a mysterious mask.
MESSAGE.Translation: There was one with a strange small doll, one with a mysterious mask.

MESSAGE.JP: あるいは幾何学模様が組み合わさった知恵の輪みたいなもの。
MESSAGE.EN: There was even one that looked like a disentanglement puzzle.
MESSAGE.Translation: There was even one that looked like a disentanglement puzzle.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「クド、キーホルダー集めが趣味なの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Kud, is collecting key chains a hobby of yours?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Kud, is collecting key chains a hobby of yours?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「あ、いえ。そういうわけじゃないんですけど」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Er, no. It's not like that.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Er, no. It's not like that.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「小さい頃から色々転々としていたものですから…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝I've had to move many times since I was small...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝I've had to move many times since I was small...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「色々なところの記念に、と買い求めるうちに集まってしまって」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Every time I moved, I bought a key chain or two as a memento.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Every time I moved, I bought a key chain or two as a memento.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「あぁ、そっか…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Ah, I see...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Ah, I see...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 商社の仕事をしているおじいさんの都合であまりひとところに居なかったんだっけ。
MESSAGE.EN: I remember she mentioned changing her home lots of times due to her grandfather's business.
MESSAGE.Translation: I remember she mentioned changing her home lots of times due to her grandfather's business.

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「これなんかどうでしょう？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝How about this one?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝How about this one?❞

MESSAGE.JP: クドが取りだしたのは真っ白い楕円形の…なんだろ。卵？
MESSAGE.EN: She picked up a white, oval-shaped one... An egg?
MESSAGE.Translation: She picked up a white, oval-shaped one... An egg?

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「なんでクド公はそれを選ぶかなぁ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝What made you choose that one, Little Kud?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝What made you choose that one, Little Kud?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 葉留佳さんは苦笑している。
MESSAGE.EN: She had a wry smile.
MESSAGE.Translation: She had a wry smile.

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「…？　だって三枝さんはたまごりょうりモガッ！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝...? If I'm not mistaken, you said you like eg... moga!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝...? If I'm not mistaken, you said you like eg... moga!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「そーれーは内緒って言ったでしょっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝I told you it's a secret.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝I told you it's a secret.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「んーっんーっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Hnnnn, hnnnn.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Hnnnn, hnnnn.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 何か言いかけたクドの口を葉留佳さんは押さえている。
MESSAGE.EN: Kud tried to say something, but Haruka-san was holding her mouth shut.
MESSAGE.Translation: Kud tried to say something, but Haruka-san was holding her mouth shut.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ちょ、ちょっと葉留佳さん。クドが苦しそうだよっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝He, hey you should stop, Haruka-san. Kud looks like she's in pain.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝He, hey you should stop, Haruka-san. Kud looks like she's in pain.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「っと、あ、ごめんごめん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Oh, sorry, sorry.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Oh, sorry, sorry.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「はーっ…はーっ死ぬかと思いました」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Hahh... Hahh... I thought I was about to die.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Hahh... Hahh... I thought I was about to die.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「んじゃありがとね、クド公。理樹くんもまたねー」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Thank you for the key, Little Kud. See you, guys.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Thank you for the key, Little Kud. See you, guys.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 葉留佳さんは結局クドが選んだキーホルダー付きの鍵を受け取って去っていった。
MESSAGE.EN: In the end, Haruka-san left after receiving her copy of the key with the chain of Kud's choosing.
MESSAGE.Translation: In the end, Haruka-san left after receiving her copy of the key with the chain of Kud's choosing.

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「あ、西園さん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Ah, Nishizono-san.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Ah, Nishizono-san.❞

MESSAGE.JP: クドが声を掛けたほうを見る。
MESSAGE.EN: I looked at the direction toward which she called out.
MESSAGE.Translation: I looked at the direction toward which she called out.

MESSAGE.JP: そこには西園さんが立っていた。
MESSAGE.EN: Nishizono-san was standing there.
MESSAGE.Translation: Nishizono-san was standing there.

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「能美さん…それに、直枝さんも」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝Noumi-san... and Naoe-san.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝Noumi-san... and Naoe-san.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 本を一冊、小脇に抱えた西園さんが軽く頭を下げる。
MESSAGE.EN: With a book tucked under her arm, she bowed to us.
MESSAGE.Translation: With a book tucked under her arm, she bowed to us.

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「お呼びしてすみません」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Thank you for coming.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Thank you for coming.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「いえ、どうということはないです」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝No problem. It's no trouble at all.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝No problem. It's no trouble at all.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「鍵が出来たので、お渡ししようかと思ったんです」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝The keys got made, so I thought I should give you your copy.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝The keys got made, so I thought I should give you your copy.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「鍵…？　部屋のですか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝A key...? For our room?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝A key...? For our room?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「はい、そうです」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Yes.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Yes.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「無いとご不便かと思いまして」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝I thought it'd be more convenient if you had one.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝I thought it'd be more convenient if you had one.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「…わたしは部屋にいることが多いですから、それほど使うことはないと思います」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝...I'm usually in my room so I don't think I'll have that much use for it.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝...I'm usually in my room so I don't think I'll have that much use for it.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「ですから特に必要は…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝Therefore I don't particularly need it...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝Therefore I don't particularly need it...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「そ、そうですよね。すみません」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝O, okay. I'm sorry.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝O, okay. I'm sorry.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「…それは、なんのキャラクターですか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝...But, what is that character?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝...But, what is that character?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 西園さんの視線は、キーホルダーに向いていた。
MESSAGE.EN: She was staring intently at the key chain.
MESSAGE.Translation: She was staring intently at the key chain.

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「えっと、それはヒヨコグマって言います」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Ah, he's Cookie Monster from the Sesame Street.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Ah, he's Cookie Monster from the Sesame Street.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「…そうですか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝...I see.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝...I see.❞

MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝.........❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝.........❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「鍵があって困る、ということもないですし」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝There is no problem with owning a key either.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝There is no problem with owning a key either.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「いただきましょう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝I'll accept it.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝I'll accept it.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 空いている手で、西園さんが鍵を受け取る。
MESSAGE.EN: She received the key with her empty hand.
MESSAGE.Translation: She received the key with her empty hand.

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「気に入っていただけて、嬉しいですっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝I'll be glad if you like it.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝I'll be glad if you like it.❞

MESSAGE.JP: クドがぱっと笑顔を見せる。
MESSAGE.EN: Kud was suddenly one big smile.
MESSAGE.Translation: Kud was suddenly one big smile.

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「他に、こんなのもあるんですよー」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Let me show you the other ones.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Let me show you the other ones.❞

MESSAGE.JP: クドは屈み込むと鞄からじゃらじゃらとキーホルダーを取り出した。
MESSAGE.EN: Kud bent down onto her knees, and produced a whole bunch of key chains from her bag.
MESSAGE.Translation: Kud bent down onto her knees, and produced a whole bunch of key chains from her bag.

MESSAGE.JP: 僕が見る限り、ヒヨコグマに負けず劣らず変なのばっかりだ。
MESSAGE.EN: In my opinion, most of them looked as weird as the Sesame Street character chain.
MESSAGE.Translation: In my opinion, most of them looked as weird as the Sesame Street character chain.

MESSAGE.JP: まるで観光地に売っているキーホルダーの博覧会。
MESSAGE.EN: It was like the key chain collection of a souvenir shop.
MESSAGE.Translation: It was like the key chain collection of a souvenir shop.

MESSAGE.JP: よくわからない人形やら得体の知れない仮面がくっついているもの。
MESSAGE.EN: There was one with a strange small doll, one with a mysterious mask.
MESSAGE.Translation: There was one with a strange small doll, one with a mysterious mask.

MESSAGE.JP: あるいは幾何学模様が組み合わさった知恵の輪みたいなもの。
MESSAGE.EN: There was even one that looked like a disentanglement puzzle.
MESSAGE.Translation: There was even one that looked like a disentanglement puzzle.

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「ほう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝Wow.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝Wow.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 興味深そうに、西園さんが漁り始める。
MESSAGE.EN: With great interest, she checked out each one in turn.
MESSAGE.Translation: With great interest, she checked out each one in turn.

MESSAGE.JP: 二人とも趣味が似通っているのか（変な意味で）。
MESSAGE.EN: They seem to have similar tastes (in a strange way).
MESSAGE.Translation: They seem to have similar tastes (in a strange way).

MESSAGE.JP: それなら、ちょっと安心だ。
MESSAGE.EN: That fact eased my worries a little.
MESSAGE.Translation: That fact eased my worries a little.

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「これは？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝What is this?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝What is this?❞

MESSAGE.JP: そのキーホルダーは人間が二人抱き合ったデザインをしている。
MESSAGE.EN: The key chain she was holding had two human-shaped dolls embracing each other.
MESSAGE.Translation: The key chain she was holding had two human-shaped dolls embracing each other.

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「…なるほど」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝...I see.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝...I see.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 西園さんが両手で動かすと、腰の部分がカクカクと振れる。
MESSAGE.EN: When she gave it a shake, the one in the back shook its waist.
MESSAGE.Translation: When she gave it a shake, the one in the back shook its waist.

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「それはおじい様が南洋諸島で買ったんですよー」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝My grandpa bought it on the South Sea Islands.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝My grandpa bought it on the South Sea Islands.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「少し変わったでざいんですよねぇ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Don't you think its design is extraordinary?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Don't you think its design is extraordinary?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「って待ったー、それってもしかして…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Err, wait. Isn't that design...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Err, wait. Isn't that design...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「しかも、男性同士です」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝Furthermore, they are both men.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝Furthermore, they are both men.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 西園さんは何故か嬉しそうに両手を動かし続けていた。
MESSAGE.EN: I didn't know why, but she was happily playing with the key chain.
MESSAGE.Translation: I didn't know why, but she was happily playing with the key chain.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「…そろそろ行こうか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...We should be going now.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...We should be going now.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「は、はい」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝O, okay.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝O, okay.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 僕とクドは一緒に教室に戻ることにした。
MESSAGE.EN: The two of us went back in the classroom together.
MESSAGE.Translation: The two of us went back in the classroom together.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「クド、おはよう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Morning, Kud.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Morning, Kud.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「ぐっもーにんですー」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Gu mo-ningu-.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Gu mo-ningu-.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 僕はクドに挨拶だけして、教室に入った。
MESSAGE.EN: I greeted Kud and entered the classroom.
MESSAGE.Translation: I greeted Kud and entered the classroom.

MESSAGE.JP: 休み時間になると、鈴が、僕たちの前に立っていた。
MESSAGE.EN: The recess started, and Rin was standing in front of my desk.
MESSAGE.Translation: The recess started, and Rin was standing in front of my desk.

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「ん、どうしたんだ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Hm, what's up?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Hm, what's up?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「あ、そうか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Ah, I get it.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Ah, I get it.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 僕は昨日の時点で課題を達成したことを思い出す。
MESSAGE.EN: I remembered we had completed a task yesterday.
MESSAGE.Translation: I remembered we had completed a task yesterday.

MESSAGE.JP: なら、次の課題が来てるはずだ。
MESSAGE.EN: So, we could expect to get another one today.
MESSAGE.Translation: So, we could expect to get another one today.

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴は一緒にいこうと誘いにきたんだ。
MESSAGE.EN: Seems like Rin was expecting us to go together.
MESSAGE.Translation: Seems like Rin was expecting us to go together.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ごめん、真人。用があったんだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Sorry, Masato. I must go.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Sorry, Masato. I must go.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 僕は立ち上がった。
MESSAGE.EN: I stood up.
MESSAGE.Translation: I stood up.

MESSAGE.JP: 今日は、新しい課題が届いてるのだろうか、疑問に思う。
MESSAGE.EN: I wondered if a new task had already arrived today.
MESSAGE.Translation: I wondered if a new task had already arrived today.

MESSAGE.JP: だって昨日の一件…彼の恋患いは治すことができたのか、まだわからないんだ。
MESSAGE.EN: Because... I wasn't really sure whether we successfully cleared the previous one or not.
MESSAGE.Translation: Because... I wasn't really sure whether we successfully cleared the previous one or not.

MESSAGE.JP: 今までは明確な解決法があっただけに、今回だけは自信がない。
MESSAGE.EN: I wasn't confident at all, since there hadn't been any obvious way to solve it.
MESSAGE.Translation: I wasn't confident at all, since there hadn't been any obvious way to solve it.

MESSAGE.JP: そもそも課題がおかしいんだ。
MESSAGE.EN: The task itself was very tricky from the get-go.
MESSAGE.Translation: The task itself was very tricky from the get-go.

MESSAGE.JP: どうして、ひとりの男の子の恋患いを気にする必要があったんだ…『手紙の主』は。
MESSAGE.EN: Why did the task sender, the author of the letter, have to worry about one boy's lovesickness...?
MESSAGE.Translation: Why did the task sender, the author of the letter, have to worry about one boy's lovesickness...?

MESSAGE.JP: その課題のおかげで、たちまち一貫性を失った。
MESSAGE.EN: That task completely broke the pattern between the other tasks we had solved.
MESSAGE.Translation: That task completely broke the pattern between the other tasks we had solved.

MESSAGE.JP: いや、学校をよくしていく、という点では一貫しているけど…。
MESSAGE.EN: What they do have in common is that solving all these problems would no doubt make our school a better place.
MESSAGE.Translation: What they do have in common is that solving all these problems would no doubt make our school a better place.

MESSAGE.JP: そんな恋患いぐらいで勉強に集中できなくなっている子の面倒を見ていったら、どれだけ果てしない課題になるのか…。
MESSAGE.EN: But I have no clue how long it'd take to solve every single person's problems who had issues similar to that lovesick boy.
MESSAGE.Translation: But I have no clue how long it'd take to solve every single person's problems who had issues similar to that lovesick boy.

MESSAGE.JP: 終わりが見えないじゃないか。
MESSAGE.EN: I couldn't see an end to it.
MESSAGE.Translation: I couldn't see an end to it.

MESSAGE.JP: 渡り廊下に出ると、すぐ猫たちがみゃーみゃーと鈴に寄ってくる。
MESSAGE.EN: When we reached the connecting corridor, Rin's cats immediately rallied to her.
MESSAGE.Translation: When we reached the connecting corridor, Rin's cats immediately rallied to her.

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「出迎えご苦労」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Thanks for the welcome.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Thanks for the welcome.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「…たまには出迎えてくれなくてもいいぞ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝...You guys don't always have to welcome me, though.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝...You guys don't always have to welcome me, though.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「待ってるのは大変だろう…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝It must be tough to wait for me...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝It must be tough to wait for me...❞

MESSAGE.JP: みゃぅー。
MESSAGE.EN: Meow.
MESSAGE.Translation: Meow.

MESSAGE.JP: かりかりかり。
MESSAGE.EN: *Scratch*scratch*.
MESSAGE.Translation: *Scratch*scratch*.

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「なんだ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝What is it?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝What is it?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 猫は鈴の上靴をひっかいている。
MESSAGE.EN: A cat was pawing one of her shoes.
MESSAGE.Translation: A cat was pawing one of her shoes.

MESSAGE.JP: たしたし。
MESSAGE.EN: *Scratch*scratch*.
MESSAGE.Translation: *Scratch*scratch*.

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「そうか…上靴が気になるのか…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝I see... You're interested in my shoes...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝I see... You're interested in my shoes...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「…って、出迎えじゃなくって上靴のほうが大事なのか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝...Hang on, are you saying my shoes are more important to you than myself?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝...Hang on, are you saying my shoes are more important to you than myself?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「ひょっとしてあたしの上靴目当てかっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Maybe, you're only after my shoes?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Maybe, you're only after my shoes?❞

MESSAGE.JP: にゃー。
MESSAGE.EN: Meow.
MESSAGE.Translation: Meow.

MESSAGE.JP: ちょこん、と座った猫が見上げて鳴く。
MESSAGE.EN: Another cat sat down, looked up at her and cried.
MESSAGE.Translation: Another cat sat down, looked up at her and cried.

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「おまえは違うのか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝You're not the same as him?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝You're not the same as him?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「そうか、よかった。上靴沢山揃えようかと思ったぞ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝I see, you saved me. I thought I'd have to buy shoes for all of you guys...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝I see, you saved me. I thought I'd have to buy shoes for all of you guys...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 屈んで猫を撫でる鈴。
MESSAGE.EN: She bent down to pat the cat on the head.
MESSAGE.Translation: She bent down to pat the cat on the head.

MESSAGE.JP: たしたし。
MESSAGE.EN: *Scratch*scratch*.
MESSAGE.Translation: *Scratch*scratch*.

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「こだわってるおまえらには必要そうだが…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Looks like you guys need them, though...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Looks like you guys need them, though...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「まぁいいか…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Okay, whatever...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Okay, whatever...❞

MESSAGE.JP: みゃぁみゃぁ。
MESSAGE.EN: Meow meow.
MESSAGE.Translation: Meow meow.

MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Hmm...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Hmm...❞

MESSAGE.JP: ごろごろ。猫が喉を鳴らす。
MESSAGE.EN: The cat purred.
MESSAGE.Translation: The cat purred.

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「くすぐり方、上達したろ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Don't you think I've gotten better at titillating?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Don't you think I've gotten better at titillating?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「くすぐりますたー」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝I'm a master of titillating.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝I'm a master of titillating.❞

MESSAGE.JP: みゃう。
MESSAGE.EN: Meow.
MESSAGE.Translation: Meow.

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「おまえもしてほしいか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝You want to be titillated as well?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝You want to be titillated as well?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「うむ、そこに並べ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Okay, make a line over there.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Okay, make a line over there.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「ぐりぐり」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Tickle tickle.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Tickle tickle.❞

MESSAGE.JP: にゃーにゃぅー。
MESSAGE.EN: Meow meow.
MESSAGE.Translation: Meow meow.

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「これがますたーの手腕だ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝This is the skill of a master...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝This is the skill of a master...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 誇らしそうな鈴。
MESSAGE.EN: She looked proud.
MESSAGE.Translation: She looked proud.

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「今日は来てないのか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Didn't he come today?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Didn't he come today?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「いるよ、レノン」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Lennon is over there.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Lennon is over there.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 僕が先にそれを見つける。
MESSAGE.EN: I had already spotted him.
MESSAGE.Translation: I had already spotted him.

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「うなあぁ、理樹っ、いつからここに!?」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Unaaah. Riki, since when have you been here!?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Unaaah. Riki, since when have you been here!?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「一緒に教室出たじゃない…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝We got out of the classroom together...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝We got out of the classroom together...❞

MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Uuu...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Uuu...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ほら、レノン」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Look, there's Lennon.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Look, there's Lennon.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「こら、うっさい、よるなっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Hey, shoo shoo, guys.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Hey, shoo shoo, guys.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴は猫を払いのけながら探す。
MESSAGE.EN: Waving aside the cats, she tried to locate Lennon.
MESSAGE.Translation: Waving aside the cats, she tried to locate Lennon.

MESSAGE.JP: 僕はよしよしと撫でながら、レノンを探す。
MESSAGE.EN: Patting them on the head, I searched for him too.
MESSAGE.Translation: Patting them on the head, I searched for him too.

MESSAGE.JP: いた。
MESSAGE.EN: There he was.
MESSAGE.Translation: There he was.

MESSAGE.JP: 尻尾には…紙切れが。
MESSAGE.EN: And... he had a note on his tail.
MESSAGE.Translation: And... he had a note on his tail.

MESSAGE.JP: 達成していたんだ。
MESSAGE.EN: That meant we had achieved the previous task.
MESSAGE.Translation: That meant we had achieved the previous task.

MESSAGE.JP: 安堵感が一瞬訪れた後、また不信感が募ってくる。
MESSAGE.EN: I was relieved for just a moment, but I quickly became even more concerned.
MESSAGE.Translation: I was relieved for just a moment, but I quickly became even more concerned.

MESSAGE.JP: 次はどんな課題だ？
MESSAGE.EN: What kind of task would it be next?
MESSAGE.Translation: What kind of task would it be next?

MESSAGE.JP: また、一個人の心情を気にかけたような課題だとしたら、考え物だ。
MESSAGE.EN: I was worried that it'd be a problem concerning some individual's feelings again.
MESSAGE.Translation: I was worried that it'd be a problem concerning some individual's feelings again.

MESSAGE.JP: 生徒なんて何百人いるっていうんだ、この学校に。
MESSAGE.EN: There were hundreds of students in this school.
MESSAGE.Translation: There were hundreds of students in this school.

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴は紙切れを解くと、じっと見入る。
MESSAGE.EN: Rin opened the note and stared at it.
MESSAGE.Translation: Rin opened the note and stared at it.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「…なんて？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...What is it saying?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...What is it saying?❞

MESSAGE.JP: じれったくなって隣で膝を折り、覗き込むように訊いた。
MESSAGE.EN: I bent down next to her to take a look as I asked.
MESSAGE.Translation: I bent down next to her to take a look as I asked.

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「またわけからんのがきたな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝It's another incomprehensible task.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝It's another incomprehensible task.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 僕に登ろうとしてくる猫を撫でつつ目を通す。
MESSAGE.EN: While patting a cat trying to climb my leg, I had a look at the note.
MESSAGE.Translation: While patting a cat trying to climb my leg, I had a look at the note.

MESSAGE.JP: 『２−Ｅ３番に対しつっこめ』
MESSAGE.EN: [Perform a riposte on 2-E3.]
MESSAGE.Translation: [Perform a riposte on 2-E3.]

MESSAGE.JP: うわあ！　わけがわからない！
MESSAGE.EN: Uwaah! I had no idea what this was about!
MESSAGE.Translation: Uwaah! I had no idea what this was about!

MESSAGE.JP: 僕が体勢を崩したため、猫も驚いて逃げる。
MESSAGE.EN: I lost my balance, surprising the cat which ran away.
MESSAGE.Translation: I lost my balance, surprising the cat which ran away.

MESSAGE.JP: つっこめ？　どうして？
MESSAGE.EN: ❝A riposte... a riposte on what?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: ❝A riposte... a riposte on what?❞

MESSAGE.JP: しかも、相手はまたも特定された個人だ。
MESSAGE.EN: Furthermore, a particular individual had been specified again.
MESSAGE.Translation: Furthermore, a particular individual had been specified again.

MESSAGE.JP: 僕は呆れ返る。
MESSAGE.EN: I was completely stupefied.
MESSAGE.Translation: I was completely stupefied.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「これさ…続けるの、鈴？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Are you going to keep going, Rin?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Are you going to keep going, Rin?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「ん？　やめるのか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Hm? You wanna quit?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Hm? You wanna quit?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「いや、そうとまで言わないけど…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝No, I'm not saying that...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝No, I'm not saying that...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「なんていうんだろ…人のため、学校のためになってるとは思うけど、鈴が自分の時間をどんどん失って、損をしちゃってる気がするんだよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝But, I mean... even supposing these tasks benefit the school, you're spending all your free time on them, it feels like a waste.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝But, I mean... even supposing these tasks benefit the school, you're spending all your free time on them, it feels like a waste.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「鈴の大切な学生生活の時間が、これに費やされてしまうってことだよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Your student life is a precious time, and at this rate you'll be spending all of it on this.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Your student life is a precious time, and at this rate you'll be spending all of it on this.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「いや、そんなふうには思ってないが…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝No, I haven't thought of it like that, but...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝No, I haven't thought of it like that, but...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「理樹がいてくれて、助かってるから、理樹がいやならやめる」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝You've really helped me out. If you want to quit, I'll quit too.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝You've really helped me out. If you want to quit, I'll quit too.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 僕次第、というわけか…。
MESSAGE.EN: So somehow, it's become my decision...
MESSAGE.Translation: So somehow, it's become my decision...

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「やめよう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Let's quit.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Let's quit.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 僕はきっぱりと言った。
MESSAGE.EN: I said it with no hesitation.
MESSAGE.Translation: I said it with no hesitation.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「危険な気がするんだよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I feel like it's getting dangerous.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I feel like it's getting dangerous.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「どうしてだ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Why?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Why?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「送られてくる課題の内容が恣意的になってきてる」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝The tasks are getting more and more arbitrary.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝The tasks are getting more and more arbitrary.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「最終的には、その人は鈴を使って、誰かを困らせることになりかねない」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝He might be planning to use you to do something bad, in the end.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝He might be planning to use you to do something bad, in the end.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「そんなの嫌でしょ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝You wouldn't want that, right?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝You wouldn't want that, right?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「いやだな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝No.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝No.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「だから、ここでやめよう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝So let's end it here.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝So let's end it here.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「わかった。やめよう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Got it. Let's quit.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Got it. Let's quit.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「今回の内容を見て確信したよ。誰かのお遊びだってね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Now that I've seen this, I'm sure that the sender is just having fun at our expense.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Now that I've seen this, I'm sure that the sender is just having fun at our expense.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「鈴はつまり、そいつに踊らされていたんだよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝He's been trying to manipulate you into doing this for his own amusement.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝He's been trying to manipulate you into doing this for his own amusement.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「そう考えると、続ける気にはならないでしょ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝When looking at it like that, don't you think it'd be ridiculous to continue this?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝When looking at it like that, don't you think it'd be ridiculous to continue this?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「そーだな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝That's true.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝That's true.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「最終的にはとんでもない課題が届くかもね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I suspect the sender might give us an outrageous task at the end.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I suspect the sender might give us an outrageous task at the end.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「それに取り組む鈴の姿なんて僕は見たくないよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I don't want to see you struggling to solve it.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I don't want to see you struggling to solve it.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「そうか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Okay.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Okay.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「じゃ、やめよう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Then let's quit.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Then let's quit.❞

MESSAGE.JP: そうして、僕らの謎解きごっこは終わった。
MESSAGE.EN: We finally gave up our problem-solving game.
MESSAGE.Translation: We finally gave up our problem-solving game.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「いいよ、オーケー、とことん付き合うよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Well, it's fine, I'll see it through with you.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Well, it's fine, I'll see it through with you.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「そうか、よかった」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Really? I'm glad.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Really? I'm glad.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「たぶんあたしひとりじゃ無理だからな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝I probably couldn't do this without you.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝I probably couldn't do this without you.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「じゃあ、早速また今回の課題を考えていこうか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Then, let's figure out how to solve the new task.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Then, let's figure out how to solve the new task.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 僕は再び鈴の持つ紙切れに目を落とす。
MESSAGE.EN: I read the note again.
MESSAGE.Translation: I read the note again.

MESSAGE.JP: …『２−Ｅ３番に対しつっこめ』。
MESSAGE.EN: [Perform a riposte on 2-E3.]
MESSAGE.Translation: [Perform a riposte on 2-E3.]

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「とりあえず２−Ｅ３番が何を指すかは、前回と同じ方法でわかるよね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Well, we can easily see who the note refers to by using the method we discovered before.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Well, we can easily see who the note refers to by using the method we discovered before.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「うん、２−Ｅ組の出席番号３のやつだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Yep. It will be the student who's 3rd on the attendance list in class 2-E.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Yep. It will be the student who's 3rd on the attendance list in class 2-E.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「２年のイーサンくんだな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝It must be Iisan-kun of the second year.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝It must be Iisan-kun of the second year.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「中国人っぽいな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝That sounds like a Chinese person.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝That sounds like a Chinese person.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「なんだ、その、こいつやばい、みたいな目は」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝What is that look? You're thinking I'm crazy?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝What is that look? You're thinking I'm crazy?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「あるいは…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Or...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Or...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「前者だよっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝The former!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝The former!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「やばいのか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Am I crazy?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Am I crazy?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「２年にエーイチくんはいなかったでしょっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝There was no Eiichi-kun among the second year students, remember?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝There was no Eiichi-kun among the second year students, remember?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「ん…そうだったな。あたしがぼけていた」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Hm... That's right. I made a mistake.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Hm... That's right. I made a mistake.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「じゃ、正解は」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝The correct answer?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝The correct answer?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「２年Ｅ組出席番号３番、という意味だ」
