MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝It means the student 3rd in the attendance list in class 2-E.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝It means the student 3rd in the attendance list in class 2-E.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「そうだね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝That's right.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝That's right.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ちなみにこの時点で僕はそれが誰だかわかる」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I already know who it is, by the way.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I already know who it is, by the way.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「鈴は出席番号なんていちいち覚えてないだろうからぴんとこないだろうけど」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I don't suppose you've ever paid any attention to the attendance list.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I don't suppose you've ever paid any attention to the attendance list.❞

MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝...Who is it?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝...Who is it?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「２年Ｅ組出席番号３番は、イで始まる」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝His name starts with I.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝His name starts with I.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「井ノ原真人…あいつかっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Masato Inohara... It's him.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Masato Inohara... It's him.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「稲村真人…あいつかっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Inamura Masato... It's him.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Inamura Masato... It's him.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴は衝動的に走り出す。
MESSAGE.EN: She burst into a run.
MESSAGE.Translation: She burst into a run.

MESSAGE.JP: 僕は追いかける。
MESSAGE.EN: I followed after her.
MESSAGE.Translation: I followed after her.

MESSAGE.JP: その全力で駆ける背中を見ながら考える。
MESSAGE.EN: While I watched her back, I wondered.
MESSAGE.Translation: While I watched her back, I wondered.

MESSAGE.JP: こんなこと続けてて…
MESSAGE.EN: If we keep doing this, could it be that...
MESSAGE.Translation: If we keep doing this, could it be that...

MESSAGE.JP: いつか本当に世界の秘密なんてわかるのだろうか…。
MESSAGE.EN: ...We will really come to know the secret of the world one day...?
MESSAGE.Translation: ...We will really come to know the secret of the world one day...?

MESSAGE.JP: ひゅんっ！
MESSAGE.EN: *Whoosh*!
MESSAGE.Translation: *Whoosh*!

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「うおわっ！　なにすんだよっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Uowa! What was that about!?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Uowa! What was that about!?❞

MESSAGE.JP: すでに何かが始まっていた。
MESSAGE.EN: It had already started.
MESSAGE.Translation: It had already started.

MESSAGE.JP: `男子@「なんだ、鈴様と真人の対戦か？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Boy@❝What, Rin-sama and Masato are fighting?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Boy@❝What, Rin-sama and Masato are fighting?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「違う」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝No.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝No.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「これは、つっこみだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝This is a riposte.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝This is a riposte.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「何に対するだよっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝What against?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝What against?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「存在に対する」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Your existence.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Your existence.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴が空中で舞う。
MESSAGE.EN: Rin danced in the air.
MESSAGE.Translation: Rin danced in the air.

MESSAGE.JP: ひゅんっ！
MESSAGE.EN: *Whoosh*!
MESSAGE.Translation: *Whoosh*!

MESSAGE.JP: それを真人がぎりぎりでかわす。
MESSAGE.EN: Masato barely dodged her.
MESSAGE.Translation: Masato barely dodged her.

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「誰かっ、説明してくれっ！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Someone, explain this to me!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Someone, explain this to me!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `男子@「つまりは…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Boy@❝To put it simply...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Boy@❝To put it simply...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `男子@「井ノ原がこの世に生まれ落ちたこと、それ自体が神様のボケということだな…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Boy@❝The fact Inohara was born in this world was itself one of God's funny mistakes...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Boy@❝The fact Inohara was born in this world was itself one of God's funny mistakes...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「じゃ、神様につっこめよ！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Then, go attack God!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Then, go attack God!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「そうだな…そいつは正論だ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Yeah... You're right.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Yeah... You're right.❞

MESSAGE.JP: ぱしっ、と次なる蹴りを恭介がその手で受け止めていた。
MESSAGE.EN: Kyousuke caught Rin's next kick with his hand.
MESSAGE.Translation: Kyousuke caught Rin's next kick with his hand.

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「やめろ、鈴」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Stop it, Rin.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Stop it, Rin.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「ふぅ…恭介、助かったぜ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Phew... Kyousuke, you saved me...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Phew... Kyousuke, you saved me...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「聞いた話だと、鈴、おまえ謙吾にも一方的にしかけたらしいじゃないか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Rin, I've heard you attacked Kengo unilaterally as well, like you did to Masato right now.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Rin, I've heard you attacked Kengo unilaterally as well, like you did to Masato right now.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「なんだ、オレたちを闇討ちして回ってんのか、おまえら!?」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝What, are you guys trying to kill us with sneak attacks!?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝What, are you guys trying to kill us with sneak attacks!?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「その黒幕が…幼なじみの…鈴おまえなのか…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝And the mastermind is... the childhood friend, Rin?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝And the mastermind is... the childhood friend, Rin?❞

MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Heh...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Heh...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「そうだ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Yes...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Yes...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「おまえも…ここで死ね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝And you have to die... right here.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝And you have to die... right here.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「いや、そんな悪のりしてないで否定していこうよ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Wait, don't get carried away with the flow...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Wait, don't get carried away with the flow...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「鈴、バトルにはルールがあるだろ？　それ無視したら駄目だぞ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Rin, don't forget the battle rules. You have to follow them.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Rin, don't forget the battle rules. You have to follow them.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「これはバトルじゃない」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝This is not a battle.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝This is not a battle.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「じゃ、なんなんだ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝What is it then?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝What is it then?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「復讐だ…殺す」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝It's a revenge... I'm killing him.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝It's a revenge... I'm killing him.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「いやいや、違うでしょ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝No no. It's not like that at all.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝No no. It's not like that at all.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「目的を思い出してよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Remember our actual purpose.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Remember our actual purpose.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「ああ、つっこみだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝I know. I'm supposed to make a riposte.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝I know. I'm supposed to make a riposte.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「つっこみだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝A riposte.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝A riposte.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「…何に対する」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝...Against what?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝...Against what?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「真人に対する」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Against Masato.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Against Masato.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「真人の何に対する」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝What of Masato, be clearer.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝What of Masato, be clearer.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「存在に対する」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Against his existence.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Against his existence.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「わけわかんねぇよっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝What the heck are you talking about?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝What the heck are you talking about?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「じゃあなんだ、謙吾にも存在に対してつっこむために、闇討ちしたのかっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝So the reason why you tried to attack Kengo was to make a riposte against his existence too, huh?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝So the reason why you tried to attack Kengo was to make a riposte against his existence too, huh?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「あいつは強すぎるからだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝No. I did it because he's too strong.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝No. I did it because he's too strong.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「うおおぉぉぉおおぉーーっ、あいつは強すぎるからで、オレは存在自体がボケだから…んな屈辱あるかあぁぁああーーーっっ!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Uooooooooooooooo! She said he was too strong, while my existence is just a joke... what is this humiliation!!??❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Uooooooooooooooo! She said he was too strong, while my existence is just a joke... what is this humiliation!!??❞

MESSAGE.JP: ぶちぶちぶちっ…
MESSAGE.EN: *Pluck*pluck*pluck*.
MESSAGE.Translation: *Pluck*pluck*pluck*.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「うわぁ、あまりの屈辱に真人が自分の髪の毛を自ら引きちぎってる…！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Oh no, it was too big a disgrace for Masato, he started tearing out his hair...!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Oh no, it was too big a disgrace for Masato, he started tearing out his hair...!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「誰か止めてあげてっ！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Somebody stop him!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Somebody stop him!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「ま、落ち着け、真人」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Just calm down, Masato.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Just calm down, Masato.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「確かにおまえは天然ボケの塊のような存在だからな、そうともとれるだろう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝It can't be helped, since your existence is certainly silly by nature.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝It can't be helped, since your existence is certainly silly by nature.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「でもな、俺はおまえのそういうボケたところは結構好きだぞ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝But you know, I like that silly aspect of your personality.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝But you know, I like that silly aspect of your personality.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「強さとか、たくましさとか、そういうところに魅力を感じてくれよ！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝I want you guys to be attracted to my strength, bravery or something like that!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝I want you guys to be attracted to my strength, bravery or something like that!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「どーでもいい」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝That's all the same to me.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝That's all the same to me.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「うん、どーでもいいな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Yep, all the same.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Yep, all the same.❞

MESSAGE.JP: さすが兄妹だ！
MESSAGE.EN: They really are brother and sister!
MESSAGE.Translation: They really are brother and sister!

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「でもな、鈴。今の真人はボケてなかったんだろ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝But Rin. Did Masato say or do anything funny just now?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝But Rin. Did Masato say or do anything funny just now?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「ボケていた」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Yes, he did.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Yes, he did.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「ボケてねぇよ！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝No, I didn't!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝No, I didn't!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「眉毛が目の下にあった」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝He had his eyebrows under his eyes.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝He had his eyebrows under his eyes.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「ありえねぇボケをねつ造するなよっ！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝As if that could be! Don't fake it!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝As if that could be! Don't fake it!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「そうだな、鈴。嘘はよくないぞ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝He's right, Rin. You shouldn't lie.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝He's right, Rin. You shouldn't lie.❞

MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Uu...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Uu...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「だから、鈴。意味もなく蹴るな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Don't kick people without a reason.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Don't kick people without a reason.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「そして、ツッコミだったら、ちゃんと訂正を口にしてツッコめ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝You need to have something to jab at when you make your riposte.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝You need to have something to jab at when you make your riposte.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「じゃないと、単なる暴力に見えるぞ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Otherwise, what you're doing is considered just ordinary violence.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Otherwise, what you're doing is considered just ordinary violence.❞

MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Uu...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Uu...❞

MESSAGE.JP: さすが恭介だ。
MESSAGE.EN: Good going, Kyousuke.
MESSAGE.Translation: Good going, Kyousuke.

MESSAGE.JP: 真人と鈴の、二大話が噛み合わない子を前に説き伏せている。
MESSAGE.EN: He perfectly persuaded both Masato and Rin with his words.
MESSAGE.Translation: He perfectly persuaded both Masato and Rin with his words.

MESSAGE.JP: 僕にもそれができたらいいのに。
MESSAGE.EN: I wish I could do it like him.
MESSAGE.Translation: I wish I could do it like him.

MESSAGE.JP: 僕にはできそうにもない芸当だ。
MESSAGE.EN: I don't think I'll ever learn that trick.
MESSAGE.Translation: I don't think I'll ever learn that trick.

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「その…ちゃんとした訂正とはなんなんだ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Well... Will you tell me how to make a proper riposte?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Well... Will you tell me how to make a proper riposte?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「それはだなぁ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝For that...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝For that...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「理樹に教えてもらえ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Ask Riki.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Ask Riki.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「えぇ!?」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Ehh!?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Ehh!?❞

MESSAGE.JP: いきなり矛先を向けられ驚く。
MESSAGE.EN: His sudden designation made me surprised.
MESSAGE.Translation: His sudden designation made me surprised.

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「理樹、真人につっこむの上手いからな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝He's great at doing that to Masato.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝He's great at doing that to Masato.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「えぇ…そんなことないと思うけど…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Ehh... I don't think so...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Ehh... I don't think so...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「おっとチャイムだな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Oh, it's the bell ringing.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Oh, it's the bell ringing.❞

MESSAGE.JP: そう言って身を翻す。
MESSAGE.EN: He turned around.
MESSAGE.Translation: He turned around.

MESSAGE.JP: ばっ！と窓の枠を掴むと、腕の筋力だけで上の教室によじのぼっていった。
MESSAGE.EN: Whoop! Taking hold of the window frame, he started climbing upward to the classroom above using his arms only.
MESSAGE.Translation: Whoop! Taking hold of the window frame, he started climbing upward to the classroom above using his arms only.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「真人、ぼけて」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Masato, do something funny.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Masato, do something funny.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「イヤだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝No.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝No.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「だよね…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I knew it...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I knew it...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「どうしたらいいんだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝What should we do?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝What should we do?❞

MESSAGE.JP: どうしよ…。
MESSAGE.EN: Well...
MESSAGE.Translation: Well...

MESSAGE.JP: 僕はとりあえず、紙切れの指令を思い出す。
MESSAGE.EN: I went over the mission written on today's note in my head.
MESSAGE.Translation: I went over the mission written on today's note in my head.

MESSAGE.JP: 前回みたいに、目的がすり替わっていないかを確かめるためだ。
MESSAGE.EN: Like last time, I tried to confirm what our exact purpose was.
MESSAGE.Translation: Like last time, I tried to confirm what our exact purpose was.

MESSAGE.JP: 『２−Ｅ３番に対しつっこめ』
MESSAGE.EN: [Perform a riposte on 2-E3.]
MESSAGE.Translation: [Perform a riposte on 2-E3.]

MESSAGE.JP: そこになんの意味があるのかはわからないが、ぶれてはいないはずだ。
MESSAGE.EN: Though I wasn't sure what significance there was in doing so, I was sure we were on the right track.
MESSAGE.Translation: Though I wasn't sure what significance there was in doing so, I was sure we were on the right track.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ちょっと来て」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Come with me.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Come with me.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴を教室の隅に連れていく。
MESSAGE.EN: I took Rin to the corner of the room.
MESSAGE.Translation: I took Rin to the corner of the room.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「しばらく真人のそばにいよう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Let's stick around Masato.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Let's stick around Masato.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「それで、真人がボケたら…これはもちろん天然ボケだね…そうしたら、僕が正しい訂正を指示するから、それを口にして鈴はつっこむ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝And when he acts silly... I mean, sillier than usual, then I'll tell you what to jab at and you'll give him the riposte.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝And when he acts silly... I mean, sillier than usual, then I'll tell you what to jab at and you'll give him the riposte.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「…わかった」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝...Got it.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝...Got it.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「あと、真人の苗字言ってみて」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Oh and, what was his family name again?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Oh and, what was his family name again?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「いなむら」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Inamura.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Inamura.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「いのはらだから、覚えてあげて」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝No, it's Inohara. Don't forget it.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝No, it's Inohara. Don't forget it.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「…わかった」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝...Got it.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝...Got it.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 休み時間。
MESSAGE.EN: Recess time.
MESSAGE.Translation: Recess time.

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「理樹っ、ちょっとこいっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Riki, come with me!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Riki, come with me!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「え、なに？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Eh, what?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Eh, what?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「なんだ、穏やかじゃないな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝What's up, you look upset.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝What's up, you look upset.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「恭介もこいっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Kyousuke, you come too.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Kyousuke, you come too.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 厄介ごとに巻き込まれそうだ…。
MESSAGE.EN: I was getting caught up in something complicated again...
MESSAGE.Translation: I was getting caught up in something complicated again...

MESSAGE.JP: 僕は今、沙耶さん以外のことは考えられない。
MESSAGE.EN: But I couldn't think about anything but Saya-san.
MESSAGE.Translation: But I couldn't think about anything but Saya-san.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ごめん、鈴。具合が悪いから、残るよ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Sorry, Rin. I don't feel well, so I'm gonna stay here...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Sorry, Rin. I don't feel well, so I'm gonna stay here...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「なんだとー、この一大事に！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝What was that? This is important!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝What was that? This is important!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「理樹には血も涙もないな！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝You're heartless, Riki!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝You're heartless, Riki!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「鬼だな！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Demon!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Demon!❞

MESSAGE.JP: いいよ、どう言われようが…。
MESSAGE.EN: It's fine. Say what you want...
MESSAGE.Translation: It's fine. Say what you want...

MESSAGE.JP: ようやく去ってくれたようだった。
MESSAGE.EN: They finally left.
MESSAGE.Translation: They finally left.

MESSAGE.JP: みんながいない教室はなんて静かなんだろう…。
MESSAGE.EN: The empty classroom was rather quiet...
MESSAGE.Translation: The empty classroom was rather quiet...

MESSAGE.JP: 僕はまた、沙耶さんのことを考え始めた。
MESSAGE.EN: I started thinking about Saya-san again.
MESSAGE.Translation: I started thinking about Saya-san again.

MESSAGE.JP: …腕を引っ張られて、鈴に付いていく。
MESSAGE.EN: ...She pulled us by the arm.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...She pulled us by the arm.

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「ふむ…？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Hmm...?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Hmm...?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「え？　なになに？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Eh? What's happening?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Eh? What's happening?❞

MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝.........❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝.........❞

MESSAGE.JP: なんか、大所帯に。
MESSAGE.EN: Somehow, everyone turned up.
MESSAGE.Translation: Somehow, everyone turned up.

MESSAGE.JP: 結構結束力あるのかも…。
MESSAGE.EN: Maybe it's just how tight the bonds we share are...
MESSAGE.Translation: Maybe it's just how tight the bonds we share are...

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「見ろっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Look at that.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Look at that.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 部室の中を指差す。
MESSAGE.EN: She pointed inside our clubroom.
MESSAGE.Translation: She pointed inside our clubroom.

MESSAGE.JP: 天井からモンペチ生タイプ（ビニール袋入り）がぶら下がっていた。
MESSAGE.EN: We saw a plastic bag filled with fresh-type Mon Petits hanging from the ceiling.
MESSAGE.Translation: We saw a plastic bag filled with fresh-type Mon Petits hanging from the ceiling.

MESSAGE.JP: ちなみに生タイプは、缶詰のものより高級だ。
MESSAGE.EN: By the way, the fresh kind is more high-class than the canned ones.
MESSAGE.Translation: By the way, the fresh kind is more high-class than the canned ones.

MESSAGE.JP: `猫@「みゃーみゃー」
MESSAGE.EN: `Cat@❝Meow meow.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Cat@❝Meow meow.❞

MESSAGE.JP: そして、その下でもの欲しそうにぐるぐると円を描く鈴の猫。
MESSAGE.EN: There were cats circling around under the bag.
MESSAGE.Translation: There were cats circling around under the bag.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「ううっ、これは永久に手に入らないモンペチの図…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Uuu, they'll never be able to get the Mon Petits...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Uuu, they'll never be able to get the Mon Petits...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「そうだ。ものすごい悪意を感じるいたずらだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Yes. I suspect somebody did this in terrible malice.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Yes. I suspect somebody did this in terrible malice.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「誰だっ、こんなかわいそうなことをしたやつはっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Who on earth did such a ruthless thing to my poor cats!?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Who on earth did such a ruthless thing to my poor cats!?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「きっとずーっとこうして欲しがってたんだぞっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Those cats must've been waiting like this for a long time.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Those cats must've been waiting like this for a long time.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「確かに、これはちょっとひどいね…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Yeah, that's pretty awful...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Yeah, that's pretty awful...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「とりあえず降ろすか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝I'll pull it down.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝I'll pull it down.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「あ、うん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Ah, yeah.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Ah, yeah.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介が天井に結わえられている紐を解き、僕がその落ちてきたモンペチをキャッチした。
MESSAGE.EN: Kyousuke untied the string with which the bag of Mon Petits was hung on the ceiling, and I caught it as it fell.
MESSAGE.Translation: Kyousuke untied the string with which the bag of Mon Petits was hung on the ceiling, and I caught it as it fell.

MESSAGE.JP: …モンペチを手に持つと、猫が足元にくっついてきた。
MESSAGE.EN: ...The cats immediately clung to my feet.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...The cats immediately clung to my feet.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「よっぽど欲しかったんだろうね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝They really seem to want that.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝They really seem to want that.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「そういえば…井ノ原さんが何かヒモを調達しているところを見かけましたが」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝Speaking of which... I saw Inohara-san with a piece of rope or something in his hands.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝Speaking of which... I saw Inohara-san with a piece of rope or something in his hands.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「え、真人が？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝What, Masato?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝What, Masato?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人が悪意でこんなことやるとは思えないんだけど…。
MESSAGE.EN: It's hard to imagine that he would've done this...
MESSAGE.Translation: It's hard to imagine that he would've done this...

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「あいつか…今度ばかりは本気で怒ったぞ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝That guy... now I'm totally pissed off.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝That guy... now I'm totally pissed off.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「真人めっ、ぶっ飛ばしてやるっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Masato, you bastard, I'LL BLOW YOUR HEAD OFF!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Masato, you bastard, I'LL BLOW YOUR HEAD OFF!❞

MESSAGE.JP: …穏やかじゃない言葉を口走る。
MESSAGE.EN: ...She started shouting in rage.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...She started shouting in rage.

MESSAGE.JP: 本気で怒ってるんだなぁ…。
MESSAGE.EN: Looks like she's totally blown her lid...
MESSAGE.Translation: Looks like she's totally blown her lid...

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「鈴君、女の子があまり『ぶっ飛ばす』などというものではないぞ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Rin-kun, you are a girl, so you shouldn't say things like ❛I'LL BLOW YOUR HEAD OFF.❜❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Rin-kun, you are a girl, so you shouldn't say things like ❛I'LL BLOW YOUR HEAD OFF.❜❞

MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Hm...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Hm...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「キミはもう少しスマートな言葉を使うべきだな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝You need to choose your words a little better.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝You need to choose your words a little better.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 諭すように言う。
MESSAGE.EN: She admonished her.
MESSAGE.Translation: She admonished her.

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「うぅ…そうなのか…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Uu... Okay...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Uu... Okay...❞

MESSAGE.JP: …鈴は来ヶ谷さんが苦手みたいだし、聞き入れてくれるようだ。
MESSAGE.EN: ...Rin wasn't good at dealing with Kurugaya-san, so she couldn't talk back to her.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...Rin wasn't good at dealing with Kurugaya-san, so she couldn't talk back to her.

MESSAGE.JP: そういうところはさすがに、『姉御』の貫禄なんだろう。
MESSAGE.EN: It must've really been Kurugaya-san's ❛big sister❜ presence rather than her words that persuaded Rin.
MESSAGE.Translation: It must've really been Kurugaya-san's ❛big sister❜ presence rather than her words that persuaded Rin.

MESSAGE.JP: 僕としても、鈴にはあんまり物騒な言葉は使って欲しくないところだし…。
MESSAGE.EN: I also didn't want Rin to use those kind of violent words...
MESSAGE.Translation: I also didn't want Rin to use those kind of violent words...

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「スマートに『ブッ殺した』なら使っていい」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝I allow you to shout ❛I WILL SLAY YOU❜ instead.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝I allow you to shout ❛I WILL SLAY YOU❜ instead.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「えぇーっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Ehhh.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Ehhh.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 来ヶ谷さんのスマートの感覚がよくわからない…。
MESSAGE.EN: I didn't understand Kurugaya-san's standards if that was her idea of a good choice of words...
MESSAGE.Translation: I didn't understand Kurugaya-san's standards if that was her idea of a good choice of words...

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「よくわからんがわかった」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝I don't really get it but I've got it.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝I don't really get it but I've got it.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「いやいや来ヶ谷さんも言ってることむちゃくちゃだし、鈴もそれ全然わかってないってことだから」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝No, no. Kurugaya-san, you're saying something outrageous again, and Rin, that means you didn't get it at all.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝No, no. Kurugaya-san, you're saying something outrageous again, and Rin, that means you didn't get it at all.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「過去形にすればいいんだろう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Shouldn't it be fine if I say it in the past tense?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Shouldn't it be fine if I say it in the past tense?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「真人めっ、ぶっ殺したっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Masato, you bastard, I SLAYED YOU!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Masato, you bastard, I SLAYED YOU!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「別にまだ真人を殺してないし…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝You didn't kill him yet...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝You didn't kill him yet...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「そうだな…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝You're right...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝You're right...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「真人めっ、ぶっ殺したかったっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Masato, you bastard, I WANTED TO SLAY YOU.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Masato, you bastard, I WANTED TO SLAY YOU.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「どうだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝What about that?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝What about that?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 自慢げにこっちをみる。
MESSAGE.EN: She faced me with a proud look.
MESSAGE.Translation: She faced me with a proud look.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「いや、間違ってはいないけど…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝That isn't incorrect, but...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝That isn't incorrect, but...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「じゃあ、こうしたらどうですかネ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Then, how about this one!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Then, how about this one!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 葉留佳さんが鈴に耳打ちをする。
MESSAGE.EN: Haruka-san whispered something in Rin's ear.
MESSAGE.Translation: Haruka-san whispered something in Rin's ear.

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「真人めっ、ブッ殺したかったあの日の夏っ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Masato, you bastard, I WANTED TO SLAY YOU ON THAT SUMMER DAY!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Masato, you bastard, I WANTED TO SLAY YOU ON THAT SUMMER DAY!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「いやまだ夏前だし…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝It's still spring, you know...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝It's still spring, you know...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「イン・トーキョーもつけましょう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝Why don't you add ❛in Tokyo❜?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝Why don't you add ❛in Tokyo❜?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「東京でもないけどさ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝We're not in Tokyo, either...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝We're not in Tokyo, either...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「真人めっ、ブッ殺したかったあの日の夏・イン・トーキョーっ!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Masato, you bastard, I WANTED TO SLAY YOU ON THAT SUMMER DAY IN TOKYO!!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Masato, you bastard, I WANTED TO SLAY YOU ON THAT SUMMER DAY IN TOKYO!!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「こうなると真人じゃ迫力がいまいちだな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Hmm, I don't think ❛Masato❜ has enough impact here.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Hmm, I don't think ❛Masato❜ has enough impact here.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「ドラスティックに変えよう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Let's change it to ❛drastic❜ instead.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Let's change it to ❛drastic❜ instead.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「ドラスティックにブッ殺したかったあの日の夏・イン・トーキョーっ!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝I DRASTICALLY WANTED TO SLAY YOU ON THAT SUMMER DAY IN TOKYO!!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝I DRASTICALLY WANTED TO SLAY YOU ON THAT SUMMER DAY IN TOKYO!!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「なにに怒っていたのかわからなくなったじゃないか…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝I lost track of what I was supposed to be angry about...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝I lost track of what I was supposed to be angry about...❞

MESSAGE.JP: とりあえず、怒りを静めることには成功したらしい。
MESSAGE.EN: Seems like we had succeeded in making her calm down, for now.
MESSAGE.Translation: Seems like we had succeeded in making her calm down, for now.

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「なんだ？　なにやってんだ、みんなして」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Hey? What are you all doing?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Hey? What are you all doing?❞

MESSAGE.JP: ちょうど真人が顔を出してきた。
MESSAGE.EN: Just then, Masato appeared.
MESSAGE.Translation: Just then, Masato appeared.

MESSAGE.JP: ばきぃぃいっ!!
MESSAGE.EN: *WHAM*!!!
MESSAGE.Translation: *WHAM*!!!

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴のハイキックが炸裂!!
MESSAGE.EN: Rin's high kick exploded in his face!!
MESSAGE.Translation: Rin's high kick exploded in his face!!

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「うぉふっ！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Uofu!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Uofu!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 瞬時に怒りが復活していた!!
MESSAGE.EN: He instantly revived her anger!!
MESSAGE.Translation: He instantly revived her anger!!

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「なにしやがるっ、てめぇーっ!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝What the hell are you doing, you bastard!!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝What the hell are you doing, you bastard!!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「ドラスティックにブッ殺したかったあの日の夏・イン・トーキョーっ!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝I DRASTICALLY WANTED TO SLAY YOU ON THAT SUMMER DAY IN TOKYO!!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝I DRASTICALLY WANTED TO SLAY YOU ON THAT SUMMER DAY IN TOKYO!!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「なにひとつ、意味がわからねぇよ!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝I don't get what you are saying at all!!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝I don't get what you are saying at all!!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「まあ鈴、落ち着きなよ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Rin, just calm down...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Rin, just calm down...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「おちつけるかぼけーっ!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝You think I can, stupid!!!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝You think I can, stupid!!!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「これ、ほんとに真人がやったの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Masato, did you really do this?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Masato, did you really do this?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「あぁ…？　モンペチか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Ah...? About the Mon Petits?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Ah...? About the Mon Petits?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「うん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Yeah.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Yeah.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「消費期限見てみろ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Check out their expiration date.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Check out their expiration date.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「え」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Eh.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Eh.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 手元のモンペチの裏をみる。
MESSAGE.EN: I looked on the backside of the Mon Petit.
MESSAGE.Translation: I looked on the backside of the Mon Petit.

MESSAGE.JP: …消費期限からすでに三週間は経過していた。
MESSAGE.EN: ...They were already three weeks past their expiration date.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...They were already three weeks past their expiration date.

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「んな傷んだもん、食わせるわけにもいかねぇだろうが…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝They had already gone bad, I couldn't let the cats eat them...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝They had already gone bad, I couldn't let the cats eat them...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「なんかしらねぇが、どっかに捨てに行こうと思っても、ずっと追っかけてくんだよ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝I don't know why, but those cats started chasing me when I went to throw those Mon Petits away...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝I don't know why, but those cats started chasing me when I went to throw those Mon Petits away...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「その辺に置いといたら、勝手に開けて食っちまいそうだったしな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝So I needed to put them somewhere they couldn't reach.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝So I needed to put them somewhere they couldn't reach.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「あ、そうだったんだ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Ah, so that's it...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Ah, so that's it...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「なるほど、それが事の真相か」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝All right. The truth has been unveiled.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝All right. The truth has been unveiled.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「へっ、まあ、ちょいとオレも心が痛んだがな…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Heh, well, it was really paining my heart...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Heh, well, it was really paining my heart...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「ったく、いやしんぼな猫だぜ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Sheesh, these sure are some gluttonous cats.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Sheesh, these sure are some gluttonous cats.❞

MESSAGE.JP: ばきいっ!!
MESSAGE.EN: *WHAM*!!!
MESSAGE.Translation: *WHAM*!!!

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「おまえのほうがいやしいんじゃぼけぇーーっ!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝You are way more gluttonous than them, dimwit!!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝You are way more gluttonous than them, dimwit!!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「うぉおおぉぉーーーっ!!　せっかくカッコよく決めたのにぃーーっ!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Uoooooo!! My long-awaited moment of coolness!!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Uoooooo!! My long-awaited moment of coolness!!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ま、待ってよ鈴、真人は別に悪いことしたわけじゃ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Wait a minute, Rin. It's not like he did something bad...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Wait a minute, Rin. It's not like he did something bad...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「おまえのほうが優しいんじゃぼけぇーーっ!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝You are way kinder than them, dimwit!!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝You are way kinder than them, dimwit!!❞

MESSAGE.JP: ばきいっ!!
MESSAGE.EN: *WHAM*!
MESSAGE.Translation: *WHAM*!

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「なんで蹴られんだぁーっ!!　納得いかねええぇーーーっ!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Why did she kick me!! I don't get iiiit!!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Why did she kick me!! I don't get iiiit!!❞

MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝...Humph.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝...Humph.❞

MESSAGE.JP: なんていうか、素直じゃないよなぁ、鈴は…。
MESSAGE.EN: She really is a stubborn one...
MESSAGE.Translation: She really is a stubborn one...

MESSAGE.JP: `猫@「みゃーみゃー」
MESSAGE.EN: `Cat@❝Meow meow.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Cat@❝Meow meow.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「みゃーじゃないの。これはおなか壊すから食べちゃダメ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝No meowing. You can't have this. You'll get a tummy ache.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝No meowing. You can't have this. You'll get a tummy ache.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `猫@「みゃう～ん…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Cat@❝Meooow.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Cat@❝Meooow.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「めったら、めっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝You can't, okay?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝You can't, okay?❞

MESSAGE.JP: …よっぽどモンペチが好きなのか、猫は相変らずモンペチのほうへまとわり付いてきていた。
MESSAGE.EN: ...But still the cats were reaching for the Mon Petits, they must really love them.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...But still the cats were reaching for the Mon Petits, they must really love them.

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「困った…理樹、どうしたらいい」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Oh no... Riki, what should I do?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Oh no... Riki, what should I do?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「うーん、新しく同じの持ってくるしかないかなぁ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Hmm, I guess there's nothing you can do but to get them new ones.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Hmm, I guess there's nothing you can do but to get them new ones.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「うむ、こんなこともあろうかと、まったく同じものを用意しておいた」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝I thought something like this might happen, so I already have them prepared.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝I thought something like this might happen, so I already have them prepared.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「さすが姉御っスネっ！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝As expected of Anego!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝As expected of Anego!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「さあ、モリモリ食べるといい」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Here. Eat a lot.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Here. Eat a lot.❞

MESSAGE.JP: さらに紙皿を用意すると、来ヶ谷さんはそこにモンペチをあけていく。
MESSAGE.EN: She produced a paper plate as well and put the Mon Petits on it.
MESSAGE.Translation: She produced a paper plate as well and put the Mon Petits on it.

MESSAGE.JP: 四次元ポケットでも持ってるんだろうか、この人は。
MESSAGE.EN: Does she have four-dimensional pockets or something?
MESSAGE.Translation: Does she have four-dimensional pockets or something?

MESSAGE.JP: とりあえず、それで問題は解決したようだ。
MESSAGE.EN: Anyway, the problem seems to have been resolved now.
MESSAGE.Translation: Anyway, the problem seems to have been resolved now.

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「え…オレ、ただ蹴られただけかよ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Eh... Why did I get kicked...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Eh... Why did I get kicked...❞

MESSAGE.JP: まあ、真人は運が悪かったということで。
MESSAGE.EN: Well, looks like today is your unlucky day, Masato.
MESSAGE.Translation: Well, looks like today is your unlucky day, Masato.

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「やじゃ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝No.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝No.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴は悪のりせず拒んでみせた。
MESSAGE.EN: She refused Kurugaya-san without getting carried away.
MESSAGE.Translation: She refused Kurugaya-san without getting carried away.

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「ならば言葉遣いには気をつけるんだな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Mind what you say, then.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Mind what you say, then.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「うぅ…わかった…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Uu... Got it...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Uu... Got it...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「でも、真人がそんな悪さするかな…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝But, I can't imagine Masato doing something like that...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝But, I can't imagine Masato doing something like that...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「馬鹿なことばっかしてるけど、人並みに思いやりはあるはずなんだけど…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Though he usually does stupid things, he's pretty considerate of other people...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Though he usually does stupid things, he's pretty considerate of other people...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「そうしないとならなかったとか…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Maybe there was some reason he had to do this...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Maybe there was some reason he had to do this...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「なんだ？　これがモンペチ以外の意味でもあるのか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝What? You think there's another reason for those Mon Petits?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝What? You think there's another reason for those Mon Petits?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「うん。何かない？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Yeah. Can you check them out?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Yeah. Can you check them out?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 僕の言葉に応えて、鈴がモンペチを調べ始める。
MESSAGE.EN: In response to my words, Rin started examining the Mon Petits.
MESSAGE.Translation: In response to my words, Rin started examining the Mon Petits.

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「消費期限が切れてる…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝This is expired...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝This is expired...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「もう三週間も経過してる…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝It's three weeks past its expiration date.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝It's three weeks past its expiration date.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「これで別の意味が生まれたね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝That gives a new meaning to them, doesn't it?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝That gives a new meaning to them, doesn't it?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「食べてはいけないモンペチか…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Inedible Mon Petits...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Inedible Mon Petits...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「多分、猫が欲しがったんだろうけど、真人なりに考えて届かないように吊っておいたんだよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I'm just guessing, but maybe those cats tried to eat them, and then Masato hung them out of reach.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I'm just guessing, but maybe those cats tried to eat them, and then Masato hung them out of reach.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「なるほど…正反対だったんだな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝I see... It's the total opposite.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝I see... It's the total opposite.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「真人を蹴ってしまうところだった」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝I was about to kick him.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝I was about to kick him.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「気づけてよかったね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝No problem, since you already realized it in time.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝No problem, since you already realized it in time.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「じゃよし、新しいモンペチを取りにいこう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝All right, I'll go and get new Mon Petits.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝All right, I'll go and get new Mon Petits.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「行ってくる。みんなは教室に戻っていてくれ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝I'm leaving. You can all go back to the classroom.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝I'm leaving. You can all go back to the classroom.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 猫たちを率いて、鈴は走り去っていった。
MESSAGE.EN: With the cats trailing after her, she left the clubroom.
MESSAGE.Translation: With the cats trailing after her, she left the clubroom.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「じゃーほんとにもうやることもないみたいだし、戻ろっか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Well, there's nothing to do here anymore. Let's get moving.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Well, there's nothing to do here anymore. Let's get moving.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「あ、うん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Uh, yeah.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Uh, yeah.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴、授業までに戻ってこれるかな…。
MESSAGE.EN: I wonder if Rin will come back by the next class...
MESSAGE.Translation: I wonder if Rin will come back by the next class...

MESSAGE.JP: 二時間目の授業も終わり、休み時間に。
MESSAGE.EN: The second period was over, and it was recess time.
MESSAGE.Translation: The second period was over, and it was recess time.

MESSAGE.JP: 早速鈴が立ち上がり、僕の隣までやってくる。
MESSAGE.EN: Rin quickly stood up and came up to me.
MESSAGE.Translation: Rin quickly stood up and came up to me.

MESSAGE.JP: そして、真人を見た。
MESSAGE.EN: She was looking at Masato.
MESSAGE.Translation: She was looking at Masato.

MESSAGE.JP: 真人のほうも鈴に気づくが、これといった反応は示さない。
MESSAGE.EN: Masato noticed her, but didn't give any reaction.
MESSAGE.Translation: Masato noticed her, but didn't give any reaction.

MESSAGE.JP: あくびをしながら、ぼさぼさの後頭部を掻く。
MESSAGE.EN: He scratched the back of his head with a yawn.
MESSAGE.Translation: He scratched the back of his head with a yawn.

MESSAGE.JP: それから思い出したように立ち上がり、席を離れた。
MESSAGE.EN: Finally, he seemed to realize something and left his desk.
MESSAGE.Translation: Finally, he seemed to realize something and left his desk.

MESSAGE.JP: 僕たちもその後に続く。
MESSAGE.EN: We ran after him.
MESSAGE.Translation: We ran after him.

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「なんだよ、てめぇら…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝What is it, guys...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝What is it, guys...❞

MESSAGE.JP: すぐ足を止めて、振り返る。
MESSAGE.EN: He stopped at once and turned around to us.
MESSAGE.Translation: He stopped at once and turned around to us.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「いや、いいじゃん。幼なじみなんだし、一緒にいても」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Hey, come on. We are childhood friends, it's natural to be together.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Hey, come on. We are childhood friends, it's natural to be together.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「そりゃいいけどよ…無言でついてこられると不気味だぜ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝That's fine, but... why are you guys following me in silence? It's creeping me out...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝That's fine, but... why are you guys following me in silence? It's creeping me out...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「へんなことすんなよ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Don't do anything weird, okay?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Don't do anything weird, okay?❞

MESSAGE.JP: へんなことじゃない。正当なるツッコミだ。
MESSAGE.EN: It's nothing weird. Just a legitimate riposte.
MESSAGE.Translation: It's nothing weird. Just a legitimate riposte.

MESSAGE.JP: …多分。
MESSAGE.EN: ...Maybe.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...Maybe.

MESSAGE.JP: 販売機の前で立ち止まる。
MESSAGE.EN: He stopped in front of a vending machine.
MESSAGE.Translation: He stopped in front of a vending machine.

MESSAGE.JP: どうやらジュースを買いにきたようだ。
MESSAGE.EN: He was going to get a soft drink.
MESSAGE.Translation: He was going to get a soft drink.

MESSAGE.JP: 種類に迷っている間に、後ろに別の生徒が並び始める。
MESSAGE.EN: While he was wondering which one to buy, students started to form a line behind him.
MESSAGE.Translation: While he was wondering which one to buy, students started to form a line behind him.

MESSAGE.JP: 眠いのか、それにも気づかず、頭を掻きながら迷い続ける。
MESSAGE.EN: He didn't notice it at all and kept hesitating, scratching his head.
MESSAGE.Translation: He didn't notice it at all and kept hesitating, scratching his head.

MESSAGE.JP: ようやくこれと決めてボタンを押す。
MESSAGE.EN: He finally made his decision, and pushed a button.
MESSAGE.Translation: He finally made his decision, and pushed a button.

MESSAGE.JP: 音もせず…何も出てこない。
MESSAGE.EN: There was no sound... Nothing came out.
MESSAGE.Translation: There was no sound... Nothing came out.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「鈴、準備しといて。ツッコミどころが来そうだから」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Rin, get yourself ready. I think a chance is coming.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Rin, get yourself ready. I think a chance is coming.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「もし理樹からの助言がなかったら、普通に蹴っていいのか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝If I don't get your advice, then can I kick him like always?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝If I don't get your advice, then can I kick him like always?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「いや、できるだけ我慢してよ。僕もすぐには浮かばないかもしれないから」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝No, resist as long as you can. It may take a moment to come up with the proper comment.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝No, resist as long as you can. It may take a moment to come up with the proper comment.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「わかった、我慢してみる」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Okay, I will.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Okay, I will.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人は何度もカバーを開けたりして確認している。
MESSAGE.EN: Masato opened the can slot cover and peered inside repeatedly to make sure.
MESSAGE.Translation: Masato opened the can slot cover and peered inside repeatedly to make sure.

MESSAGE.JP: 後ろの生徒たちも覗き込んでいる。
MESSAGE.EN: The other students were also peeking from behind him.
MESSAGE.Translation: The other students were also peeking from behind him.

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「おっと、金いれてなかったや」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Oops, I didn't insert any coins.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Oops, I didn't insert any coins.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 今だ！
MESSAGE.EN: It's time!
MESSAGE.Translation: It's time!

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「おまえらはＥＸＩＬＥか!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝ARE YOU THE EXILE!!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝ARE YOU THE EXILE!!❞

MESSAGE.JP: ばきぃ！
MESSAGE.EN: *WHAM*!
MESSAGE.Translation: *WHAM*!

MESSAGE.JP: `生徒@「うわぁ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Student@❝Oh no...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Student@❝Oh no...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真後ろで見ていた生徒たちが引いている。
MESSAGE.EN: The students right behind Masato stood back.
MESSAGE.Translation: The students right behind Masato stood back.

MESSAGE.JP: `生徒@「いや、偶然ＥＸＩＬＥみたいになっただけで、別に踊ってたわけじゃ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Student@❝No, it's only a coincidence if we look like EXILE... we weren't even dancing...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Student@❝No, it's only a coincidence if we look like EXILE... we weren't even dancing...❞

MESSAGE.JP: ＭＩＳＳ!!
MESSAGE.EN: MISS!!
MESSAGE.Translation: MISS!!

MESSAGE.JP: しまったあぁ…ＥＸＩＬＥはなかった…。
MESSAGE.EN: Oh my god... EXILE was a total miss...
MESSAGE.Translation: Oh my god... EXILE was a total miss...

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「邪魔だろ!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝YOU ARE IN THEIR WAY!!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝YOU ARE IN THEIR WAY!!❞

MESSAGE.JP: ばきぃ！
MESSAGE.EN: *WHAM*!
MESSAGE.Translation: *WHAM*!

MESSAGE.JP: `生徒@「うわぁ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Student@❝Oh no...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Student@❝Oh no...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真後ろで見ていた生徒が一瞬引いたが…
MESSAGE.EN: Although the students right behind Masato took a step back...
MESSAGE.Translation: Although the students right behind Masato took a step back...

MESSAGE.JP: 僕たちの関係を知っているのだろう、ありがとうと、鈴に礼を言ってくれた。
MESSAGE.EN: They seemed to be familiar with our relationship, and gave thanks to Rin.
MESSAGE.Translation: They seemed to be familiar with our relationship, and gave thanks to Rin.

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「おまえはおじいさんか!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝ARE YOU AN OLD MAN!!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝ARE YOU AN OLD MAN!!❞

MESSAGE.JP: ばきぃ！
MESSAGE.EN: *WHAM*!
MESSAGE.Translation: *WHAM*!

MESSAGE.JP: 真後ろで見ていた生徒たちが引いている。
MESSAGE.EN: The students right behind Masato were drawing back.
MESSAGE.Translation: The students right behind Masato were drawing back.

MESSAGE.JP: ＭＩＳＳ!!
MESSAGE.EN: MISS!!
MESSAGE.Translation: MISS!!

MESSAGE.JP: しまったあぁ…遠まわしすぎたか…。ツッコミとしてはアリだと思ったんだけど…。
MESSAGE.EN: Oh no... That was too indirect... Even though I thought it'd be a good riposte...
MESSAGE.Translation: Oh no... That was too indirect... Even though I thought it'd be a good riposte...

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「このぼけぇっ！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝You dimwit!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝You dimwit!❞

MESSAGE.JP: ばきぃ！
MESSAGE.EN: *WHAM*!
MESSAGE.Translation: *WHAM*!

MESSAGE.JP: ＭＩＳＳ!!
MESSAGE.EN: MISS!!
MESSAGE.Translation: MISS!!

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「いやいや、今ぜんっぜん我慢してなかったよねぇ!?」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝No, no, you didn't resist at all, did you!?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝No, no, you didn't resist at all, did you!?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「かなり待ったぞ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Didn't I wait long enough?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Didn't I wait long enough?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「いやいや高速でしたから…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝No, no, you were faster than the lightning...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝No, no, you were faster than the lightning...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「次はもうちょっと待ってくれない？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Can you wait a little longer next time?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Can you wait a little longer next time?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「さらにか…難しいががんばってみよう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Longer... Sounds tough, but I'll do my best.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Longer... Sounds tough, but I'll do my best.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「次はひとりでできそう？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Do you still need my help?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Do you still need my help?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「うーん、難しいな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Hmm, it's difficult.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Hmm, it's difficult.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「あ、そ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Okay...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Okay...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 要領を得るまでの道のりは長そうだ…。
MESSAGE.EN: We still seem to have a long road ahead of us...
MESSAGE.Translation: We still seem to have a long road ahead of us...

MESSAGE.JP: 二時間目の授業も終わり、休み時間に。
MESSAGE.EN: The second class was over. It was recess time.
MESSAGE.Translation: The second class was over. It was recess time.

MESSAGE.JP: さて、そろそろいこうかな。
MESSAGE.EN: All right, I think I'll go somewhere.
MESSAGE.Translation: All right, I think I'll go somewhere.

MESSAGE.JP: そうだな。休んでおこう…。
MESSAGE.EN: I think I'll rest for a bit...
MESSAGE.Translation: I think I'll rest for a bit...

MESSAGE.JP: 昼休みになった。
MESSAGE.EN: It was lunch time.
MESSAGE.Translation: It was lunch time.

MESSAGE.JP: 昼休みになった。
MESSAGE.EN: It was lunch time.
MESSAGE.Translation: It was lunch time.

MESSAGE.JP: 学食へ行こう。もしかしたらまた、沙耶さんに会えるかもしれない。
MESSAGE.EN: I'll go to the cafeteria. Maybe I'll be able to see Saya-san again.
MESSAGE.Translation: I'll go to the cafeteria. Maybe I'll be able to see Saya-san again.

MESSAGE.JP: いた。
MESSAGE.EN: There she was.
MESSAGE.Translation: There she was.

MESSAGE.JP: 心臓が飛び出す勢いで跳ねた。
MESSAGE.EN: My heart almost leaped out of my chest.
MESSAGE.Translation: My heart almost leaped out of my chest.

MESSAGE.JP: 沙耶さんは、壁にもたれて、喧噪を遠くから見ていた。
MESSAGE.EN: Saya-san was leaning against the wall, watching some commotion in the distance.
MESSAGE.Translation: Saya-san was leaning against the wall, watching some commotion in the distance.

MESSAGE.JP: 彼女が居るだけで、世界はこんなにも素晴らしく映る。
MESSAGE.EN: The world shines so brightly just illuminated by her presence.
MESSAGE.Translation: The world shines so brightly just illuminated by her presence.

MESSAGE.JP: どれだけ好きなんだ僕…。我ながら呆れてしまう。
MESSAGE.EN: Just how hard have I fallen for her...? I surprised even myself.
MESSAGE.Translation: Just how hard have I fallen for her...? I surprised even myself.

MESSAGE.JP: 僕と目が合う。
MESSAGE.EN: Our eyes met.
MESSAGE.Translation: Our eyes met.

MESSAGE.JP: すると、ふんっ、とすねたように向こうを向いてしまった。
MESSAGE.EN: When they did, she grunted and turned away.
MESSAGE.Translation: When they did, she grunted and turned away.

MESSAGE.JP: そういえば、いつの日か、勝負を挑まれて、断ったことがあったような。
MESSAGE.EN: Come to think of it, that's what she did on the day she challenged me and I refused.
MESSAGE.Translation: Come to think of it, that's what she did on the day she challenged me and I refused.

MESSAGE.JP: その時のことを怒ってるのだろうか？
MESSAGE.EN: Was she mad then?
MESSAGE.Translation: Was she mad then?

MESSAGE.JP: 僕は思い出す。ふたりでここで勝負したことを。
MESSAGE.EN: I remembered. That we'd had a bout here.
MESSAGE.Translation: I remembered. That we'd had a bout here.

MESSAGE.JP: あれはいつだったろう。つい最近のはずなのに、それは遠い思い出のように感じられた。
MESSAGE.EN: When was that? It was probably pretty recent, but it felt like forever ago.
MESSAGE.Translation: When was that? It was probably pretty recent, but it felt like forever ago.

MESSAGE.JP: あの時は楽しかった。僕らは初めて遊んだのだと思う。彼女は訓練といい張るだろうけど。
MESSAGE.EN: That was fun. I think it was the first time we had just hung out together. She'd probably called it training.
MESSAGE.Translation: That was fun. I think it was the first time we had just hung out together. She'd probably called it training.

MESSAGE.JP: 僕は彼女の元まで歩いていく。
MESSAGE.EN: I walked over to her.
MESSAGE.Translation: I walked over to her.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「こんにちは、沙耶さん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Hello, Saya-san.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Hello, Saya-san.❞

MESSAGE.JP: …無視を決め込まれる。
MESSAGE.EN: ...She decided to ignore me.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...She decided to ignore me.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「沙耶さん？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Saya-san?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Saya-san?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 反対側に回って、面と向かって言う。
MESSAGE.EN: I went around her and said it to her face.
MESSAGE.Translation: I went around her and said it to her face.

MESSAGE.JP: `沙耶@「あら、理樹くんじゃない。どうしたの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saya@❝Oh, if it isn't Riki-kun. What's up?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@❝Oh, if it isn't Riki-kun. What's up?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「あのさ…怒ってる？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Are you... mad?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Are you... mad?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `沙耶@「はぁ？　何をよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saya@❝Huh? About what?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@❝Huh? About what?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「前にここで勝負しなかったこと」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝About me not accepting your challenge before.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝About me not accepting your challenge before.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `沙耶@「あ、ああ…そんなこともあったわね…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saya@❝Ah... did something like that happen...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@❝Ah... did something like that happen...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「怒ってる？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Are you mad?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Are you mad?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `沙耶@「怒るも何も、訓練をひとりでするか、ふたりでするかの違いだけじゃない。そこに感情の波風が立つとでも？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saya@❝I'm not mad. There's no difference between training alone or with someone. Is that what you were worried about?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@❝I'm not mad. There's no difference between training alone or with someone. Is that what you were worried about?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「はぁ…よかった。怒ってないんだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Haa... thank goodness. You aren't mad.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Haa... thank goodness. You aren't mad.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `沙耶@「ないわよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saya@❝Nope.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@❝Nope.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「でも僕は沙耶さんのパートナーなんだ。次こそはちゃんと勝負しなきゃね…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝But I'm your partner. I need to accept next time....❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝But I'm your partner. I need to accept next time....❞

MESSAGE.JP: `沙耶@「じゃ、今からする？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saya@❝Well, how about now?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@❝Well, how about now?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「しないけど」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝No.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝No.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `沙耶@「ルールは簡単よ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saya@❝The rules are simple.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@❝The rules are simple.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `沙耶@「え、しないの!?」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saya@❝Eh, no!?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@❝Eh, no!?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「反応おそっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝A slow reaction.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝A slow reaction.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `沙耶@「あなた、わけわからないこと言ってるわよ？　頭大丈夫？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saya@❝You aren't making any sense. Is your head okay?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@❝You aren't making any sense. Is your head okay?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「え？　なんだっけ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Eh? What was that?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Eh? What was that?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `沙耶@「やばい…こいつあほだ…更迭しなきゃ…でも、あたしの秘密知ってるし、殺しておこうかしら…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saya@❝Crap... he's an idiot... I need to find a replacement... but he knows my secrets, so I'll have to kill him...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@❝Crap... he's an idiot... I need to find a replacement... but he knows my secrets, so I'll have to kill him...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「なんで、そんな話になるわけ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝How did it turn into that?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝How did it turn into that?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `沙耶@「あなたがあほだからよ…自覚ないの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saya@❝Because you're an idiot... don't you realize that?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@❝Because you're an idiot... don't you realize that?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ある」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I do.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I do.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `沙耶@「あるんだ!?　それはそれで衝撃的よ!?」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saya@❝You do!? That's quite shocking in its own right!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@❝You do!? That's quite shocking in its own right!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `沙耶@「なに？　じゃあ、あたしをもてあそんでると、そういうわけ!?」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saya@❝What? Well, is that how it is when you toy with me!?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@❝What? Well, is that how it is when you toy with me!?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「どっちかというと、生暖かく見守ってる感じ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝If I had to choose, I'd say it feels like I'm warmly watching over you.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝If I had to choose, I'd say it feels like I'm warmly watching over you.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `沙耶@「いや…あなた、ミキサーのスイッチいれてる感じよ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saya@❝No... it's more like you've flipped the switch on a blender.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@❝No... it's more like you've flipped the switch on a blender.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「それはすごい勢いで回ってるね…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝That's some intense spinning....❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝That's some intense spinning....❞

MESSAGE.JP: `沙耶@「そうよ。んもうぐちゃぐちゃにかき回されてるの。ついていけないわ、そんな思考の人には」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saya@❝Yeah. I'm already being stirred up like crazy. I shouldn't go around with someone who thinks like that.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@❝Yeah. I'm already being stirred up like crazy. I shouldn't go around with someone who thinks like that.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「まあまあ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝My, my.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝My, my.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `沙耶@「全力でかき回しておいて、落ち着ける側に回らないでよ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saya@❝They stir with all their might, and never let you calm down...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@❝They stir with all their might, and never let you calm down...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「まあまあ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝My, my.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝My, my.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `沙耶@「一生右手使えないようにしてあげようかしら…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saya@❝Maybe I should make it so they can't use their right hand anymore...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@❝Maybe I should make it so they can't use their right hand anymore...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「まあまあ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝My, my.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝My, my.❞

MESSAGE.JP: そんなふうに、昼休みは沙耶さんと楽しく過ごしたのだった。
MESSAGE.EN: Like that, I enjoyed my lunch break with Saya-san.
MESSAGE.Translation: Like that, I enjoyed my lunch break with Saya-san.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「あのさ…待っていてくれたんだよね…？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Umm... were you waiting...?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Umm... were you waiting...?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `沙耶@「はぁ？　誰が誰をよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saya@❝Huh? Who was waiting for who?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@❝Huh? Who was waiting for who?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「それは…沙耶さんが、僕を、だけど…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝You... were waiting... for me...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝You... were waiting... for me...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「…違った？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...Am I wrong?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...Am I wrong?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 彼女は首を捻る。
MESSAGE.EN: She cocked her head.
MESSAGE.Translation: She cocked her head.

MESSAGE.JP: `沙耶@「…まぁ、そうなんだけど…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saya@❝...Well, maybe...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@❝...Well, maybe...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 言いづらそうに答えた。
MESSAGE.EN: It was hard for her to admit it.
MESSAGE.Translation: It was hard for her to admit it.

MESSAGE.JP: そんな返事が聞けるとは思いもしなかった。
MESSAGE.EN: I didn't think I'd get to hear her say that.
MESSAGE.Translation: I didn't think I'd get to hear her say that.

MESSAGE.JP: 僕は素直に喜ぶ。拳を握ってしまうほどにだ。
MESSAGE.EN: I was genuinely happy. Enough to clench my fists.
MESSAGE.Translation: I was genuinely happy. Enough to clench my fists.

MESSAGE.JP: `沙耶@「そうね…いい訓練になるし…いいわよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saya@❝Yeah... it might be good training... okay.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@❝Yeah... it might be good training... okay.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 彼女はずっと待ち続けてくれてたんだ。あの日から。
MESSAGE.EN: She'd been waiting the whole time. Since that day.
MESSAGE.Translation: She'd been waiting the whole time. Since that day.

MESSAGE.JP: またゲームが始まるのを。
MESSAGE.EN: We decided to start the game again.
MESSAGE.Translation: We decided to start the game again.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「新商品はあるのかな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I think there's a new item for sale.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I think there's a new item for sale.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `沙耶@「あるから、この混雑なんでしょ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saya@❝There is. That's why it's so busy.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@❝There is. That's why it's so busy.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「よし。じゃ、始めよう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Okay. Let's start.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Okay. Let's start.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ゲームスタート！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Game start!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Game start!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 今度は僕が言って、先に人波へ飛び込んだ。
MESSAGE.EN: This time I said it and dove into the crowd first.
MESSAGE.Translation: This time I said it and dove into the crowd first.

MESSAGE.JP: `沙耶@「遅かったわね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saya@❝You're late.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@❝You're late.❞

MESSAGE.JP: スピードではまた負けた…。まあ、勝負は内容なのだから構わないのだけど。
MESSAGE.EN: She beat me in speed again... but the contest is about content, so I don't care...
MESSAGE.Translation: She beat me in speed again... but the contest is about content, so I don't care...

MESSAGE.JP: すでに彼女はテーブルについて、目の前にパンを並べていた。
MESSAGE.EN: She'd already laid her breads out on the table in front of me.
MESSAGE.Translation: She'd already laid her breads out on the table in front of me.

MESSAGE.JP: `沙耶@「理樹くんも、どうぞ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saya@❝You too, Riki-kun.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@❝You too, Riki-kun.❞

MESSAGE.JP: また新商品は取り損ねた。それでも惣菜パンだらけだから、点は高いはず。
MESSAGE.EN: I didn't have the new one this time either. But I only had savory breads and sandwiches, so my points should be high.
MESSAGE.Translation: I didn't have the new one this time either. But I only had savory breads and sandwiches, so my points should be high.

MESSAGE.JP: `沙耶@「ビーフカレーパンに、ピザパン、チキンサンド。へぇ…やるわね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saya@❝Beef curry, pizza, and chicken sandwich. Heh... not bad.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@❝Beef curry, pizza, and chicken sandwich. Heh... not bad.❞

MESSAGE.JP: どうだ、このラインナップ。音の響きだけでも、学生の昼ご飯とは思えない高級感。
MESSAGE.EN: How's that line-up? From the sound of it, it's a pretty high class lunch for a student.
MESSAGE.Translation: How's that line-up? From the sound of it, it's a pretty high class lunch for a student.

MESSAGE.JP: `沙耶@「計１１点」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saya@❝11 points.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@❝11 points.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「えぇぇ、前より減ってる!?」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Eeeh? It's lower than before!?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Eeeh? It's lower than before!?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 判断基準がわからない！　というか、内訳教えて！
MESSAGE.EN: I don't understand the scoring system! Tell me the breakdown!
MESSAGE.Translation: I don't understand the scoring system! Tell me the breakdown!

MESSAGE.JP: `沙耶@「で、あたしは、と…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saya@❝And I have...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@❝And I have...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `沙耶@「はい。こちらは新商品のパン。そしてツナフランス」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saya@❝Okay. This is the new flavor. And I also have tuna French bread.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@❝Okay. This is the new flavor. And I also have tuna French bread.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `沙耶@「このふたつで１６点。勝ちよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saya@❝These two are worth 16 points. I win.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@❝These two are worth 16 points. I win.❞

MESSAGE.JP: そっちは前より高くなってる!?
MESSAGE.EN: Those are even higher than before!?
MESSAGE.Translation: Those are even higher than before!?

MESSAGE.JP: 腑に落ちないが、彼女なりのルールに従ってるのだろう。致し方がない…。
MESSAGE.EN: I don't understand, but I'm playing by her rules, so there's no way to win...
MESSAGE.Translation: I don't understand, but I'm playing by her rules, so there's no way to win...

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「で、新商品ってなんだったの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝So, what's the new flavor?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝So, what's the new flavor?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `沙耶@「え、ああ…ええとね…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saya@❝Eh, ah... umm...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@❝Eh, ah... umm...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `沙耶@「…ふなずしパイ!?」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saya@❝...Fermented carp sushi pie!?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@❝...Fermented carp sushi pie!?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 彼女が仰天し、また唾が飛んでくる。
MESSAGE.EN: She was taken aback and spit went flying again.
MESSAGE.Translation: She was taken aback and spit went flying again.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「へえ、それは珍しいね。ふなずしをパイで閉じこめるなんて」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Heh, that's rare. Putting fermented carp sushi into a pie.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Heh, that's rare. Putting fermented carp sushi into a pie.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 彼女の様子がおかしい…何かまた自分のミスを発見してしまったかのように…。
MESSAGE.EN: She was acting weird... like she'd discovered one of her mistakes again...
MESSAGE.Translation: She was acting weird... like she'd discovered one of her mistakes again...

MESSAGE.JP: `沙耶@「あの…あたし…ふなずしは…食べられないんだけど…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saya@❝Umm.... I... can't eat fermented carp sushi.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@❝Umm.... I... can't eat fermented carp sushi.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 苦手な食べ物だったのか。確かにふなずしは味に癖があり、好き嫌いが分かれそうだ。
MESSAGE.EN: Was it something she didn't like? Fermented carp sushi was definitely something you either liked or hated.
MESSAGE.Translation: Was it something she didn't like? Fermented carp sushi was definitely something you either liked or hated.

MESSAGE.JP: 僕は大丈夫なのだけど。なので提案してみた。
MESSAGE.EN: I was fine with it, so I made a suggestion.
MESSAGE.Translation: I was fine with it, so I made a suggestion.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「じゃあ、僕のと交換していいよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Then you should trade with me.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Then you should trade with me.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `沙耶@「それじゃ、あなたが計２０点以上になって大逆転になるじゃない！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saya@❝If I do that, you'll have more than twenty points and it'll be a total reversal!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@❝If I do that, you'll have more than twenty points and it'll be a total reversal!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 僕の三品はよほど点数が低いらしい。
MESSAGE.EN: My three flavors seemed to have a really low value.
MESSAGE.Translation: My three flavors seemed to have a really low value.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「別に食べなくても、高得点のままでいいんじゃ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Even if you don't eat it, you can still keep your points, right?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Even if you don't eat it, you can still keep your points, right?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `沙耶@「じゃあ、このふなずしパイはどうするのよ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saya@❝Well, what should I do with it...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@❝Well, what should I do with it...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「友達にあげれば？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Give it to a friend?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Give it to a friend?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `沙耶@「だから、そんなことしたら、あたしの点数がツナフランスの６点だけになっちゃうじゃない！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saya@❝Like I said, if I do that, my points will fall to just the 6 that the tuna French bread is worth!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@❝Like I said, if I do that, my points will fall to just the 6 that the tuna French bread is worth!❞

MESSAGE.JP: ツナフランス、そんなに高いんだ…。
MESSAGE.EN: So tuna French bread is worth that much...
MESSAGE.Translation: So tuna French bread is worth that much...

MESSAGE.JP: 二個あったら、それだけで僕の三品に勝てる計算じゃん。
MESSAGE.EN: With just those two it's enough to beat my three flavors.
MESSAGE.Translation: With just those two it's enough to beat my three flavors.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「じゃあ、まあ、頑張って食べるしかないようだね…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Well, I guess you just have to do your best to eat it...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Well, I guess you just have to do your best to eat it...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `沙耶@「そうね…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saya@❝Yeah...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@❝Yeah...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `沙耶@「開けてみるわ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saya@❝I'm opening it...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@❝I'm opening it...❞

MESSAGE.JP: その包装をぱりっと開く。
MESSAGE.EN: She crisply opened the package.
MESSAGE.Translation: She crisply opened the package.

MESSAGE.JP: `沙耶@「おえぇ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saya@❝Ugh...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@❝Ugh...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「いや、そんな無理しないでも…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Well, that might be impossible...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Well, that might be impossible...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 匂いだけで吐き気を催したようだ…。
MESSAGE.EN: She looked like she was going to throw up from just the smell...
MESSAGE.Translation: She looked like she was going to throw up from just the smell...

MESSAGE.JP: `沙耶@「じゃ、今回もまたあなたの勝ちじゃないっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saya@❝Well, you win again this time.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@❝Well, you win again this time.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「手に入れた時点できみの勝ちでいいんじゃない？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Isn't it fine saying you won based on what you got?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Isn't it fine saying you won based on what you got?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `沙耶@「パンは食べるためにあるのよっ!?」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saya@❝Isn't bread for eating!?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@❝Isn't bread for eating!?❞

MESSAGE.JP: こういう一方的な主張は絶対曲げない人だから、何を言ってももう無駄だろう…。
MESSAGE.EN: She was so stubborn when it comes to things like this. It would be pointless to argue...
MESSAGE.Translation: She was so stubborn when it comes to things like this. It would be pointless to argue...

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「まぁ…そうだね…じゃ、僕の勝ち、ということで…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Well... okay. That means I win...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Well... okay. That means I win...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `沙耶@「言ってみなさいよっ、そう、罰ゲームよ、あなたの意地の悪い罰ゲームをとっととあたしに課すがいいわっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saya@❝Tell me what it is. My punishment. Lay your malicious punishment on me right now.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@❝Tell me what it is. My punishment. Lay your malicious punishment on me right now.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「じゃ、ふなずしを食べる」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Okay, eat the fermented carp sushi.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Okay, eat the fermented carp sushi.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `沙耶@「ごめん、できません！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saya@❝Sorry, I can't!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@❝Sorry, I can't!❞

MESSAGE.JP: あのプライドの高い沙耶さんが屈服した!!　恐るべしふなずし!!
MESSAGE.EN: The proud Saya-san gave up!! What terrifying sushi!!
MESSAGE.Translation: The proud Saya-san gave up!! What terrifying sushi!!

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「罰ゲームは置いておいて、そろそろ食べないと時間がなくなるよ。とりあえずふなずしパイとチキンサンドを替えてあげるね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Never mind the punishment, we're running out of time to eat. Trade me the sushi one for the chicken sandwich.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Never mind the punishment, we're running out of time to eat. Trade me the sushi one for the chicken sandwich.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `沙耶@「ぃよっしゃあ！　逆転っ！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saya@❝Alright! Reversal!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saya@❝Alright! Reversal!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「いやいや、ゲームはもう終わってるので」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝No, no, the game is already over.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝No, no, the game is already over.❞

MESSAGE.JP: なんて楽しい人なのだろう。
MESSAGE.EN: She's a really fun person.
MESSAGE.Translation: She's a really fun person.

MESSAGE.JP: また好きになった。
MESSAGE.EN: I've fallen for her again.
MESSAGE.Translation: I've fallen for her again.

MESSAGE.JP: 大好きだ。
MESSAGE.EN: I really love her.
MESSAGE.Translation: I really love her.

MESSAGE.JP: いつか本当にふたりで、戦いのない穏やかな毎日を送れたら、いいな。
MESSAGE.EN: I hope that someday we can have peaceful days together without the fighting.
MESSAGE.Translation: I hope that someday we can have peaceful days together without the fighting.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「今日はどうしよう…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝What should I do today...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝What should I do today...❞

MESSAGE.JP: さて、今日もいこう…。
MESSAGE.EN: Well, I guess I'll go somewhere.
MESSAGE.Translation: Well, I guess I'll go somewhere.

MESSAGE.JP: って言っても、特にやる事はない。いつもどおりだ。
MESSAGE.EN: But even if I say that, as always, I have nothing to do.
MESSAGE.Translation: But even if I say that, as always, I have nothing to do.

MESSAGE.JP: そうだな…天気もいいし、屋上にでも行こうか。
MESSAGE.EN: Well... The weather's nice today, so it wouldn't be a bad idea to go to the rooftop.
MESSAGE.Translation: Well... The weather's nice today, so it wouldn't be a bad idea to go to the rooftop.

MESSAGE.JP: なぜ、僕は中庭にいく、と選ぶことが出来なかったんだろう。
MESSAGE.EN: I wonder why I couldn't choose to go in the courtyard instead.
MESSAGE.Translation: I wonder why I couldn't choose to go in the courtyard instead.

MESSAGE.JP: そこに足を運ぶことは出来たはずなのに。
MESSAGE.EN: There was nothing to keep me from going there.
MESSAGE.Translation: There was nothing to keep me from going there.

MESSAGE.JP: …邪魔しちゃ悪いから、だろうか。
MESSAGE.EN: ...But, I'd probably just disturb Nishizono-san.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...But, I'd probably just disturb Nishizono-san.

MESSAGE.JP: 見たことがあるような、見たことも無いような、西園さんの笑顔が…一瞬頭に浮かんで消えた。
MESSAGE.EN: Her smile, that I wasn't sure if I'd ever seen or not, momentarily appeared in my mind and vanished again.
MESSAGE.Translation: Her smile, that I wasn't sure if I'd ever seen or not, momentarily appeared in my mind and vanished again.

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「待て、理樹」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝Wait, Riki.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝Wait, Riki.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 廊下に出ると、謙吾に呼び止められた。
MESSAGE.EN: As I got out of the classroom, Kengo called out to me.
MESSAGE.Translation: As I got out of the classroom, Kengo called out to me.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「え、なに？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Eh, what?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Eh, what?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「いや、最近昼休みに教室でおまえを見かけない日が続いたからな。一体何をしているのかと」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝You haven't stayed in the classroom for lunch recently. I wonder where it is you've been going.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝You haven't stayed in the classroom for lunch recently. I wonder where it is you've been going.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「えーと…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Well...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Well...❞

MESSAGE.JP: まあ、屋上に行ってたりとかなんだけど…。
MESSAGE.EN: I've just been going to the rooftop or something...
MESSAGE.Translation: I've just been going to the rooftop or something...

MESSAGE.JP: 小毬さんは誰にも内緒、といっていたので、謙吾にも話すのはまずい気がする。
MESSAGE.EN: Komari-san wanted to keep the place a secret, so I guess I shouldn't tell Kengo about it.
MESSAGE.Translation: Komari-san wanted to keep the place a secret, so I guess I shouldn't tell Kengo about it.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「まあ、色々」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Well, here and there.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Well, here and there.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「そうか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝Is that so.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝Is that so.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「…今日はどうするんだ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝...What are you doing today?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝...What are you doing today?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「え？　いや、これから小毬さんと一緒にご飯でも食べようかと」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Eh? I think I'm going to have lunch with Komari-san.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Eh? I think I'm going to have lunch with Komari-san.❞

MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝Wha...!?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝Wha...!?❞

MESSAGE.JP: …何だこの反応。
MESSAGE.EN: ...What's with this reaction?
MESSAGE.Translation: ...What's with this reaction?

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「いやそんなに驚愕するような話でもないと思うけど」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I don't think you have to be that surprised about it.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I don't think you have to be that surprised about it.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「十分驚愕するさ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝It definitely is a surprise...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝It definitely is a surprise...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「いや、謙吾の変貌ぶりほどではないと思うけど…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Your transformation was much more surprising for us...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Your transformation was much more surprising for us...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「なるほど、おまえも楽しそうにやってるじゃないか。それはよかった」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝Got it. I'm just glad to know you're enjoying your school life.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝Got it. I'm just glad to know you're enjoying your school life.❞

MESSAGE.JP: ぽん、と肩を叩かれる。
MESSAGE.EN: He tapped my shoulder.
MESSAGE.Translation: He tapped my shoulder.

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「心配するな。鈴にも真人にも口外はしない」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝No worries. I won't tell Rin and Masato.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝No worries. I won't tell Rin and Masato.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ありがとう…って、別にどっちでもいいんだけど…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Thanks... Though, I don't care either way...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Thanks... Though, I don't care either way...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「じゃあな…幸運を祈っている」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝So long... I'll keep my fingers crossed for you.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝So long... I'll keep my fingers crossed for you.❞

MESSAGE.JP: び、と指を二本立てて謙吾は去っていった。
MESSAGE.EN: Kengo made a gesture with two fingers and left.
MESSAGE.Translation: Kengo made a gesture with two fingers and left.

MESSAGE.JP: わけがわからない。
MESSAGE.EN: I just didn't understand him.
MESSAGE.Translation: I just didn't understand him.

MESSAGE.JP: 屋上へ続く階段を上り、踊り場へ。
MESSAGE.EN: I climbed the stairs leading to the rooftop, and arrived at the landing.
MESSAGE.Translation: I climbed the stairs leading to the rooftop, and arrived at the landing.

MESSAGE.JP: …今日は椅子が窓の前に置いてある。
MESSAGE.EN: ...There was a chair standing in front of the window.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...There was a chair standing in front of the window.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「今日は小毬さん、いるんだな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝It seems she's already here.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝It seems she's already here.❞

MESSAGE.JP: それを足場に、屋上へ出た。
MESSAGE.EN: Using the chair as a scaffold, I climbed out onto the rooftop.
MESSAGE.Translation: Using the chair as a scaffold, I climbed out onto the rooftop.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「あれ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Oh...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Oh...❞

MESSAGE.JP: いない。
MESSAGE.EN: She wasn't here.
MESSAGE.Translation: She wasn't here.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「小毬さん？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Komari-san?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Komari-san?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 声を掛けてみるが、返事もない。
MESSAGE.EN: I called her name, but there was no reply.
MESSAGE.Translation: I called her name, but there was no reply.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@（…また隠れてるんじゃないだろうなぁ）
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...She's hiding in somewhere again?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...She's hiding in somewhere again?❞

MESSAGE.JP: とりあえず、裏に回り込んでみる。
MESSAGE.EN: I searched for her for a while.
MESSAGE.Translation: I searched for her for a while.

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「…くかーっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝...Zzz.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝...Zzz.❞

MESSAGE.JP: コンクリートの段差にもたれかかって、規則正しい息音を立てている。
MESSAGE.EN: Lying on a concrete ledge, she was breathing steadily.
MESSAGE.Translation: Lying on a concrete ledge, she was breathing steadily.

MESSAGE.JP: …寝てるよ、この人。
MESSAGE.EN: ...She was sleeping.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...She was sleeping.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「やれやれ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Oh well...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Oh well...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 小毬さんの隣に座り込む。
MESSAGE.EN: I sat down beside her.
MESSAGE.Translation: I sat down beside her.

MESSAGE.JP: …今日もいい天気だ。
MESSAGE.EN: ...It's another sunny day today.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...It's another sunny day today.

MESSAGE.JP: 日差しも温かいし、確かにこれは眠くはなる。
MESSAGE.EN: The sunlight was warm and cozy, so no wonder she had fallen asleep.
MESSAGE.Translation: The sunlight was warm and cozy, so no wonder she had fallen asleep.

MESSAGE.JP: 眠くはなるけど…。
MESSAGE.EN: But still...
MESSAGE.Translation: But still...

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「なんというか、ひたすら無防備な人だ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝She's way too defenseless...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝She's way too defenseless...❞

MESSAGE.JP: ため息混じりにもう一度小毬さんの幸せそうな寝顔を見る。
MESSAGE.EN: I sighed and looked at her sleeping face again.
MESSAGE.Translation: I sighed and looked at her sleeping face again.

MESSAGE.JP: …どんな夢を見ているんだろうか。
MESSAGE.EN: ...I wondered what she was dreaming about.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...I wondered what she was dreaming about.

MESSAGE.JP: やっぱり、小毬さんの見る夢は…幸せな夢なのだろうか。
MESSAGE.EN: And I wondered if her dream was a happy one.
MESSAGE.Translation: And I wondered if her dream was a happy one.

MESSAGE.JP: 幸せなんだろうなぁ…。
MESSAGE.EN: I think it is...
MESSAGE.Translation: I think it is...

MESSAGE.JP: 多分それは、他人にまで自分の幸せを振り撒ける人の特権。
MESSAGE.EN: That might be a privilege only granted to someone like her, who's always spreading her own happiness around.
MESSAGE.Translation: That might be a privilege only granted to someone like her, who's always spreading her own happiness around.

MESSAGE.JP: 僕も、そんな風に生きられれば、幸福な夢を見ることができるのだろうか。
MESSAGE.EN: If I could live like that, could I also have a happy dream like hers?
MESSAGE.Translation: If I could live like that, could I also have a happy dream like hers?

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「すかーっ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Zzz...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Zzz...❞

MESSAGE.JP: いやまあ、なんかこの寝顔を見てると、真面目に考えているのがアホらしくなってくる。
MESSAGE.EN: Er, well, looking at this sleeping face is starting to make me feel silly for thinking about something serious...
MESSAGE.Translation: Er, well, looking at this sleeping face is starting to make me feel silly for thinking about something serious...

MESSAGE.JP: ていうか、よだれ垂れてる…。
MESSAGE.EN: Hey, she's driveling...
MESSAGE.Translation: Hey, she's driveling...

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「しょうがないなぁ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝All right...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝All right...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 僕はポケットからティッシュを取り出すと、それをふき取りに掛かった。
MESSAGE.EN: I took out a tissue from my pocket and tried to wipe her mouth.
MESSAGE.Translation: I took out a tissue from my pocket and tried to wipe her mouth.

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「お…にいちゃん…？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝B... brother...?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝B... brother...?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 呟きを聞く。
MESSAGE.EN: I heard her whisper.
MESSAGE.Translation: I heard her whisper.

MESSAGE.JP: 目が開く。
MESSAGE.EN: She opened her eyes.
MESSAGE.Translation: She opened her eyes.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ああ、おはよう…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Er, morning...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Er, morning...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「ええええええっ!?　り、りきく…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Ehhhhhhhh!? Ri, Riki-ku...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Ehhhhhhhh!? Ri, Riki-ku...❞

MESSAGE.JP: がっ。
MESSAGE.EN: Guh.
MESSAGE.Translation: Guh.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「うわっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Uwa.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Uwa.❞

MESSAGE.JP: …額にヘッドバットを食らう。
