MESSAGE.EN: ...She gave me a head-butt.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...She gave me a head-butt.

MESSAGE.JP: がんっ。
MESSAGE.EN: Guhn.
MESSAGE.Translation: Guhn.

MESSAGE.JP: さらに小毬さんのほうで音がする。
MESSAGE.EN: I heard the sound of another impact.
MESSAGE.Translation: I heard the sound of another impact.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「いや…そんなに慌てなくてもさ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...I don't think you need to panic that much...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...I don't think you need to panic that much...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 額を押さえながら小毬さんのほうを見ると、小毬さんも額と後頭部を押さえていた。
MESSAGE.EN: As I held my forehead, I saw Komari-san putting her hands on her forehead and the back of her head.
MESSAGE.Translation: As I held my forehead, I saw Komari-san putting her hands on her forehead and the back of her head.

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「う、うえええん…両方うったぁ～」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝U, ueeeeen... I hit both sides～.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝U, ueeeeen... I hit both sides～.❞

MESSAGE.JP: …反動で、後頭部もコンクリートに打ったらしい。
MESSAGE.EN: ...With a rebound, she had managed to hit even the back of her head on a concrete block.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...With a rebound, she had managed to hit even the back of her head on a concrete block.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「だ、だいじょうぶ…？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝A, are you okay...?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝A, are you okay...?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「あんまりだいじょうぶじゃない～、いたい～」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝I'm not really okay～. It hurts～.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝I'm not really okay～. It hurts～.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「理樹君はだいじょうぶ～？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Are you all right, Riki-kun～?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Are you all right, Riki-kun～?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「いやまあ、僕は平気」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Um, well, I'm all right.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Um, well, I'm all right.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「そう…よかったぁ～」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝I'm... so glad to hear that～.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝I'm... so glad to hear that～.❞

MESSAGE.JP: …涙声で言う台詞じゃない。
MESSAGE.EN: ...That line shouldn't be spoken in such a tearful voice.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...That line shouldn't be spoken in such a tearful voice.

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「あっ…で、でもなんで理樹君が寝起きに目の前へっどばっと？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Um... but why did I on you my head in front of me hit on?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Um... but why did I on you my head in front of me hit on?❞

MESSAGE.JP: だいぶ錯乱しているというか寝ぼけているらしい。
MESSAGE.EN: From her incoherent speech I'd say she still wasn't quite awake.
MESSAGE.Translation: From her incoherent speech I'd say she still wasn't quite awake.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「いや、口…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Your mouth...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Your mouth...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「ふえ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Fue?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Fue?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「…垂れてたからさ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...I mean, you were driveling.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...I mean, you were driveling.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「うわあああああっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Uwaaaaaaa!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Uwaaaaaaa!❞

MESSAGE.JP: ごしごしごしごし、とものすごい勢いで口を拭く。
MESSAGE.EN: She started wiping her mouth at a staggering speed.
MESSAGE.Translation: She started wiping her mouth at a staggering speed.

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「あああう…なんかすっごい恥ずかしいとこ見られた気がする…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Aaau... you saw something really embarrassing...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Aaau... you saw something really embarrassing...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「いやまあ…なんていうか、無防備だよね小毬さん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Er, well... How should I put it, you're just so defenseless, Komari-san.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Er, well... How should I put it, you're just so defenseless, Komari-san.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「うわあっ、どうしよっ、ものすごい恥ずかしいーっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Uwaa, what should I do, that's so embarrassing!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Uwaa, what should I do, that's so embarrassing!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「いや、別にそこまで恥ずかしいことじゃ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝No, it's not really that embarrassing...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝No, it's not really that embarrassing...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「え、そ、そうかな？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Eh? It isn't?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Eh? It isn't?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「まあ、寝言とか聞いたけど。おにいちゃん、とか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I heard you sleep talking, though. You were calling your brother.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I heard you sleep talking, though. You were calling your brother.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「うえええんっ!!　やっぱりむちゃくちゃ恥ずかしいーっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Ueeeeen!! It's totally embarrassing, after all!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Ueeeeen!! It's totally embarrassing, after all!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「理樹君にものすごいはずかしめを受けましたーっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Riki-kun has completely humiliated me!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Riki-kun has completely humiliated me!❞

MESSAGE.JP: いや、与えてない。
MESSAGE.EN: No, I didn't.
MESSAGE.Translation: No, I didn't.

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「……寝言」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝......Let's...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝......Let's...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「聞かなかったことにしよう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝...pretend you didn't hear anything.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝...pretend you didn't hear anything.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 僕を指差す。
MESSAGE.EN: She pointed at me.
MESSAGE.Translation: She pointed at me.

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「おっけー？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Okay?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Okay?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「あ、おっけー」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Uh, okay.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Uh, okay.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「聞かれなかったことにしよう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Let's pretend I wasn't heard.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Let's pretend I wasn't heard.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 自分の胸に手を当てる。
MESSAGE.EN: She put her hands on her chest.
MESSAGE.Translation: She put her hands on her chest.

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「うん、これで万事解決」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝All right, with this everything's resolved.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝All right, with this everything's resolved.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「あ、小毬さんってお兄さんとかいるの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Uh, so, do you happen to have a brother?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Uh, so, do you happen to have a brother?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「うわあああっ、め、めちゃくちゃ聞かれてるぅーーっ!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Uwaaaaaa, y, you did hear me, didn't you!!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Uwaaaaaa, y, you did hear me, didn't you!!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 頭を抱えて倒れこむ。
MESSAGE.EN: She fell to her knees cradling her head in her hands.
MESSAGE.Translation: She fell to her knees cradling her head in her hands.

MESSAGE.JP: …うわ、なんか楽しい。
MESSAGE.EN: ...This is kinda fun.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...This is kinda fun.

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「ああう…寝言とか聞かれてたのか～…
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Aau... He listened to my sleep-talking～...
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Aau... He listened to my sleep-talking～...

MESSAGE.JP: ようしっ」
MESSAGE.EN: All right!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: All right!❞

MESSAGE.JP: うん、と強く頷く。
MESSAGE.EN: She nodded vigorously.
MESSAGE.Translation: She nodded vigorously.

MESSAGE.JP: また良くわからない行動。
MESSAGE.EN: I still can't read her actions.
MESSAGE.Translation: I still can't read her actions.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「小毬さん、その『ようしっ』って？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Komari-san, what does that ❛all right❜ stand for?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Komari-san, what does that ❛all right❜ stand for?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 昼食のパンを口に運びながら訊く。
MESSAGE.EN: I asked her as I started eating my bread.
MESSAGE.Translation: I asked her as I started eating my bread.

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「ふえ？　うん、前向きマジック」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Fue? That is my positiveness spell.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Fue? That is my positiveness spell.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「なんか、へこんじゃうようなこととかあるとね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Like, when I'm feeling down about something...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Like, when I'm feeling down about something...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「それを口に出して、最後に『ようしっ』ってつけるの」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝I say out loud to myself the thing that happened to me and add ❛all right❜ at the end.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝I say out loud to myself the thing that happened to me and add ❛all right❜ at the end.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「ほら、なんだかネガティブがすっごいポジティブに」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝That turns a negative thing into a positive one.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝That turns a negative thing into a positive one.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ふうん、なるほど」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Hmm, I see.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Hmm, I see.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 小毬さんらしい方程式だ。
MESSAGE.EN: That equation sounds just like her.
MESSAGE.Translation: That equation sounds just like her.

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「…ちなみに私に、お兄さんとかはいないよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝...I don't have a brother, by the way.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝...I don't have a brother, by the way.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「よくわかんないけどね…よく夢に見るんだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝I don't know why... but he often appears in my dream.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝I don't know why... but he often appears in my dream.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「いないはずのおにいちゃん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝The brother I don't have.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝The brother I don't have.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「夢にだけいるおにいちゃん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝The brother who only exists in my dreams.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝The brother who only exists in my dreams.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「私ひとりっ子だからね。やっぱりそういうの欲しいのかなーって、ずっと思ってるけど」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝I'm an only child, so I may've been yearning for siblings for a long time.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝I'm an only child, so I may've been yearning for siblings for a long time.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「…よくわかんないや」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝...I'm not really sure.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝...I'm not really sure.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ふうん…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Hmm...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Hmm...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「でも、その夢を見るのは好きなんだ。手がすっごく温かいの」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝I like having that dream, though. His hands are so warm.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝I like having that dream, though. His hands are so warm.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「…ああいうおにいちゃんだったら、すごく欲しいかもね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝...If there were someone like him, I'd want him to be my actual brother.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝...If there were someone like him, I'd want him to be my actual brother.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「そっか…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Hmm...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Hmm...❞

MESSAGE.JP: やっぱり、幸福な夢。
MESSAGE.EN: As I thought, she dreams happy dreams.
MESSAGE.Translation: As I thought, she dreams happy dreams.

MESSAGE.JP: それを羨んでしまうのは、いけないことだろうか。
MESSAGE.EN: I wondered if it was wrong of me to be jealous of that.
MESSAGE.Translation: I wondered if it was wrong of me to be jealous of that.

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「あ、ごめん…夢の話なんてつまんないよね？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Uh, sorry... It must be boring to listen to me talk about my dreams.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Uh, sorry... It must be boring to listen to me talk about my dreams.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「そんなことないよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Not in the least.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Not in the least.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 僕は小毬さんに笑って見せた。
MESSAGE.EN: I flashed a happy smile at her.
MESSAGE.Translation: I flashed a happy smile at her.

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「うん、でも…今日はしょうがないんだよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Yeah. But... I couldn't help it, because.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Yeah. But... I couldn't help it, because.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「今日はぽかぽかいい天気」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝It's just so warm today.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝It's just so warm today.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「思わずお昼寝もしちゃうってものです」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝I think it'd make anyone want to take a nap.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝I think it'd make anyone want to take a nap.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「そうだね、確かにいい天気だね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Yeah. It sure is sunny.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Yeah. It sure is sunny.❞

MESSAGE.JP: ここに出るときは、いつもいい天気の日。
MESSAGE.EN: Every time she comes here, it's always sunny.
MESSAGE.Translation: Every time she comes here, it's always sunny.

MESSAGE.JP: そんないつのまにか出来ていた不文律を改めて思う。
MESSAGE.EN: I made a mental note of that unwritten rule.
MESSAGE.Translation: I made a mental note of that unwritten rule.

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「暖かい日は、プレーンスコーンと、とびっきり甘いアプリコットジャム」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Plain scones and sweet apricot jam fit a sunny day like this.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Plain scones and sweet apricot jam fit a sunny day like this.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「$K25ゴゴティー$K0もあわせてどうぞ～」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝And have some $K25Go-Go tea$K0～.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝And have some $K25Go-Go tea$K0～.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ああ、うん。もらうよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Ah, yeah. Thank you.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Ah, yeah. Thank you.❞

MESSAGE.JP: ジャムは小毬さんの言葉通り、思いっきり甘いもの。
MESSAGE.EN: As Komari-san had said, the jelly was very sweet.
MESSAGE.Translation: As Komari-san had said, the jelly was very sweet.

MESSAGE.JP: …でも、その後味は、ちょっぴり酸っぱいものだった。
MESSAGE.EN: ...Though, it had something of a sour aftertaste.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...Though, it had something of a sour aftertaste.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「今日もおむすびだね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I see you have omusubi for lunch today.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I see you have omusubi for lunch today.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「…違います」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝...No.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝...No.❞

MESSAGE.JP: …違うの？
炊いた白飯を丸く握って中に好みの具を入れてのりで巻いた食べ物、日本が生んだ和のファストフードが僕の目の前にある。
MESSAGE.EN: There were definitely several round rice balls wrapped with laver in front of my eyes, a traditional Japanese dish.
MESSAGE.Translation: There were definitely several round rice balls wrapped with laver in front of my eyes, a traditional Japanese dish.

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「これは、おにぎりです」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝These are onigiris.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝These are onigiris.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「でも、この前はおにぎりって訊いたら、違うって言ったよね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝But you told me that was an omusubi when I asked the other day, didn't you?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝But you told me that was an omusubi when I asked the other day, didn't you?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「…直枝さん、よく見てください」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝...Naoe-san, look carefully.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝...Naoe-san, look carefully.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「この前は三角でした。今日は丸いじゃないですか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝The ones you saw the other day were triangle-shaped. These ones are circular.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝The ones you saw the other day were triangle-shaped. These ones are circular.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「へぇ。三角だとおむすびで、丸いとおにぎりなんだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I see. The triangle-shaped one is omusubi, and the circular one is onigiri.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I see. The triangle-shaped one is omusubi, and the circular one is onigiri.❞

MESSAGE.JP: なるほど勉強になった。
MESSAGE.EN: I see. It's always good to learn new things.
MESSAGE.Translation: I see. It's always good to learn new things.

MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝.........❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝.........❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「直枝さん、人の話を聞いていましたか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝Naoe-san, were you even listening to me?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝Naoe-san, were you even listening to me?❞

MESSAGE.JP: …声が冷たい。
MESSAGE.EN: ...She asked coldly.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...She asked coldly.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「僕、間違えた？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝D, did I get it wrong?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝D, did I get it wrong?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「はい」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝Yes.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝Yes.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「三角がおにぎりで、丸いとおむすびです」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝The triangle-shaped one is an onigiri, and the circular one is an omusubi.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝The triangle-shaped one is an onigiri, and the circular one is an omusubi.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「…さっき、おにぎりって言ったよね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...But, you just called this an onigiri.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...But, you just called this an onigiri.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 西園さんの手元にある、丸い握り飯を指さす。
MESSAGE.EN: I pointed at the round rice ball in her hand.
MESSAGE.Translation: I pointed at the round rice ball in her hand.

MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝.........❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝.........❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「…逆だったかも知れません」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝...It might have been the other way around.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝...It might have been the other way around.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「えーと」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝Let me see.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝Let me see.❞

MESSAGE.JP: おにぎりが、と言いながら手を合わせて丸く握る。
MESSAGE.EN: Muttering the word onigiri, she made a circle shape with her hands.
MESSAGE.Translation: Muttering the word onigiri, she made a circle shape with her hands.

MESSAGE.JP: おむすびが、と言いながら手を微妙に三角にしている。
MESSAGE.EN: Then muttering the word omusubi, she made a triangle shape with her fingers.
MESSAGE.Translation: Then muttering the word omusubi, she made a triangle shape with her fingers.

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「三角が…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝Triangle...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝Triangle...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「丸が…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝Circle...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝Circle...❞

MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝.........❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝.........❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「細かいことを気にするのは、男らしくありません」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝Men shouldn't sweat the small details.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝Men shouldn't sweat the small details.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「…そうだね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...Okay.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...Okay.❞

MESSAGE.JP: しばらく、おにぎりとおむすび、三角と丸がぐるぐる頭の中を回っていた。
MESSAGE.EN: For the next few minutes, all that was running through my head were onigiri, omusubi, triangle and circle.
MESSAGE.Translation: For the next few minutes, all that was running through my head were onigiri, omusubi, triangle and circle.

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「直枝さん、お約束のものです」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝Naoe-san, this is what I promised to lend you.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝Naoe-san, this is what I promised to lend you.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鞄から、一冊の本を取り出す。
MESSAGE.EN: She produced a book from her bag.
MESSAGE.Translation: She produced a book from her bag.

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「何をお薦めするか、とても迷ったのですが」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝I spent quite a bit of time considering what to recommend.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝I spent quite a bit of time considering what to recommend.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「まず、こんなのはいかがでしょうか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝But I thought this would be good to begin with.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝But I thought this would be good to begin with.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 文庫本の表紙には『密室』という文字が読み取れる。
MESSAGE.EN: The title of the book was ❛The Locked Room.❜
MESSAGE.Translation: The title of the book was ❛The Locked Room.❜

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「きっと気に入っていただけると思います」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝I think you should find it to your liking.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝I think you should find it to your liking.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 作家の名前はちょっと変わっている。名字も名前も同じ漢字があって早口言葉みたいだ。
MESSAGE.EN: The author's name was a little odd; his name looked like a tongue twister because both the first and the family name had the same kanji.
MESSAGE.Translation: The author's name was a little odd; his name looked like a tongue twister because both the first and the family name had the same kanji.

MESSAGE.JP: …笹瀬川さんの親戚かな。
MESSAGE.EN: ...He might be one of Sasasegawa-san's relatives.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...He might be one of Sasasegawa-san's relatives.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ありがとう。さっそく読んでみるよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Thank you. I'll read it right away.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Thank you. I'll read it right away.❞

MESSAGE.JP: ふと、西園さんの傍らにある文庫本が目に入る。
MESSAGE.EN: Suddenly, a paperback book lying at her side caught my eye.
MESSAGE.Translation: Suddenly, a paperback book lying at her side caught my eye.

MESSAGE.JP: その表紙からは『密室』という文字が読み取れた。
MESSAGE.EN: The title on the cover read ❛The Locked Room.❜
MESSAGE.Translation: The title on the cover read ❛The Locked Room.❜

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「西園さん、その本は？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Nishizono-san, what's that book?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Nishizono-san, what's that book?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「いえこれは…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝Er, this is...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝Er, this is...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「…何故持ってきたんでしょうか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝...I don't know why I brought this here.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝...I don't know why I brought this here.❞

MESSAGE.JP: …何かに紛れて入っていたんだろうか。
MESSAGE.EN: ...Didn't she notice putting it in her bag?
MESSAGE.Translation: ...Didn't she notice putting it in her bag?

MESSAGE.JP: ただ、僕はなんとなく、その表紙に興味を引かれた。
MESSAGE.EN: For some reason, the title interested me.
MESSAGE.Translation: For some reason, the title interested me.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「よかったらそれ、貸してもらえないかな？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝If you don't mind, can I borrow that book?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝If you don't mind, can I borrow that book?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「…直枝さんはミステリがお好きなんですか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝...Do you like mystery novels, Naoe-san?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝...Do you like mystery novels, Naoe-san?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「好きっていうほど読んではいないけど…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I don't really read books that often...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I don't really read books that often...❞

MESSAGE.JP: なんとなく、西園さんの持っている本が気になったから。
MESSAGE.EN: Actually I had just become interested in the book she had, for no apparent reason.
MESSAGE.Translation: Actually I had just become interested in the book she had, for no apparent reason.

MESSAGE.JP: そう言うのもはばかられる。
MESSAGE.EN: But I was hesitant to tell her that.
MESSAGE.Translation: But I was hesitant to tell her that.

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「もちろん、お貸しするのは構いません」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝Of course, you can borrow it.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝Of course, you can borrow it.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「どうせならば、もう少し直枝さん向きの本を探してからお渡しするべきかとも思いますが…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝But, I wonder if I should look for a book that'd better match your tastes, instead...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝But, I wonder if I should look for a book that'd better match your tastes, instead...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「え、何か難しい内容なの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Eh, is that one difficult?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Eh, is that one difficult?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「そんなことはありません」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝No, not at all.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝No, not at all.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「…表紙に何か惹かれるものがあったなら、きっと気に入っていただけると思います」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝...If there's something on the cover that caught your interest, perhaps you will like it.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝...If there's something on the cover that caught your interest, perhaps you will like it.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 作家の名前はちょっと変わっている。名字も名前も同じ漢字があって早口言葉みたいだ。
MESSAGE.EN: The author's name was a little odd; his name looked like a tongue twister because both the first and the family name had the same kanji.
MESSAGE.Translation: The author's name was a little odd; his name looked like a tongue twister because both the first and the family name had the same kanji.

MESSAGE.JP: …笹瀬川さんの親戚かな。
MESSAGE.EN: ...He might be one of Sasasegawa-san's relatives.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...He might be one of Sasasegawa-san's relatives.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ありがとう。さっそく読んでみるよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Thank you. I'll start reading it right away.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Thank you. I'll start reading it right away.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「それにしても、ここは気持ちいいね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝By the way, isn't this place comfortable?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝By the way, isn't this place comfortable?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 僕らの間を風が抜ける。
MESSAGE.EN: The wind was blowing over us.
MESSAGE.Translation: The wind was blowing over us.

MESSAGE.JP: 西園さんの髪が揺れる。
MESSAGE.EN: Her hair swayed in the air.
MESSAGE.Translation: Her hair swayed in the air.

MESSAGE.JP: 芝生の青い匂いを運ぶ風だった。
MESSAGE.EN: The wind carried the green scent of the grass.
MESSAGE.Translation: The wind carried the green scent of the grass.

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「はい」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝Yes.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝Yes.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 僕は青い空を見上げる。
MESSAGE.EN: I looked up at the blue sky.
MESSAGE.Translation: I looked up at the blue sky.

MESSAGE.JP: もう、ずっと良い天気が続いている。
MESSAGE.EN: We've had constant good weather, recently.
MESSAGE.Translation: We've had constant good weather, recently.

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「ニッポンの夏、読書の夏、です」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝A summer of Japan, a summer of reading.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝A summer of Japan, a summer of reading.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「まだ、初夏だけどね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝It's still only the early summer, though.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝It's still only the early summer, though.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「…もうじき梅雨になりますね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝...It will be the rainy season soon.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝...It will be the rainy season soon.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「そうなったら、ここでは本は読まないの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I guess you won't be reading here when that happens?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I guess you won't be reading here when that happens?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「…直枝さん、人類は何のために雨合羽とビニールシートを発明したと思いますか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝...Naoe-san, what do you think the raincoat and plastic sheets were invented for?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝...Naoe-san, what do you think the raincoat and plastic sheets were invented for?❞

MESSAGE.JP: …じゃあ、読むんだ。
MESSAGE.EN: ...So you will be.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...So you will be.

MESSAGE.JP: そんなこんなで、昼休みは過ぎていった。
MESSAGE.EN: Like this, our lunch time came to an end.
MESSAGE.Translation: Like this, our lunch time came to an end.

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「よっしゃ、飯いっか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝All right, let's go have lunch.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝All right, let's go have lunch.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人が立ち上がる。
MESSAGE.EN: Masato stood up.
MESSAGE.Translation: Masato stood up.

MESSAGE.JP: 僕と鈴は頷き合って、その後に続いた。
MESSAGE.EN: I exchanged nods with Rin and we followed after him.
MESSAGE.Translation: I exchanged nods with Rin and we followed after him.

MESSAGE.JP: 先を歩いていた謙吾と合流する。
MESSAGE.EN: We caught up with Kengo, who was walking ahead.
MESSAGE.Translation: We caught up with Kengo, who was walking ahead.

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「よぅ、謙吾っち。おまえは目立つからどこ歩いてても一発でわかるな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Yo, Kengocchi. It's pretty easy to spot you, you're so eye-catching these days.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Yo, Kengocchi. It's pretty easy to spot you, you're so eye-catching these days.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「ちなみにおまえもだぞ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝So are yourself.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝So are yourself.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 今や謙吾のほうが突飛で目立つ。
MESSAGE.EN: Kengo really stood out like a sore thumb now.
MESSAGE.Translation: Kengo really stood out like a sore thumb now.

MESSAGE.JP: そのふたりが並んで歩いてるんだから、すごい光景なんだろうなあ。僕は見慣れちゃったけど。
MESSAGE.EN: To see those two walking abreast would have been quite the sight if I weren't so used to it already.
MESSAGE.Translation: To see those two walking abreast would have been quite the sight if I weren't so used to it already.

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「小学校ん時は、お互いジャンプしてこの天井にタッチ競争してたってのに…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝When we were in elementary school, we'd jump and try to touch the ceiling...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝When we were in elementary school, we'd jump and try to touch the ceiling...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「今じゃ、手を伸ばすだけでついちまう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝But now we can do it by only stretching our arms.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝But now we can do it by only stretching our arms.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「時は何にも阻まれることなく進み、オレたちは成長し大きくなっていく…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝No one can stop the flow of time, and as we keep growing up and getting taller...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝No one can stop the flow of time, and as we keep growing up and getting taller...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「そのうち頭もずりずり天井に引きずりながら歩くことになんのかな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝One day we might be dragging our heads on the ceiling as we walk along.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝One day we might be dragging our heads on the ceiling as we walk along.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 今だ！
MESSAGE.EN: It's time!
MESSAGE.Translation: It's time!

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「おまえは謙吾か!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Are you Kengo or what!!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Are you Kengo or what!!❞

MESSAGE.JP: ばきぃ！
MESSAGE.EN: *WHAM*!
MESSAGE.Translation: *WHAM*!

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「いでぇっ、なにすんだよっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝It hurts. What are you doing!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝It hurts. What are you doing!❞

MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝Rin...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝Rin...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「なんだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝What?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝What?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「俺だってそこまででかくない」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝I'm not that tall.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝I'm not that tall.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「そうだな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝That's true.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝That's true.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「だったら、今のはなんだったんだよ!?」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝So what the heck was that about!?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝So what the heck was that about!?❞

MESSAGE.JP: ＭＩＳＳ!!
MESSAGE.EN: MISS!!
MESSAGE.Translation: MISS!!

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「そこまででかくなるか!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝There's no way you're growing that tall!!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝There's no way you're growing that tall!!❞

MESSAGE.JP: ばきぃ！
MESSAGE.EN: *WHAM*!
MESSAGE.Translation: *WHAM*!

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「いでぇっ！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝It hurts!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝It hurts!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「ほう、切れ味のいいつっこみだな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝Ho, a nice riposte.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝Ho, a nice riposte.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 成立した！
MESSAGE.EN: We succeeded!
MESSAGE.Translation: We succeeded!

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「むしろ今引きずれ!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Why don't you drag it there right now!!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Why don't you drag it there right now!!❞

MESSAGE.JP: ばきぃ！
MESSAGE.EN: *WHAM*!
MESSAGE.Translation: *WHAM*!

MESSAGE.JP: ちょっと浮いたが、天井までは届かない！
MESSAGE.EN: Her kick lifted him up in the air a little, but didn't have enough power to make him reach the ceiling!
MESSAGE.Translation: Her kick lifted him up in the air a little, but didn't have enough power to make him reach the ceiling!

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「いでぇっ、なにすんだよっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝It hurts. What are you doing!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝It hurts. What are you doing!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「多分、天井に頭をずりずりと引きずらせようかと」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝I guess I tried to make you drag your head on the ceiling.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝I guess I tried to make you drag your head on the ceiling.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「そんなことできるかっ、つーか、試みるなっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝It's not possible! Don't try that!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝It's not possible! Don't try that!❞

MESSAGE.JP: ＭＩＳＳ!!
MESSAGE.EN: MISS!!
MESSAGE.Translation: MISS!!

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「おまえはあほかっ！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Are you a dimwit!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Are you a dimwit!❞

MESSAGE.JP: ばきぃ！
MESSAGE.EN: *WHAM*!
MESSAGE.Translation: *WHAM*!

MESSAGE.JP: ＭＩＳＳ!!
MESSAGE.EN: MISS!!
MESSAGE.Translation: MISS!!

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「いやいや…我慢できてたの最初だけで、すっごい加速していったから」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝No, no... You didn't resist at all. You just kept accelerating.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝No, no... You didn't resist at all. You just kept accelerating.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「加速？　そんなもの意識してないが」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝I accelerated? I didn't notice anything like that.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝I accelerated? I didn't notice anything like that.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 僕の心のイメージだったのだろう…。
MESSAGE.EN: Maybe that was just my imagination...
MESSAGE.Translation: Maybe that was just my imagination...

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「とにかく、もうちょっと待ってよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Anyway, you have to be a little more patient.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Anyway, you have to be a little more patient.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「うーむ、また難しいことを言うな。まあ努力はしてみるが…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Hmm, you want me to do another tough task. Okay, I'll give it a shot...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Hmm, you want me to do another tough task. Okay, I'll give it a shot...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「だがな…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝But...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝But...❞

MESSAGE.JP: とテーブルで自分の昼食を前に手を組み待機していた恭介は言う。
MESSAGE.EN: Kyousuke, joining his hands in thanks in front of his lunch, spoke up.
MESSAGE.Translation: Kyousuke, joining his hands in thanks in front of his lunch, spoke up.

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「見ていたが、遠目には結局乱暴を振るってるようにしか見えなかったぞ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝I saw everything, but what you did to Masato looked like nothing but simple violence, Rin.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝I saw everything, but what you did to Masato looked like nothing but simple violence, Rin.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「ったくだぜ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝You got that right.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝You got that right.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人もカレーうどんの載った盆を目の前に置き、そうぼやく。
MESSAGE.EN: Masato put his bowl of curry udon on the table and complained.
MESSAGE.Translation: Masato put his bowl of curry udon on the table and complained.

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「爽快だったぞ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝It was invigorating.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝It was invigorating.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「んだよ、てめぇ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝What was that, you bastard?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝What was that, you bastard?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「どうなんだ、ツッコミ指導の理樹」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝What do you think, Riposte-master Riki?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝What do you think, Riposte-master Riki?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 僕に来るかぁ…。
MESSAGE.EN: You want my opinion, huh...
MESSAGE.Translation: You want my opinion, huh...

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「そうだね。そう言われると改めざるを得ないね…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝That's true. I can't help but agree...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝That's true. I can't help but agree...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「ダメだったのか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝It was no good?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝It was no good?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「まあ、ここまでは良しとしよう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Well, let's put the past behind us.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Well, let's put the past behind us.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「でも、これからはソフトなツッコミも覚えていこうよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝But you should learn how to make softer ripostes from now on.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝But you should learn how to make softer ripostes from now on.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「ソフト？　ふんわりと蹴るのか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Soft? You mean like a fluffy kick?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Soft? You mean like a fluffy kick?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ふんわりなんて蹴れないでしょ。手で軽くチョップ、それだけでいいよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝What kind of kick is that? Just give them a light chop with your hand, you don't have to do anything else.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝What kind of kick is that? Just give them a light chop with your hand, you don't have to do anything else.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「うーむ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Umm...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Umm...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「いきなりそう言われてもな…長年蹴り続けてきただけにそうとっさに判断できるかどうか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Even if you tell me that... I've been kicking him for such a long time, I'm not sure if I can change my style so easily.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Even if you tell me that... I've been kicking him for such a long time, I'm not sure if I can change my style so easily.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「じゃあ、使い分けていこうよ。真人が人に迷惑かけた場合は蹴りでもいい。多分鈴も怒ってんだからね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Okay, then let's do it like this. When Masato is troubling other people, it's okay to kick him. Because you'd be angry then anyway, right?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Okay, then let's do it like this. When Masato is troubling other people, it's okay to kick him. Because you'd be angry then anyway, right?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「さっきみたいな天然のボケはチョップで」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝And when he just does something silly like earlier, you chop him.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝And when he just does something silly like earlier, you chop him.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「むずかしいな…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝That sounds difficult...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝That sounds difficult...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「ったく、頼むぜ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Seriously, I'm asking you too...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Seriously, I'm asking you too...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 言って、カレーうどんを勢いよく音をたててすする真人。
MESSAGE.EN: He started slurping down his curry udon noisily.
MESSAGE.Translation: He started slurping down his curry udon noisily.

MESSAGE.JP: カレーの汁が辺りに飛び散る。
MESSAGE.EN: That was making the soup fly all over.
MESSAGE.Translation: That was making the soup fly all over.

MESSAGE.JP: 今だ！
MESSAGE.EN: Now!
MESSAGE.Translation: Now!

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「あたしもカレーうどんだから、メニューかぶるだろ!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝I'm having curry udon, too! Why did you have to choose the same!!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝I'm having curry udon, too! Why did you have to choose the same!!❞

MESSAGE.JP: ばきぃ！
MESSAGE.EN: *WHAM*!
MESSAGE.Translation: *WHAM*!

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「いでぇっ！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝It hurts!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝It hurts!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「知るかよっっ!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝That's none of your business!!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝That's none of your business!!❞

MESSAGE.JP: …確かに。
MESSAGE.EN: ...He's right.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...He's right.

MESSAGE.JP: ＭＩＳＳ!!
MESSAGE.EN: MISS!!
MESSAGE.Translation: MISS!!

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「みんなの服に飛び散っただろ!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝You're dirtying everybody's clothes with that soup!!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝You're dirtying everybody's clothes with that soup!!❞

MESSAGE.JP: ばきぃ！
MESSAGE.EN: *WHAM*!
MESSAGE.Translation: *WHAM*!

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「まぁ、今のはやむをえまい…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Well, that one couldn't be helped...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Well, that one couldn't be helped...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「あぁ…俺のリトルバスターズジャンパーが…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝Ahhh... My Little Busters jumper...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝Ahhh... My Little Busters jumper...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾がものすごいブルーになっている…。
MESSAGE.EN: Kengo looked crestfallen...
MESSAGE.Translation: Kengo looked crestfallen...

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「ああ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝Yeah...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝Yeah...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「むしろおまえが浴びろ!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Why don't you bathe in the soup!!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Why don't you bathe in the soup!!❞

MESSAGE.JP: ばきぃ！
MESSAGE.EN: *WHAM*!
MESSAGE.Translation: *WHAM*!

MESSAGE.JP: ぼちゃん!!
MESSAGE.EN: *Kerplunk*!!
MESSAGE.Translation: *Kerplunk*!!

MESSAGE.JP: 真人の顔面がどんぶりに突っ込み…えらいことに…。
MESSAGE.EN: Her kick sunk Masato's face into the bowl... Oh my god...
MESSAGE.Translation: Her kick sunk Masato's face into the bowl... Oh my god...

MESSAGE.JP: ＭＩＳＳ!!
MESSAGE.EN: MISS!!
MESSAGE.Translation: MISS!!

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「汁とんだろ、こらぁ！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Don't splash the soup, you idiot!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Don't splash the soup, you idiot!❞

MESSAGE.JP: ばきぃ！
MESSAGE.EN: *WHAM*!
MESSAGE.Translation: *WHAM*!

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「まっだまだ早いですから！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝It was waaay too fast!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝It was waaay too fast!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「なんだとぅ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Whaat...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Whaat...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「でも、みんなに迷惑がかかっていたから、今のはよかったんじゃないか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝But he did bother everybody else, so I think it was all right.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝But he did bother everybody else, so I think it was all right.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ま、結果から言うとそうだね…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Yeah, you're right from that perspective...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Yeah, you're right from that perspective...❞

MESSAGE.JP: こうして、鈴は真人に対する的確なツッコミ方を覚えていった。
MESSAGE.EN: Like this, Rin learned how to give Masato a proper riposte.
MESSAGE.Translation: Like this, Rin learned how to give Masato a proper riposte.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@（…果たしてこれはなんなんだ？）
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@(...Just what did we accomplish by this, anyway?)
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@(...Just what did we accomplish by this, anyway?)

MESSAGE.JP: 時たま不安になりながら、僕は辛抱強く教えていった。
MESSAGE.EN: She did make me worry sometimes, but I kept teaching her patiently.
MESSAGE.Translation: She did make me worry sometimes, but I kept teaching her patiently.

MESSAGE.JP: ここまでは失敗続きだったけど、その後はようやく意図が伝わってきたのか、自然なツッコミを鈴は覚えていった。
MESSAGE.EN: Even though she had made a lot of mistakes, she was finally starting to understand the concept, and knew how to give a natural riposte.
MESSAGE.Translation: Even though she had made a lot of mistakes, she was finally starting to understand the concept, and knew how to give a natural riposte.

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「よっしゃ、飯いっか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝All right, let's go get lunch.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝All right, let's go get lunch.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人が立ち上がる。
MESSAGE.EN: Masato stood up.
MESSAGE.Translation: Masato stood up.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「うん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Yeah.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Yeah.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴も僕たちの後についてくる。
MESSAGE.EN: Rin also followed us.
MESSAGE.Translation: Rin also followed us.

MESSAGE.JP: なぜ、僕は中庭にいく、と選ぶことが出来なかったんだろう。
MESSAGE.EN: I wonder why I couldn't choose to go in the courtyard instead.
MESSAGE.Translation: I wonder why I couldn't choose to go in the courtyard instead.

MESSAGE.JP: そこに足を運ぶことは出来たはずなのに。
MESSAGE.EN: There was nothing to keep me from going there.
MESSAGE.Translation: There was nothing to keep me from going there.

MESSAGE.JP: …邪魔しちゃ悪いから、だろうか。
MESSAGE.EN: ...But, I'd probably just disturb Nishizono-san.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...But, I'd probably just disturb Nishizono-san.

MESSAGE.JP: 見たことがあるような、そんな顔を見たことも無いような、西園さんの笑顔が…一瞬頭に浮かんで消えた。
MESSAGE.EN: Her smile, that I wasn't sure if I'd ever seen or not, momentarily appeared in my mind and vanished again.
MESSAGE.Translation: Her smile, that I wasn't sure if I'd ever seen or not, momentarily appeared in my mind and vanished again.

MESSAGE.JP: 先を歩いていた謙吾と合流する。
MESSAGE.EN: We caught up with Kengo, who was walking ahead.
MESSAGE.Translation: We caught up with Kengo, who was walking ahead.

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「よぅ、謙吾っち。おまえは目立つからどこ歩いてても一発でわかるな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Yo, Kengocchi. It's pretty easy to spot you, you're so eye-catching these days.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Yo, Kengocchi. It's pretty easy to spot you, you're so eye-catching these days.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「ちなみにおまえもだぞ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝So are yourself.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝So are yourself.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 今や謙吾のほうが突飛で目立つ。
MESSAGE.EN: Kengo really stood out like a sore thumb now.
MESSAGE.Translation: Kengo really stood out like a sore thumb now.

MESSAGE.JP: そのふたりが並んで歩いてるんだから、すごい光景なんだろうなあ。僕は見慣れちゃったけど。
MESSAGE.EN: To see those two walking abreast would have been quite the sight if I weren't so used to it already.
MESSAGE.Translation: To see those two walking abreast would have been quite the sight if I weren't so used to it already.

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「小学校ん時は、お互いジャンプしてこの天井にタッチ競争してたってのに…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝When we were in elementary school, we'd jump and try to touch the ceiling...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝When we were in elementary school, we'd jump and try to touch the ceiling...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「今じゃ、手を伸ばすだけでついちまう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝But now we can do it by only stretching our arms.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝But now we can do it by only stretching our arms.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「時は何にも阻まれることなく進み、オレたちは成長し大きくなっていく…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝No one can stop the flow of time, and as we keep growing up and getting taller...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝No one can stop the flow of time, and as we keep growing up and getting taller...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人にしてはしんみりした話だ。
MESSAGE.EN: He was speaking fondly.
MESSAGE.Translation: He was speaking fondly.

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「そのうち頭もずりずり天井に引きずりながら歩くことになんのかな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝One day we might be dragging our heads on the ceiling as we walk along.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝One day we might be dragging our heads on the ceiling as we walk along.❞

MESSAGE.JP: あほだ！
MESSAGE.EN: As if!
MESSAGE.Translation: As if!

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「そこまででかくはならんだろう…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝I don't think we'll get that tall...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝I don't think we'll get that tall...❞

MESSAGE.JP: みんなそれぞれ思い思いのメニューをトレイに載せ、席につく。
MESSAGE.EN: Everybody ordered their lunch and took seats.
MESSAGE.Translation: Everybody ordered their lunch and took seats.

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「いっただきまーす!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Let's eat!!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Let's eat!!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 言って、カレーうどんを勢いよく音をたててすする真人。
MESSAGE.EN: He started slurping down his curry udon noisily.
MESSAGE.Translation: He started slurping down his curry udon noisily.

MESSAGE.JP: カレーの汁が辺りに飛び散る。
MESSAGE.EN: That was making the soup fly all over.
MESSAGE.Translation: That was making the soup fly all over.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ちょっとちょっと…そんな風に食べたらみんなに飛び散るでしょ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Hey, tone it down a little. You're getting the soup on everyone's clothes...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Hey, tone it down a little. You're getting the soup on everyone's clothes...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「あぁ…俺のリトルバスターズジャンパーが…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝Uuhh... My Little Busters jumper...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝Uuhh... My Little Busters jumper...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾がものすごいブルーになっている…。
MESSAGE.EN: Kengo looked crestfallen...
MESSAGE.Translation: Kengo looked crestfallen...

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「まあ、たまにはおとなしく食えよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Enjoy your lunch quietly for once.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Enjoy your lunch quietly for once.❞

MESSAGE.JP: …さすがと言うか、恭介は即座にトレイを盾代わりにして、事なきを得ていたようだ。
MESSAGE.EN: ...That's our Kyousuke. He'd used his tray to shield himself from the soup assault.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...That's our Kyousuke. He'd used his tray to shield himself from the soup assault.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「やー、おはよーさーん、皆の衆」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Ya, morning, everybody.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Ya, morning, everybody.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 声に振り向く。
MESSAGE.EN: The voice made me turn around.
MESSAGE.Translation: The voice made me turn around.

MESSAGE.JP: 葉留佳さんだった。
MESSAGE.EN: It was Haruka-san.
MESSAGE.Translation: It was Haruka-san.

MESSAGE.JP: 葉留佳さんも今日のお昼はここで食べることにしたらしい。
MESSAGE.EN: It looked like she'd also decided to have her lunch here.
MESSAGE.Translation: It looked like she'd also decided to have her lunch here.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「ご機嫌麗しゅうございますな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝You all look full of energy.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝You all look full of energy.❞

MESSAGE.JP: あやしい言葉遣いで葉留佳さんは鈴の隣に座る。
MESSAGE.EN: She took a seat next to Rin.
MESSAGE.Translation: She took a seat next to Rin.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「あれ、ひとりなの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝You came here alone?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝You came here alone?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「いやー、それがですね、話すと長くなるのですが…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Well, it's a long story...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Well, it's a long story...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「よぉーし、今日は姉御とらぶらぶランチターイムといきますかっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Okay, I'm gonna enjoy a lovey-dovey lunch time with Anego today!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Okay, I'm gonna enjoy a lovey-dovey lunch time with Anego today!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「姉御、どこにいるかなぁ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Anego, where are you...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Anego, where are you...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「ランチタイム、ランチターイム、と…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Lunch time, lunch taaimu...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Lunch time, lunch taaimu...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `女子生徒@「それで、お母さんテキパキやれってうるさくて…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Schoolgirl@❝And, my mother kept telling me to do it presto.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Schoolgirl@❝And, my mother kept telling me to do it presto.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「てきぱき？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Presto?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Presto?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「おや、どうした葉留佳君」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Oh, what's up, Haruka-kun?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Oh, what's up, Haruka-kun?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「姉御っ、探してたんですヨ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Anego, I've been looking for ya.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Anego, I've been looking for ya.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「ふむ？　何か用か？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Hmm? Did you want something?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Hmm? Did you want something?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「てきぱきってなに？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝What is ❛presto❜?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝What is ❛presto❜?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「物事を何一つ滞ることなく速やかに進行させる様子、動きの機敏な様を表す語だ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝The word means doing something very quickly, without delay.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝The word means doing something very quickly, without delay.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「いや、そうじゃなくて…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝No, that's not what I meant...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝No, that's not what I meant...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「てきとぱきってなに!?」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝What are these ❛pres❜ and ❛to.❜❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝What are these ❛pres❜ and ❛to.❜❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「こう、『さっさと』って言われると早そうじゃないデスか。さーっ、さぁーって」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝I mean, if someone told me to ❛get to it, chop-chop❜ that'd totally instill a sense of urgency in me, I just don't know how to get in the mood from something like ❛pres❜ and ❛to.❜❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝I mean, if someone told me to ❛get to it, chop-chop❜ that'd totally instill a sense of urgency in me, I just don't know how to get in the mood from something like ❛pres❜ and ❛to.❜❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「よく考えてみたら、てきーっ、とか、ぱきーっ、とか意味わからないんですヨっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝These ❛pres❜ and ❛to❜ just don't make any sense to me in this context.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝These ❛pres❜ and ❛to❜ just don't make any sense to me in this context.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「てき？　てき…テキサス？　違うな…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Pres... president? No, that's not it...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Pres... president? No, that's not it...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「ぱき…パキ～ッて感じ？　折れてるなぁ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝To... is it some kind of sound effect...? No, it sounds more like something you shout in martial arts...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝To... is it some kind of sound effect...? No, it sounds more like something you shout in martial arts...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「あっ!!　テキーラとパキスタン!!　なんか速そう!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Ah!! It must be press and tonic!! They both sound fast somehow!!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Ah!! It must be press and tonic!! They both sound fast somehow!!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「って姉御いないーっ!?」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Whaaat, Anego has vanished!?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Whaaat, Anego has vanished!?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「というわけで、考えてるうちにひとりになってたんですヨ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝And that's how I came to be alone now.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝And that's how I came to be alone now.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「…すごく時間の無駄をした気がするよ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...I feel like I've just wasted a lot of my time...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...I feel like I've just wasted a lot of my time...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 中身のまったくない話だった。
MESSAGE.EN: There was completely no content in her story.
MESSAGE.Translation: There was completely no content in her story.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「脈絡ない思考は程々にしたほうがいいんじゃないかなぁ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I think it'd work better if you established some kind of cohesive links between the things you say.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I think it'd work better if you established some kind of cohesive links between the things you say.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「ねーねー、理樹くん、$K107甜茶（てんちゃ）$K0買ってきてー、甜茶」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Say, Riki-kun. Can you get me $K107Tencha tea$K0, please?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Say, Riki-kun. Can you get me $K107Tencha tea$K0, please?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 早速脈絡がなかった！
MESSAGE.EN: She didn't listen to my advice at all!
MESSAGE.Translation: She didn't listen to my advice at all!

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「なんで僕が買いに行かなくちゃいけないのさ、というかどうして甜茶？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Why do I have to buy that for you? And why Tencha tea, in the first place?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Why do I have to buy that for you? And why Tencha tea, in the first place?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「今花粉症になったから」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝I've got hay fever now.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝I've got hay fever now.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「全然目も赤くないし鼻ぐしゅぐしゅしてないしちっとも辛そうじゃないよね？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Even though your eyes aren't red, your nose isn't running, and you don't look pained at all?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Even though your eyes aren't red, your nose isn't running, and you don't look pained at all?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「ほろほろぐしゅぐしゅつらつらっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Cough cough, sneeze sneeze, foomp foomp.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Cough cough, sneeze sneeze, foomp foomp.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「口で言ってるだけじゃないかそれ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝You're just saying that...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝You're just saying that...❞

MESSAGE.JP: それに『つらつら』ってなんだ…。
MESSAGE.EN: And what does ❛foomp foomp❜ even stand for...
MESSAGE.Translation: And what does ❛foomp foomp❜ even stand for...

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「もー、理樹くんツカエナーイ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝You're so useless, Riki-kun.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝You're so useless, Riki-kun.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 葉留佳さんは椅子に座ったまま、バタバタと足を上下させた。
MESSAGE.EN: Haruka-san was swinging her legs up and down, sitting in her chair.
MESSAGE.Translation: Haruka-san was swinging her legs up and down, sitting in her chair.

MESSAGE.JP: ゼブラ模様のニーソックスに包まれた足をばたつかせている様子は小さな子供みたいだった。
MESSAGE.EN: She looked just like a little girl, impatiently swinging those legs wrapped in striped knee socks.
MESSAGE.Translation: She looked just like a little girl, impatiently swinging those legs wrapped in striped knee socks.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「飲みたーい。甜茶飲みたーい」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Wanna get. Wanna get some Techa tea.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Wanna get. Wanna get some Techa tea.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「そんなわがまま言われても…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝How can you be that selfish...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝How can you be that selfish...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「いいじゃないか。ちょっと買ってきてやれよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Why don't you just do it, it's not such a big deal.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Why don't you just do it, it's not such a big deal.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「理樹くんガンバレー」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Riki-kun, go for it.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Riki-kun, go for it.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「そんなのんきなことしてる間にお昼休み終わっちゃうよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Lunch break would end before I make it back.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Lunch break would end before I make it back.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「二人とも、うっさい」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Both of you, too noisy!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Both of you, too noisy!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴が声をあげる。
MESSAGE.EN: Rin shouted.
MESSAGE.Translation: Rin shouted.

MESSAGE.JP: その声の中に鈴の不機嫌そうな気配を察したのか、葉留佳さんが言った。
MESSAGE.EN: Sensing Rin's bad temper from her voice, Haruka-san appeased her.
MESSAGE.Translation: Sensing Rin's bad temper from her voice, Haruka-san appeased her.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「あ…ごめんね鈴ちゃん。騒がしくして」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Uh... Sorry, Rin-chan. Yes, we were too noisy.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Uh... Sorry, Rin-chan. Yes, we were too noisy.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「ついでにジャスミンティーも頼む、理樹」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Get me jasmine tea while you're at it, Riki.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Get me jasmine tea while you're at it, Riki.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「…鈴、やっぱり僕の話聞いてないね…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...Rin, you didn't listen to me at all...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...Rin, you didn't listen to me at all...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「そういえば三枝、手ぶらに見えるが…昼食を食べにきたんじゃないのか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝Speaking of which, Saigusa, didn't you come here to have lunch?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝Speaking of which, Saigusa, didn't you come here to have lunch?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「え、あ!?」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Eh, uh!?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Eh, uh!?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 葉留佳さんは慌ててブレザーのポケットに手を突っ込んでいる。
MESSAGE.EN: She hastily thrust a hand into her blazer pocket.
MESSAGE.Translation: She hastily thrust a hand into her blazer pocket.

MESSAGE.JP: それからスカートのポケットに両手を、ずぼっと入れて探しているようだ。
MESSAGE.EN: Then she dug both her hands into the pockets of her skirt.
MESSAGE.Translation: Then she dug both her hands into the pockets of her skirt.

MESSAGE.JP: 弁当箱なんかそんなとこに入りそうにないし。
MESSAGE.EN: It'd be impossible to keep a lunch box in a place like that, though.
MESSAGE.Translation: It'd be impossible to keep a lunch box in a place like that, though.

MESSAGE.JP: パンか何か入れているのだろうか？
MESSAGE.EN: Did she have bread or something somewhere?
MESSAGE.Translation: Did she have bread or something somewhere?

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「ありゃ？　あれれ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Eh? Huh?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Eh? Huh?❞

MESSAGE.JP: ブレザーのボタンをぷちぷち外している……って。
MESSAGE.EN: She started undoing the buttons on her blazer... HEY, HOLD ON!
MESSAGE.Translation: She started undoing the buttons on her blazer... HEY, HOLD ON!

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「うわぁ！　な、何してるのさ、葉留佳さんっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Uwaa! W, what are you doing, Haruka-san!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Uwaa! W, what are you doing, Haruka-san!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「あれー、おかしいなぁ。確かに入れたのに」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝That's weird. I'm sure I put it into a pocket.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝That's weird. I'm sure I put it into a pocket.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「どこか廊下に落としてきたんじゃないのか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝You might've dropped it in the hallway.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝You might've dropped it in the hallway.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「んー、そうかも…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Hmm. Could be...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Hmm. Could be...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「探してくるよ～」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝I'll go and search.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝I'll go and search.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 葉留佳さんは席から立ち上がった。
MESSAGE.EN: She stood up.
MESSAGE.Translation: She stood up.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「…ねぇ理樹くん。ちょっとちょっと」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝...Hey, Riki-kun. Come with me for a bit.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝...Hey, Riki-kun. Come with me for a bit.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「いた、何？　耳引っ張らないでよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Ouch. What? Don't pull on my ear.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Ouch. What? Don't pull on my ear.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 葉留佳さんは僕を壁際まで連れて行く。
MESSAGE.EN: She took me a little ways away from the table.
MESSAGE.Translation: She took me a little ways away from the table.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「ちょっと探すの手伝って」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Can you help me look?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Can you help me look?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「あ、うん…そのつもりだったけど」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Er, yeah... that was my intention.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Er, yeah... that was my intention.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「さっすが理樹くん！　カワイソウな女の子をほっておけないナイスガイ！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝How kind! You really are a nice guy who can't resist helping a poor maiden in need.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝How kind! You really are a nice guy who can't resist helping a poor maiden in need.❞

MESSAGE.JP: この子に言われると全然誉められてる気がしない。
MESSAGE.EN: When it's coming from this girl, it doesn't feel like praise at all.
MESSAGE.Translation: When it's coming from this girl, it doesn't feel like praise at all.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「誰がカワイソウだって？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Who's a poor maiden here?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Who's a poor maiden here?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「私」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Me.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Me.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 葉留佳さんはびしりと自分の顔を指差した。
MESSAGE.EN: She firmly pointed at her own face.
MESSAGE.Translation: She firmly pointed at her own face.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「可愛いぞぅ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝I'm irresistible.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝I'm irresistible.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「それ微妙にニュアンス違うし、第一、間違えてるよね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝There's a wild semantic gap from the first thing to the other, and the basis isn't true to begin with, is it?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝There's a wild semantic gap from the first thing to the other, and the basis isn't true to begin with, is it?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「自分で可愛いとかいうのはどうかと思うよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝And you shouldn't say you're irresistible about yourself.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝And you shouldn't say you're irresistible about yourself.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「あはは」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Ahaha.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Ahaha.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 葉留佳さんは朗らかに笑った。
MESSAGE.EN: She laughed merrily.
MESSAGE.Translation: She laughed merrily.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「美人だぞぅ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝I'm a beauty.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝I'm a beauty.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「前から思ってたけどやっぱしひとの話を聞いてないね、葉留佳さんも」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Haruka-san, you don't listen to others either, do you?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Haruka-san, you don't listen to others either, do you?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「失礼な。私だって人の話は聞くよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝How rude. I do listen to others.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝How rude. I do listen to others.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「たとえば？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Give me an example?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Give me an example?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「たとえばそうだね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝An example? Let me see.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝An example? Let me see.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 葉留佳さんは額に左手の人差し指を当てて考えこんだ。
MESSAGE.EN: She pondered with a finger on her forehead.
MESSAGE.Translation: She pondered with a finger on her forehead.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「んー」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Hmm.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Hmm.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「理樹くんは落としモノ探しに付き合ってくれるいいひとだ、ってね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Riki-kun is a kind and nice guy for helping her look for her missing thing.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Riki-kun is a kind and nice guy for helping her look for her missing thing.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「なに、それ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝What are you saying?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝What are you saying?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「なに、って今言ったとおりの意味しかないけど」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝What, are there different ways you can interpret it?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝What, are there different ways you can interpret it?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「僕が言ってるのはそういう他人についての話、という意味じゃなくてね…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I don't mean things someone else's said about someone else...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I don't mean things someone else's said about someone else...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 言いかけて僕は気がついた。
MESSAGE.EN: I realized something mid-sentence.
MESSAGE.Translation: I realized something mid-sentence.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「誰がそんなこと言ってるの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Who was it that said that?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Who was it that said that?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「さぁ、誰でしょう？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Now who might it have been?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Now who might it have been?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「理樹くん、行くよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Riki-kun, let's go.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Riki-kun, let's go.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「あー、はいはい」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Uh, okay, okay.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Uh, okay, okay.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 僕はドアを閉め、葉留佳さんと歩き出した。
MESSAGE.EN: I closed the door and followed after her.
MESSAGE.Translation: I closed the door and followed after her.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「それで、弁当は何？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝So what did you get for lunch?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝So what did you get for lunch?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「見つけたらわけてあげるよー」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝I'll split it with you when we find it.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝I'll split it with you when we find it.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「別にいいってば」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝No thank you.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝No thank you.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「えー。美味しいからあげるよー」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Ehh. You should eat it, it's really delicious.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Ehh. You should eat it, it's really delicious.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「い・ら・な・いっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝No, thank you very much.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝No, thank you very much.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「ちぇ～っ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Tsk～.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Tsk～.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「それより、何か思い当たることはないの？　どのへんで落とした、とか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Do you remember anything? Like where you might've dropped it?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Do you remember anything? Like where you might've dropped it?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「ん～…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Hmm...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Hmm...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 葉留佳さんはまた考え込んでいる。
MESSAGE.EN: Haruka-san started pondering again.
MESSAGE.Translation: Haruka-san started pondering again.

MESSAGE.JP: 考え込む間にも右手は意味もなくふらふら動いている。
MESSAGE.EN: She was meaninglessly swinging around her right arm.
MESSAGE.Translation: She was meaninglessly swinging around her right arm.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「特別教室だったからね、授業」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Last class was in the special classroom.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Last class was in the special classroom.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「そのあと、購買部寄るためにぐるっと回った、かな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝After that, I headed for the school store to buy some food.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝After that, I headed for the school store to buy some food.❞

MESSAGE.JP: くるり、と右手の人差し指で宙に円を描きながら言う。
MESSAGE.EN: She drew a circle in the air with her right index finger.
MESSAGE.Translation: She drew a circle in the air with her right index finger.

MESSAGE.JP: 頭の中の地図をなぞっているかのようだ。
MESSAGE.EN: It looked like she was tracing a map in her mind while speaking.
MESSAGE.Translation: It looked like she was tracing a map in her mind while speaking.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「昼の購買ワゴンは特別教室までは回ってこないよね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝The lunch wagon doesn't go to the special classrooms.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝The lunch wagon doesn't go to the special classrooms.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「そうそう。だから買いに行ったのですヨ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Yeah. So I went to the store.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Yeah. So I went to the store.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 当然、昼間近の授業が体育だったり特別教室の授業であれば購買部へ行く必要がある。
MESSAGE.EN: If you had P.E. before lunch, or had your class in the special classrooms, you had to visit the school store if you wanted to buy a packed lunch.
MESSAGE.Translation: If you had P.E. before lunch, or had your class in the special classrooms, you had to visit the school store if you wanted to buy a packed lunch.

MESSAGE.JP: 僕は葉留佳さんの後ろを歩く。
MESSAGE.EN: I was walking behind her.
MESSAGE.Translation: I was walking behind her.

MESSAGE.JP: スカートから突き出ている足を包んでいるのはゼブラ模様のニーソックス。
MESSAGE.EN: Her legs coming from under the skirt were covered with stripe-patterned knee socks.
MESSAGE.Translation: Her legs coming from under the skirt were covered with stripe-patterned knee socks.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「んー、ないなぁ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Hmm, no sign of it.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Hmm, no sign of it.❞

MESSAGE.JP: きょろきょろと下を向きながら歩く葉留佳さん。
MESSAGE.EN: Haruka-san was walking down the hallway with her face down, looking about.
MESSAGE.Translation: Haruka-san was walking down the hallway with her face down, looking about.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「ねぇ、理樹くん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Hey, Riki-kun.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Hey, Riki-kun.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「え、あ、うん？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Eh, uh, yes?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Eh, uh, yes?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 毎日同じ模様みたいだけど、同じものをやっぱり何十本も持っているのだろうか？
MESSAGE.EN: The pattern seems the same every day. I wonder if she has like a dozen identical pairs.
MESSAGE.Translation: The pattern seems the same every day. I wonder if she has like a dozen identical pairs.

MESSAGE.JP: 校則ではソックスの指定があったかどうか、少し記憶にない。
MESSAGE.EN: I couldn't remember for sure whether there was a school regulation about socks.
MESSAGE.Translation: I couldn't remember for sure whether there was a school regulation about socks.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「ちゃんと探してくれてる？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Are you seriously looking?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Are you seriously looking?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「…もちろんだよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...I sure am.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...I sure am.❞

MESSAGE.JP: リノリウムの床はとても綺麗で、ゴミ一つ落ちていない。
MESSAGE.EN: The linoleum floor of the hallway was very clean, it didn't have a spec of dust.
MESSAGE.Translation: The linoleum floor of the hallway was very clean, it didn't have a spec of dust.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「何も落ちてないね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Nothing here.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Nothing here.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 特別教室の２階は人の行き来が少ないのだろうか？
MESSAGE.EN: Shouldn't there be some traffic here on the second floor of the special classrooms?
MESSAGE.Translation: Shouldn't there be some traffic here on the second floor of the special classrooms?

MESSAGE.JP: 本当に綺麗だ。
MESSAGE.EN: The whole floor looked perfectly clean.
MESSAGE.Translation: The whole floor looked perfectly clean.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「…今日は、こっちの校舎の清掃日だからだよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝...There was a big clean-up of this whole school building today.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝...There was a big clean-up of this whole school building today.❞

MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Eh?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Eh?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 僕は床から視線をあげる。
MESSAGE.EN: I lifted my eyes up.
MESSAGE.Translation: I lifted my eyes up.

MESSAGE.JP: 葉留佳さんは僕のほうを見ると笑った。
MESSAGE.EN: She gave a laugh as our eyes met.
MESSAGE.Translation: She gave a laugh as our eyes met.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「業者のひとがお昼から入るんだよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝A cleaning company came around noon.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝A cleaning company came around noon.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「月に一回だけね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝They do it once a month.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝They do it once a month.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「そうだったんだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I see.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I see.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 全然知らなかった。
MESSAGE.EN: I had no idea.
MESSAGE.Translation: I had no idea.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「掃除当番はねー、コストダウンのためなのデスヨ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝The reason students clean this floor is to cut costs.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝The reason students clean this floor is to cut costs.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「コストダウン？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Cut costs?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Cut costs?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「そー。すごく汚れていたらお金かかるでしょ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Yea. The more messed up the floor gets, the more it costs to have it cleaned.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Yea. The more messed up the floor gets, the more it costs to have it cleaned.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「だから生徒にさせているというワケ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝That's why the students are made to do it.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝That's why the students are made to do it.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「ジョーソーキョウイクにもなるし、一石二鳥、ときたもんだっと」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Besides, doing that helps develop good habits in the students, so it's killing two birds with one stone.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Besides, doing that helps develop good habits in the students, so it's killing two birds with one stone.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 葉留佳さんは、床を探しながら呟いた。
MESSAGE.EN: She muttered while searching the floor.
MESSAGE.Translation: She muttered while searching the floor.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「ワックス掛けは最後ね。放課後からだから」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Waxing the floor is the last thing. They start it after school is over.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Waxing the floor is the last thing. They start it after school is over.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 葉留佳さんは妙なことに詳しいなぁ、と僕は思った。
MESSAGE.EN: Haruka-san is well-informed about the strangest things, I thought to myself.
MESSAGE.Translation: Haruka-san is well-informed about the strangest things, I thought to myself.

MESSAGE.JP: 不思議そうな僕の顔を見て取ったのか、葉留佳さんは言う。
MESSAGE.EN: She answered, as though mysteriously perceiving from my expression what I was wondering about.
MESSAGE.Translation: She answered, as though mysteriously perceiving from my expression what I was wondering about.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「ふっふっふっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Fu fu fu.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Fu fu fu.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 葉留佳さんは、腰に両手を当ててふんぞり返った。
MESSAGE.EN: She put her hands on her waist and threw her head back.
MESSAGE.Translation: She put her hands on her waist and threw her head back.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「うちのクラスの掃除当番、ここらへんが多かったりするから」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝My class is often in charge of the cleaning duty for this floor.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝My class is often in charge of the cleaning duty for this floor.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「手抜きをしていい日はわかるというワケですよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝So we know when the day is when we can slack off.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝So we know when the day is when we can slack off.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「…なんだ、そんなことか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...Such a stupid reason.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...Such a stupid reason.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 僕は苦笑した。
MESSAGE.EN: I gave a wry smile.
MESSAGE.Translation: I gave a wry smile.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「そんなこととは失敬だなー。掃除当番めんどくさいんだからね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝What a rude thing you're saying. Cleanup duty is a real pain, you know.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝What a rude thing you're saying. Cleanup duty is a real pain, you know.❞

MESSAGE.JP: ぴん、と指を一本立てて言う葉留佳さん。
MESSAGE.EN: She shook her finger, admonishing me.
MESSAGE.Translation: She shook her finger, admonishing me.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「それは、そうかもだけど」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Be that as it may.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Be that as it may.❞

MESSAGE.JP: ２階の廊下をずっと歩いていても何もない。
MESSAGE.EN: We two spent a long time searching through the second floor corridor, but found nothing.
MESSAGE.Translation: We two spent a long time searching through the second floor corridor, but found nothing.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「…今思ったんだけどさ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...I've just realized something.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...I've just realized something.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「何かな？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝What is it?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝What is it?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「廊下が綺麗ってことはさ、もう業者のひとの掃除終わってるってことだよね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝As you can see, the hallway is all cleaned up, so that means they already finished cleaning, doesn't it?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝As you can see, the hallway is all cleaned up, so that means they already finished cleaning, doesn't it?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「うん。さっき言ったとおりね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Yeah, I already told you so.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Yeah, I already told you so.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「何か落ちてても拾われてるんじゃないの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝And if they found something, they should have picked it up.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝And if they found something, they should have picked it up.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「あーっ！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Ahhh!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Ahhh!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 葉留佳さんはぴょん、と飛び上がった。
MESSAGE.EN: She ceased looking and jumped up.
MESSAGE.Translation: She ceased looking and jumped up.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「なるほどっ。それはごモットモですナ。さすが理樹くん、頭いいねぇ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Yes, you're exactly right! That's my Riki-kun, you know how to use your head.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Yes, you're exactly right! That's my Riki-kun, you know how to use your head.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「いや、というかなんで気がつかなかったんだろ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I wonder why I didn't realize that until now.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I wonder why I didn't realize that until now.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「じゃー捨てられてるかなー。弱ったなー」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝They must've thrown it away. What a headache...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝They must've thrown it away. What a headache...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「三百円は痛いなー」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝It hurts to part with my 300 yen...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝It hurts to part with my 300 yen...❞

MESSAGE.JP: …とりあえず、被害は割と軽度ですむようだった。
MESSAGE.EN: ...It seems she hadn't incurred particularly grave damage.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...It seems she hadn't incurred particularly grave damage.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「どうするの？　購買部でまた買う？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝What are you gonna do now? Go to the store again?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝What are you gonna do now? Go to the store again?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「んー。いいや。今日はお昼抜きにしますヨ。今月ピンチだし」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Hmm, nah. I'm on a tight budget this month, so I'll just go without lunch today.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Hmm, nah. I'm on a tight budget this month, so I'll just go without lunch today.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「あー。今日は厄日かもしれないなー…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Ah. Today seems to be a black letter day for me...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Ah. Today seems to be a black letter day for me...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「お腹空いたな～…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝So hungry～...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝So hungry～...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 葉留佳さんは自分のお腹に手を当ててしょんぼりとうなだれた。
MESSAGE.EN: Haruka-san held her stomach, looking disheartened.
MESSAGE.Translation: Haruka-san held her stomach, looking disheartened.

MESSAGE.JP: きゅ～、という可愛い音が鳴った。
MESSAGE.EN: *Kyu～*, her stomach made a cute sound.
MESSAGE.Translation: *Kyu～*, her stomach made a cute sound.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「…あはは」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝...Ahaha.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝...Ahaha.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 葉留佳さんは照れくさそうに笑った。
MESSAGE.EN: She laughed to hide her embarrassment.
MESSAGE.Translation: She laughed to hide her embarrassment.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「…というわけで、戻ろうか、理樹くん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝...So, let's get going back, shall we, Riki-kun?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝...So, let's get going back, shall we, Riki-kun?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「そうだね、そうしよう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Okay, let's do that.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Okay, let's do that.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「みんな、ご飯わけてくれないかなー」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝I wonder if the others would give me a little of their lunch.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝I wonder if the others would give me a little of their lunch.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「頼んでみたらどう？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Why not ask?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Why not ask?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「そうするー」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝I'll give it a shot.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝I'll give it a shot.❞

MESSAGE.JP: そんなわけで、葉留佳さんはみんなから少しずつご飯を分けてもらい、何とか昼食をとれたのだった。
MESSAGE.EN: In the end, everyone pitched in with a bit of their food, and it all somehow added up to a balanced lunch.
MESSAGE.Translation: In the end, everyone pitched in with a bit of their food, and it all somehow added up to a balanced lunch.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「いや、今ご飯食べてるから…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝No, I'm having my lunch right now...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝No, I'm having my lunch right now...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「まー、しょうがないかー」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Well, it can't be helped...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Well, it can't be helped...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「食べた後なら、すぐ手伝うけど」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I can help you once I'm done eating.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I can help you once I'm done eating.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「んー、どっちかっていうと今すぐだからナァ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Hmm, but I need your help right now.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Hmm, but I need your help right now.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「ま、来た道戻るだけだから、ひとりでもだいじょうぶかなぁ～」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Well, I only have to retrace my steps, so guess I'll be fine by myself.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Well, I only have to retrace my steps, so guess I'll be fine by myself.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「じゃ、また後でっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝See you later, then!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝See you later, then!❞

MESSAGE.JP: …葉留佳さんは去っていった。
MESSAGE.EN: ...She took off.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...She took off.

MESSAGE.JP: 探し物くらい手伝ってあげればよかったかも。
MESSAGE.EN: Maybe I should have given her a hand... She only needed help looking, after all.
MESSAGE.Translation: Maybe I should have given her a hand... She only needed help looking, after all.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「いや、今ご飯食べてるし、その後さすらいたいんだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝No, I'm having my lunch right now, and after that I'll be wandering around.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝No, I'm having my lunch right now, and after that I'll be wandering around.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「さすらうんだったら、仕方ないデスネ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝I guess it can't be helped then, if you're going wandering.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝I guess it can't be helped then, if you're going wandering.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「ま、来た道戻るだけだから、ひとりでもだいじょうぶかなぁ～」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Well, I only have to retrace my steps, so guess I'll be fine by myself.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Well, I only have to retrace my steps, so guess I'll be fine by myself.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「じゃ、また後でっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝See you later, then!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝See you later, then!❞

MESSAGE.JP: …葉留佳さんは去っていった。
MESSAGE.EN: ...She took off.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...She took off.

MESSAGE.JP: 探し物くらい手伝ってあげればよかったかも。
MESSAGE.EN: Maybe I should have given her a hand... She only needed help looking, after all.
MESSAGE.Translation: Maybe I should have given her a hand... She only needed help looking, after all.

MESSAGE.JP: まあ、今の僕はそれよりバトルだ。
MESSAGE.EN: But. more than that, I thirst for battle.
MESSAGE.Translation: But. more than that, I thirst for battle.

MESSAGE.JP: 休み時間。
MESSAGE.EN: Recess time.
MESSAGE.Translation: Recess time.

MESSAGE.JP: 僕はひとりでぼ～っと、窓の向こうの空を見ていた。
MESSAGE.EN: I spaced out and stared at the sky outside the window.
MESSAGE.Translation: I spaced out and stared at the sky outside the window.

MESSAGE.JP: 何もする気になれない。
MESSAGE.EN: I didn't feel like doing anything.
MESSAGE.Translation: I didn't feel like doing anything.

MESSAGE.JP: 早く沙耶さんに会いたいな…。
MESSAGE.EN: I wanted to see Saya-san as soon as possible...
MESSAGE.Translation: I wanted to see Saya-san as soon as possible...

MESSAGE.JP: 考えることはそればかりだった。
MESSAGE.EN: That's all I could think about.
MESSAGE.Translation: That's all I could think about.

MESSAGE.JP: チャイムが鳴ると同時に隣の席の真人と談笑。
MESSAGE.EN: Masato and I were chatting as the chime rang.
MESSAGE.Translation: Masato and I were chatting as the chime rang.

MESSAGE.JP: また喉が渇いてきたな…。
MESSAGE.EN: I feel thirsty again...
MESSAGE.Translation: I feel thirsty again...

MESSAGE.JP: いつものようにジュースを買いに行こう。
MESSAGE.EN: I think I'm going to buy something to drink.
MESSAGE.Translation: I think I'm going to buy something to drink.

MESSAGE.JP: 席を立つと、ふと目に入るものが。
MESSAGE.EN: As I got to my feet, something suddenly caught my eye.
MESSAGE.Translation: As I got to my feet, something suddenly caught my eye.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「あれ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Huh...?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Huh...?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 教室のドアから、黒い猫が顔を覗かせていた。
MESSAGE.EN: There was a black cat peeping in at the classroom door.
MESSAGE.Translation: There was a black cat peeping in at the classroom door.

MESSAGE.JP: …鈴の猫だろうか。
MESSAGE.EN: ...Is that one of Rin's cats?
MESSAGE.Translation: ...Is that one of Rin's cats?

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@（校舎の中に入ってきてたら、まずいよなぁ）
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@(It can get bad if they come into the school building.)
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@(It can get bad if they come into the school building.)

MESSAGE.JP: ひとまず外に連れ出そう。
MESSAGE.EN: I should take him out, for now.
MESSAGE.Translation: I should take him out, for now.

MESSAGE.JP: なるべく周りに気付かれないように、その猫を抱きかかえた。
MESSAGE.EN: Trying not to draw my classmates' attention, I picked the cat up.
MESSAGE.Translation: Trying not to draw my classmates' attention, I picked the cat up.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「…さて」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...Well.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...Well.❞

MESSAGE.JP: せっかくだし、鈴のところまで連れて行ってやろう。
MESSAGE.EN: It's a bit of a pain, but I'd better take him to Rin.
MESSAGE.Translation: It's a bit of a pain, but I'd better take him to Rin.

MESSAGE.JP: でも、こんなやついたっけ…？
MESSAGE.EN: But, did she really have a cat like this...?
MESSAGE.Translation: But, did she really have a cat like this...?

MESSAGE.JP: 考えながら、渡り廊下の方へ向かう。
MESSAGE.EN: Pondering on that, I headed for the connecting corridor.
