MESSAGE.Translation: She said coyly when I gave her the cup back.

MESSAGE.JP: そのコップに、ふたたびお茶を注いだ。
MESSAGE.EN: Then she filled the cup again.
MESSAGE.Translation: Then she filled the cup again.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「えっ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Eh...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Eh...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 思わず声を出す僕を気にする風もなく、西園さんは口をつける。
MESSAGE.EN: Without paying me any mind, she brought it to her lips.
MESSAGE.Translation: Without paying me any mind, she brought it to her lips.

MESSAGE.JP: 僕が飲んだのとは、反対側だ。
MESSAGE.EN: She was drinking from the side my mouth hadn't touched.
MESSAGE.Translation: She was drinking from the side my mouth hadn't touched.

MESSAGE.JP: …残念。
MESSAGE.EN: ...What a pity.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...What a pity.

MESSAGE.JP: …って、僕は何を考えてるんだ…。
MESSAGE.EN: ...Wait, what am I thinking...
MESSAGE.Translation: ...Wait, what am I thinking...

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「ほぅ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝Haah.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝Haah.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴の転がるような声で、息を吐いた。
MESSAGE.EN: Nishizono-san let out a satisfied breath.
MESSAGE.Translation: Nishizono-san let out a satisfied breath.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「…西園さん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...Nishizono-san.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...Nishizono-san.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「はい？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝Yes?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝Yes?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「いや、なんでもないよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝No, never mind.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝No, never mind.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 気にされると、なんかつらい。
MESSAGE.EN: I shouldn't spoil her mood without reason.
MESSAGE.Translation: I shouldn't spoil her mood without reason.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「みおちーん、私も喉かわいたー」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Mio-chin, I've gotten thirsty, too.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Mio-chin, I've gotten thirsty, too.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 横から手を出して、葉留佳さんがコップを受け取る。
MESSAGE.EN: Nishizono-san poured tea into a cup again and handed it to Haruka-san.
MESSAGE.Translation: Nishizono-san poured tea into a cup again and handed it to Haruka-san.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「…って、熱っ！　何このテヤンデーバーロみたいな熱さはっ！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝...Ho, hot! What's with this ❛Watcha doin, bastard!❜ -class hotness!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝...Ho, hot! What's with this ❛Watcha doin, bastard!❜ -class hotness!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 吹き出しはしなかったがやっぱり脈絡のないことを言っている。
MESSAGE.EN: She didn't spit it out though, so what she was saying sounded completely out of context.
MESSAGE.Translation: She didn't spit it out though, so what she was saying sounded completely out of context.

MESSAGE.JP: 江戸っ子みたいだと言いたいのだろうか？
MESSAGE.EN: Was that supposed to be an imitation of an angry hoodlum just now?
MESSAGE.Translation: Was that supposed to be an imitation of an angry hoodlum just now?

MESSAGE.JP: それはともかく。
MESSAGE.EN: Well, that's pretty irrelevant either way.
MESSAGE.Translation: Well, that's pretty irrelevant either way.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「西園さん、やっぱり冷たいお茶の方も用意した方が良いかもね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Nishizono-san, maybe you had better make cold tea available as well, after all?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Nishizono-san, maybe you had better make cold tea available as well, after all?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「…そのようですね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝...So it'd seem.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝...So it'd seem.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「そうだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Oh yeah!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Oh yeah!❞

MESSAGE.JP: もう少し、さらに繋がりを持ちたいと思う。
MESSAGE.EN: I'd like to improve our connection just a little bit more.
MESSAGE.Translation: I'd like to improve our connection just a little bit more.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「西園さんは携帯持ってるの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Nishizono-san, do you have your cellphone with you?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Nishizono-san, do you have your cellphone with you?❞

MESSAGE.JP: まだ、番号も聞いていなかったし。
MESSAGE.EN: I didn't have her number yet.
MESSAGE.Translation: I didn't have her number yet.

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「…はあ、それが」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝...Haa... that's...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝...Haa... that's...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「どうかしたの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝What's the matter?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝What's the matter?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「…あるにはあるのですが」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝...You could say I have it.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝...You could say I have it.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鞄の中に手を入れて、しばらくごそごそしている。
MESSAGE.EN: She put her hand into her bag and rummaged inside.
MESSAGE.Translation: She put her hand into her bag and rummaged inside.

MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝.........❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝.........❞

MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝.........❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝.........❞

MESSAGE.JP: 何冊も入っている本をどけてもなかなか、出てこない。
MESSAGE.EN: The many books in her bag were getting in the way.
MESSAGE.Translation: The many books in her bag were getting in the way.

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「すみません、普段使わないもので」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝Sorry, I don't usually use it.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝Sorry, I don't usually use it.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「ああ、ありました」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝Ah, here it is.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝Ah, here it is.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 取り出されたのは、シンプルな携帯電話。
MESSAGE.EN: She took out a cellphone of simple design.
MESSAGE.Translation: She took out a cellphone of simple design.

MESSAGE.JP: 銀色に光るボディには、なんの装飾もない。
MESSAGE.EN: A silver body with no decoration.
MESSAGE.Translation: A silver body with no decoration.

MESSAGE.JP: シールも、ストラップも何もついてない。
MESSAGE.EN: It didn't have any stickers, nor even a strap.
MESSAGE.Translation: It didn't have any stickers, nor even a strap.

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「実家の電話番号以外に登録してないんですよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝I have only my parents' phone number registered in it.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝I have only my parents' phone number registered in it.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「すっかり宝の持ち腐れです」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝This is a useless possession indeed.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝This is a useless possession indeed.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 慣れない手つきで携帯を開くと、電源を入れようとする。
MESSAGE.EN: She opened the phone with an unpracticed hand, and tried to turn it on.
MESSAGE.Translation: She opened the phone with an unpracticed hand, and tried to turn it on.

MESSAGE.JP: …けど、なかなか入る様子がない。
MESSAGE.EN: ...But she didn't seem to get it working.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...But she didn't seem to get it working.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ボタンは長押しするんだよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝You need to hold down the button for a while.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝You need to hold down the button for a while.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 僕の言葉に、苦笑いしながら西園さんがボタンを押すとようやく電源がついた。
MESSAGE.EN: Following my advice, Nishizono-san, making a forced smile, pressed the power button and it finally turned on.
MESSAGE.Translation: Following my advice, Nishizono-san, making a forced smile, pressed the power button and it finally turned on.

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「メール機能なんて使ったことないです」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝I have never used the email function in this.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝I have never used the email function in this.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「じゃあ、僕が最初のメル友になってもいいかな？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Then, can I be your first email pal?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Then, can I be your first email pal?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「…ダメかな？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...Is it no good?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...Is it no good?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「では、お願いしましょう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝Then, please.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝Then, please.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「…でも、メル友ってこんなかしこまった風にして作るものなんでしょうか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝...But, are you really supposed to make email pals in such a formal way?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝...But, are you really supposed to make email pals in such a formal way?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「いいんじゃないかな。こんな作り方があっても」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I don't see anything wrong with it.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I don't see anything wrong with it.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「なんとなく、西園さんらしい気がするよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Actually, I think it's very like you.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Actually, I think it's very like you.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「わたし、らしい…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝Very... like me.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝Very... like me.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「わたし、ってなんでしょう？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝What is ❛me❜?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝What is ❛me❜?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「…西園さんが、そのままでいることが西園さんらしいってことじゃないかな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...Nishizono-san is Nishizono-san, isn't that all there is to it?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...Nishizono-san is Nishizono-san, isn't that all there is to it?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「…そんなものでしょうか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝...Is that how it is?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝...Is that how it is?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「確かに、直枝さんたちは本能に従って生きている気がしますね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝True enough, you guys seem like you're living by your instincts.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝True enough, you guys seem like you're living by your instincts.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「…本能って」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Instincts...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Instincts...❞

MESSAGE.JP: そりゃ、真人あたりはそうかも知れないけど…。
MESSAGE.EN: That might certainly be true for Masato, but I don't know...
MESSAGE.Translation: That might certainly be true for Masato, but I don't know...

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「じゃあ、番号とアドレス教えてくれるかな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝So, can you tell me your number and email address?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝So, can you tell me your number and email address?❞

MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝.........❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝.........❞

MESSAGE.JP: 携帯を持ったまま、西園さんは動かない。
MESSAGE.EN: She didn't move at all, holding the cellphone in her hand.
MESSAGE.Translation: She didn't move at all, holding the cellphone in her hand.

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「…あの、自分の番号が分かりません」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝...Uh, I don't know my number.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝...Uh, I don't know my number.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「僕のと同じ機種みたいだから…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Your model is the same as mine, so...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Your model is the same as mine, so...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 僕は携帯番号の見方を教えるけれど、それでも西園さんは固まっている。
MESSAGE.EN: I told her what she needed to do to display her number, but still she didn't move.
MESSAGE.Translation: I told her what she needed to do to display her number, but still she didn't move.

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「ボ、ボタンがたくさんあって、どれを押せば良いのやら」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝It has so many buttons I can't figure out which one I should push...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝It has so many buttons I can't figure out which one I should push...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「家の電話はダイヤル式でしたので…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝The phone in my home is a dial type...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝The phone in my home is a dial type...❞

MESSAGE.JP: …それって黒電話？
MESSAGE.EN: ...Is it black, as well?
MESSAGE.Translation: ...Is it black, as well?

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ちょっと借りるよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Let me try.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Let me try.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 自分で見た方が早かった。
MESSAGE.EN: It was quicker to check it myself.
MESSAGE.Translation: It was quicker to check it myself.

MESSAGE.JP: 西園さんの番号とアドレスを自分の携帯に登録する。
MESSAGE.EN: I registered her number and email address in my cellphone.
MESSAGE.Translation: I registered her number and email address in my cellphone.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「じゃあ、メールを送るよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Then, I'm sending you a mail.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Then, I'm sending you a mail.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 送信ボタンを押す。
MESSAGE.EN: I pressed the send button.
MESSAGE.Translation: I pressed the send button.

MESSAGE.JP: 数秒後、素っ気ないベルが西園さんの携帯から聞こえる。
MESSAGE.EN: A few seconds later, I heard the cold, generic message sound coming from her phone.
MESSAGE.Translation: A few seconds later, I heard the cold, generic message sound coming from her phone.

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「…どうやって見るのでしょう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝...How do I read it, I wonder.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝...How do I read it, I wonder.❞

MESSAGE.JP: やっぱり、固まっていた。
MESSAGE.EN: She had locked up.
MESSAGE.Translation: She had locked up.

MESSAGE.JP: ふぅ……。
MESSAGE.EN: Haa...
MESSAGE.Translation: Haa...

MESSAGE.JP: メールの見方、番号やアドレスの登録の仕方など。
MESSAGE.EN: How to check your mails, how to register numbers and addresses...
MESSAGE.Translation: How to check your mails, how to register numbers and addresses...

MESSAGE.JP: 教えることは山ほどありそうだった。
MESSAGE.EN: There seemed to be a lot that I had to teach her.
MESSAGE.Translation: There seemed to be a lot that I had to teach her.

MESSAGE.JP: その先の苦労を考える…。
MESSAGE.EN: I thought about all the previous mishaps.
MESSAGE.Translation: I thought about all the previous mishaps.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「なんだか、とても楽しみだね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I think this is going to be a lot of fun.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I think this is going to be a lot of fun.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 思わず、笑みがこぼれた。
MESSAGE.EN: I smiled involuntarily.
MESSAGE.Translation: I smiled involuntarily.

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「…心なしか馬鹿にされている気がしますが」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝...I kind of feel like I am being made fun of, but...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝...I kind of feel like I am being made fun of, but...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「よろしくお願いします」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝I'll be counting on you.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝I'll be counting on you.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 僕の番号とアドレスを西園さんの携帯に登録する。
MESSAGE.EN: I entered my number and address in her phone.
MESSAGE.Translation: I entered my number and address in her phone.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「じゃあ、他のみんなのもしようか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝All right, next is the other members.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝All right, next is the other members.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「えっ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝Eh?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝Eh?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「恭介や真人に謙吾とか、もちろん女の子たちもね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I'm talking about Kyousuke, Masato, Kengo, and of course the girls too.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I'm talking about Kyousuke, Masato, Kengo, and of course the girls too.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「リトルバスターズ全員の分を登録しなくっちゃ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝You have to register all the Little Busters members.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝You have to register all the Little Busters members.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「…そうですね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝...That's true.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝...That's true.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 心なしか、顔がほころんでいた。
MESSAGE.EN: I saw her smiling a little.
MESSAGE.Translation: I saw her smiling a little.

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「なんだ、少年が西園女史の『初めて』なのか…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝What, you were her first, young man...?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝What, you were her first, young man...?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「私に譲ってほしかったな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝I wanted that role for myself.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝I wanted that role for myself.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「…実に残念だ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝...Truly a pity.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝...Truly a pity.❞

MESSAGE.JP: ぶつぶつ妙なことを言いながら、来ヶ谷さんが西園さんの携帯にメールを送信。
MESSAGE.EN: Muttering something incomprehensible, Kurugaya-san sent Nishizono-san an email.
MESSAGE.Translation: Muttering something incomprehensible, Kurugaya-san sent Nishizono-san an email.

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「じゃあ、送るよー。しっかり受けとめてねぇ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Then, here it comes. Receive it tightly.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Then, here it comes. Receive it tightly.❞

MESSAGE.JP: にこにこ顔の小毬さんがまず送信した。
MESSAGE.EN: All smiles, Komari-san sent hers.
MESSAGE.Translation: All smiles, Komari-san sent hers.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「ぽちっ、とな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Pochi-tto-na.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Pochi-tto-na.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 続けて、葉留佳さんが妙なかけ声でボタンを押す。
MESSAGE.EN: After that, Haruka-san also pushed the button with a strange cheer.
MESSAGE.Translation: After that, Haruka-san also pushed the button with a strange cheer.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「どーーーんっっ！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Ka-boooom!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Ka-boooom!❞

MESSAGE.JP: そして、着信音に合わせて大声で叫ぶ。
MESSAGE.EN: And, as Nishizono-san's phone played its message tone, she shouted up.
MESSAGE.Translation: And, as Nishizono-san's phone played its message tone, she shouted up.

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「しんぎゅらりてぃーな爆発がーっ！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Has the singularity exploded!?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Has the singularity exploded!?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「敵襲だ……ふせろっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝An enemy attack... Get down!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝An enemy attack... Get down!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 慌てたクドの声を聞いた鈴が指示を出す。
MESSAGE.EN: Hearing Kud's panicked voice, Rin launched her orders.
MESSAGE.Translation: Hearing Kud's panicked voice, Rin launched her orders.

MESSAGE.JP: …冷静なんだか、そうじゃないんだか。
MESSAGE.EN: ...I can't tell whether Rin has great composure or not.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...I can't tell whether Rin has great composure or not.

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「わふっ、大変ですーっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Wafu, that's horrible!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Wafu, that's horrible!❞

MESSAGE.JP: …律儀にその場に伏せてるし。
MESSAGE.EN: ...Kud dutifully threw herself down on the ground.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...Kud dutifully threw herself down on the ground.

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「やれやれ、騒がしいな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Sheesh, you sure are being noisy.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Sheesh, you sure are being noisy.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「じゃあ、これがオレの番号とアドレスな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Well, here is my number and address.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Well, here is my number and address.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人はメモ用紙を渡していた。
MESSAGE.EN: He handed Nishizono-san a scrap of paper.
MESSAGE.Translation: He handed Nishizono-san a scrap of paper.

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「オールタイムいつでもオーケーだから、待ってるぜっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Anytime, always, it's okay to call me. I'm looking forward to it!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Anytime, always, it's okay to call me. I'm looking forward to it!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「って、捨てるのかよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Hey, why'd you throw it away!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Hey, why'd you throw it away!❞

MESSAGE.JP: ひらひらと宙に舞うメモ用紙。
MESSAGE.EN: The note was dancing in the air.
MESSAGE.Translation: The note was dancing in the air.

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「…風で飛んだだけです」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝...It was blown away by the wind.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝...It was blown away by the wind.❞

MESSAGE.JP: …そういうことにしておこう。
MESSAGE.EN: ...Sure it was, sure it was.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...Sure it was, sure it was.

MESSAGE.JP: 真人が慌てて追いかけていく、その飛んでいく紙を僕らは見送った。
MESSAGE.EN: He desperately chased after the scrap of paper, as we watched it fly away into the distance.
MESSAGE.Translation: He desperately chased after the scrap of paper, as we watched it fly away into the distance.

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「待てよっ、掛けてくれよっ！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Hold it, you gotta give me a call!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Hold it, you gotta give me a call!❞

MESSAGE.JP: …すぐ戻ってきた。
MESSAGE.EN: ...He came back a moment later.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...He came back a moment later.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「なんでまたそんなに熱心なのさ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Why are you so enthusiastic about it...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Why are you so enthusiastic about it...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「ああ…理樹、これを見ろ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Well... Riki, look here.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Well... Riki, look here.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人が携帯の着信履歴を見せてくる。
MESSAGE.EN: He showed me his cellphone call history.
MESSAGE.Translation: He showed me his cellphone call history.

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介、理樹、理樹、理樹、恭介、理樹…。
MESSAGE.EN: Kyousuke, Riki, Riki, Riki, Kyousuke, Riki...
MESSAGE.Translation: Kyousuke, Riki, Riki, Riki, Kyousuke, Riki...

MESSAGE.JP: 延々と僕と恭介の名前が続いていた。
MESSAGE.EN: It was a never-ending chain of our two names.
MESSAGE.Translation: It was a never-ending chain of our two names.

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「見てのとおり、オレの携帯は今やおまえと恭介の専用機と化してるんだよ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝As you can see, right now my cell-phone is dedicated exclusively to you and Kyousuke...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝As you can see, right now my cell-phone is dedicated exclusively to you and Kyousuke...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「だが、携帯ってこういうものじゃないだろう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝But that's not how it should be, is it?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝But that's not how it should be, is it?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「それじゃー私が掛けてあげるよ～」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Then, I'll give you a call～.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Then, I'll give you a call～.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「れっつ・こーりんぐなのです」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Let's calling!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Let's calling!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「おけおけ、真人くんのために掛けてあげよー」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Okay, okay, anything for Masato-kun.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Okay, okay, anything for Masato-kun.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「うむ、協力してやろう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Umu, I'll cooperate too.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Umu, I'll cooperate too.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 一斉に真人にコールする。
MESSAGE.EN: Everyone gave him a call.
MESSAGE.Translation: Everyone gave him a call.

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「うおっ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Uooh...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Uooh...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「あっという間に履歴が生まれ変わったぜ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝In a matter of seconds, my call history has been reborn...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝In a matter of seconds, my call history has been reborn...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「これはなんだか、異様にモテモテな携帯に見えねえか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Doesn't it kinda look like the cellphone of someone extremely popular?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Doesn't it kinda look like the cellphone of someone extremely popular?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「まあ、そうだねぇ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Oh, I guess it does.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Oh, I guess it does.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「やっぱ、落ちつかねえ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Damn, I can't calm down...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Damn, I can't calm down...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「理樹っ、やっぱりこの携帯はおまえ色に染めてくれよっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Riki, this cellphone must smell of you after all!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Riki, this cellphone must smell of you after all!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「履歴はおまえの名前で埋まってる方が落ちつくんだよっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝I can only calm down when my call history is filled with nothing but your name.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝I can only calm down when my call history is filled with nothing but your name.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「いやだよ…なんかすごく気持ち悪いよ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝That's... What you're saying sounds horribly creepy...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝That's... What you're saying sounds horribly creepy...❞

MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝......❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝......❞

MESSAGE.JP: …西園さんは懸命に真人にコールしようとしているようだった。
MESSAGE.EN: ...Apparently, Nishizono-san was still desperately trying to call Masato.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...Apparently, Nishizono-san was still desperately trying to call Masato.

MESSAGE.JP: だが、例によって携帯を前に固まってしまっていた。
MESSAGE.EN: But just like before, she was looking at her cellphone with a blank expression.
MESSAGE.Translation: But just like before, she was looking at her cellphone with a blank expression.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「あ、西園さん、こうやるんだよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Oh, Nishizono-san, this is how you do it.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Oh, Nishizono-san, this is how you do it.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 操作を手伝ってあげる。
MESSAGE.EN: I gave her a hand.
MESSAGE.Translation: I gave her a hand.

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「お」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Oh.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Oh.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「はい、もしもし」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Hello?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Hello?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「もしもし」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝Hello?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝Hello?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「おう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Yeah.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Yeah.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「…こんにちは」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝...Good afternoon.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝...Good afternoon.❞

MESSAGE.JP: ぺこりと頭を下げる。
MESSAGE.EN: She bowed her head while greeting.
MESSAGE.Translation: She bowed her head while greeting.

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「あ、これはどうもご丁寧に」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Oh, that's very kind of you.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Oh, that's very kind of you.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人もぺこりと頭を下げる。
MESSAGE.EN: Masato bowed his head too.
MESSAGE.Translation: Masato bowed his head too.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「…目の前にいるんだから、電話しなくていいじゃん…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...She's right in front of you, why do you even need a cellphone...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...She's right in front of you, why do you even need a cellphone...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「井ノ原さんの分はこれで終わりですね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝That's it for Inohara-san.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝That's it for Inohara-san.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「まてよ、メールがまだだぜ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Wait up, what about the email?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Wait up, what about the email?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「それは、こちらのメモに…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝It's written on this memo...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝It's written on this memo...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「……あっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝......Ah.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝......Ah.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「ってまた捨てるのかよぉーっ!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Wait, are you throwing it away again!?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Wait, are you throwing it away again!?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「ま、また風で飛んだだけです」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝It, it was blown away by the wind again.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝It, it was blown away by the wind again.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人は再びメモを追いかけていった…。
MESSAGE.EN: Masato went chasing after the scrap of paper again...
MESSAGE.Translation: Masato went chasing after the scrap of paper again...

MESSAGE.JP: 今度は恭介だ。
MESSAGE.EN: It was Kyousuke's turn.
MESSAGE.Translation: It was Kyousuke's turn.

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾は自分で打ったボール探しに出ていて、今はいない（さすがに飛ばし屋だ）。
MESSAGE.EN: Kengo had gone off looking for a ball he'd struck himself (as expected of our home run king).
MESSAGE.Translation: Kengo had gone off looking for a ball he'd struck himself (as expected of our home run king).

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「西園、俺の携帯に送信してくれるか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Nishizono, can you send me a text?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Nishizono, can you send me a text?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「登録したら、送り直すから」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝I'll add you to my phone's contacts and reply.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝I'll add you to my phone's contacts and reply.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「恭介、悪いんだけど。西園さんはまだ受信オンリーなんだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Sorry, Kyousuke, but she can still only receive messages for now.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Sorry, Kyousuke, but she can still only receive messages for now.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「送信の仕方は、まだこれからだから」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I didn't teach her how to send them yet.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I didn't teach her how to send them yet.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 電話はかけられるようになったけど、メールはまだ心許ない。
MESSAGE.EN: I had taught her how to make a call, but she was still not confident about sending messages.
MESSAGE.Translation: I had taught her how to make a call, but she was still not confident about sending messages.

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「す、すみません」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝I, I'm sorry.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝I, I'm sorry.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「…そうか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝...I see.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝...I see.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「意外だな。西園はマニュアルを隅から隅まで熟読してそうなイメージなのにな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝That's unexpected. I always had an impression of you as someone who would thoroughly read every manual.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝That's unexpected. I always had an impression of you as someone who would thoroughly read every manual.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「分厚い冊子を前によだれを垂らしていそうだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝I could imagine you drooling over a thick pamphlet like that.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝I could imagine you drooling over a thick pamphlet like that.❞

MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝.........❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝.........❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「…読みました。なめるようにして読んだんです」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝...I did read it. I thought it would be trivial.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝...I did read it. I thought it would be trivial.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「ですが。ボタンがたくさんで何がなんだか…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝But, there are so many buttons and it's hard to tell what each one does...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝But, there are so many buttons and it's hard to tell what each one does...❞

MESSAGE.JP: とても悔しそうだった。
MESSAGE.EN: She had a look of defeat.
MESSAGE.Translation: She had a look of defeat.

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「じゃあ、これが俺の番号とアドレスだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Okay, here's my phone number and email address.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Okay, here's my phone number and email address.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介が、やはりメモ用紙を手渡してくる。
MESSAGE.EN: Kyousuke handed over a memo to her.
MESSAGE.Translation: Kyousuke handed over a memo to her.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「だからさ、送信してくれた方が西園さんには楽なんだけど」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I told you, it'd be easier for Nishizono-san if you sent her a message instead.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I told you, it'd be easier for Nishizono-san if you sent her a message instead.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「あのな、実際に使わなければ操作は覚えられないぞ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Look, she won't ever get the knack of it if she doesn't actually do it a few times.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Look, she won't ever get the knack of it if she doesn't actually do it a few times.❞

MESSAGE.JP: …そのとおりかも。
MESSAGE.EN: ...Maybe he's right.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...Maybe he's right.

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介もたまにはいいことを言う。
MESSAGE.EN: Kyousuke occasionally makes a valid point.
MESSAGE.Translation: Kyousuke occasionally makes a valid point.

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「って、捨てるのかよぉっ！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Hey, are you throwing it away!?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Hey, are you throwing it away!?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 感心したそばから、宙に舞う紙を追いかけて恭介が走り出す。
MESSAGE.EN: The second I felt admiration for him, Kyousuke took off chasing wildly after a scrap of paper.
MESSAGE.Translation: The second I felt admiration for him, Kyousuke took off chasing wildly after a scrap of paper.

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「すみません…風で飛んでしまいました」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝I'm sorry... It was blown away by the wind.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝I'm sorry... It was blown away by the wind.❞

MESSAGE.JP: …真人もまだ走っていた。
MESSAGE.EN: ...Masato was still running after his.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...Masato was still running after his.

MESSAGE.JP: 色々あったけど。
MESSAGE.EN: Even though this and that happened.
MESSAGE.Translation: Even though this and that happened.

MESSAGE.JP: 無事、全員分を登録完了。
MESSAGE.EN: She completed adding everyone to her contact list.
MESSAGE.Translation: She completed adding everyone to her contact list.

MESSAGE.JP: みんなも西園さんの番号とアドレスを登録した。
MESSAGE.EN: Everyone else added her to their address books as well.
MESSAGE.Translation: Everyone else added her to their address books as well.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「よかったね。なんとかアドレス交換できて」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Isn't it great? You managed to exchange numbers with everyone.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Isn't it great? You managed to exchange numbers with everyone.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「…交換」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝...Exchange.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝...Exchange.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「ということは、これまでのアドレスは使えなくなってしまったのですか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝Does that mean I can no longer use my old number?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝Does that mean I can no longer use my old number?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「えっ？　そんなことはないけど」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝What? Of course you can.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝What? Of course you can.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「ですが…これまでわたしが使っていたアドレスと、みなさんのアドレスを交換したのではないですか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝But... Didn't I exchange my old number for everyone else's just now?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝But... Didn't I exchange my old number for everyone else's just now?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「いや…お互いにアドレスや番号を教え合うことを『交換』って言うんだけど」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Well... It's called ❛exchange❜ even though all you're doing is just telling each other your own phone numbers.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Well... It's called ❛exchange❜ even though all you're doing is just telling each other your own phone numbers.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ほら、今はそうしたよね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝See, isn't that what you did?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝See, isn't that what you did?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 西園さんの番号とアドレスをみんなに教えて、みんなの番号とアドレスを西園さんが登録した。
MESSAGE.EN: She told everyone her phone number, and everyone else told her theirs in return.
MESSAGE.Translation: She told everyone her phone number, and everyone else told her theirs in return.

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「…それは、そうですが」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝...That's true.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝...That's true.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「ならば『アドレス相互登録』と言うべきです」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝But shouldn't it be called ❛mutually adding each other's numbers❜ then?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝But shouldn't it be called ❛mutually adding each other's numbers❜ then?❞

MESSAGE.JP: …それは長くて言いにくそうだ。
MESSAGE.EN: ...It'd be difficult to use such a long phrase.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...It'd be difficult to use such a long phrase.

MESSAGE.JP: うーん、日本語って難しい。
MESSAGE.EN: Hmm, the Japanese language is difficult.
MESSAGE.Translation: Hmm, the Japanese language is difficult.

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「…いいんでしょうか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝...I wonder if it's okay?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝...I wonder if it's okay?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 不意に、西園さんが口を開く。
MESSAGE.EN: She said unexpectedly.
MESSAGE.Translation: She said unexpectedly.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「なにが？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝What is?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝What is?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「…なんだかこういうのも悪くないと思ってしまうことが、です」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝...I can't help feeling that this is not so bad.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝...I can't help feeling that this is not so bad.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「…いいんじゃないかな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...Isn't that fine?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...Isn't that fine?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「素直に楽しいって思えば」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...You should enjoy yourself too.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...You should enjoy yourself too.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 言いたいことは分かる気がする。
MESSAGE.EN: I think I understand what she wanted to say.
MESSAGE.Translation: I think I understand what she wanted to say.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「申し訳ない、なんて思う必要はないよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝There's no need to worry about something like that.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝There's no need to worry about something like that.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「これまでの自分に対して」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝No need to compare your past and present self.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝No need to compare your past and present self.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「…そう、でしょうか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝...Is that how it is.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝...Is that how it is.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「どちらにせよ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝Either way...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝Either way...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「ちょっと遅かったかも知れません」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝It might be a little too late.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝It might be a little too late.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 意図の掴めない、その台詞の続きを聞くことはできなかった。
MESSAGE.EN: I didn't fully understand her meaning, and the conversation ended before I got anything more out of her.
MESSAGE.Translation: I didn't fully understand her meaning, and the conversation ended before I got anything more out of her.

MESSAGE.JP: 誰よりも早く、部室に戻ってくる。
MESSAGE.EN: I returned to the clubroom before everyone else.
MESSAGE.Translation: I returned to the clubroom before everyone else.

MESSAGE.JP: バットとグローブを返すと、誰も来ないうちに、立ち去る。
MESSAGE.EN: I put the bat and gloves back and left before anyone arrived.
MESSAGE.Translation: I put the bat and gloves back and left before anyone arrived.

MESSAGE.JP: もちろんリトルバスターズのみんなも、かけがえのない大事な仲間だ。
MESSAGE.EN: Of course everyone in the Little Busters were my irreplaceable friends.
MESSAGE.Translation: Of course everyone in the Little Busters were my irreplaceable friends.

MESSAGE.JP: そして、同じぐらい、今の僕には沙耶さんが大事な存在で…
MESSAGE.EN: But now Saya-san was just as irreplaceable to me...
MESSAGE.Translation: But now Saya-san was just as irreplaceable to me...

MESSAGE.JP: 今の僕にはそれしか見えていない。
MESSAGE.EN: She's all I can see right now.
MESSAGE.Translation: She's all I can see right now.

MESSAGE.JP: ごめん、みんな。
MESSAGE.EN: Sorry, everyone.
MESSAGE.Translation: Sorry, everyone.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「うーん、だいぶ部室も汚れてきたねぇ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Hmm, this clubroom has gotten very dirty...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Hmm, this clubroom has gotten very dirty...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「そうか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝You think so?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝You think so?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 改めて見直してみると、土ぼこりやなんかがだいぶ入ってきている。
MESSAGE.EN: Looking at it closely, there was dust and dirt piling up everywhere.
MESSAGE.Translation: Looking at it closely, there was dust and dirt piling up everywhere.

MESSAGE.JP: 最初に徹底的に掃除したものの、半月も経たない内にこうなってしまった。
MESSAGE.EN: Although we had cleaned up the room thoroughly when we moved in, it had already become like this over just two weeks.
MESSAGE.Translation: Although we had cleaned up the room thoroughly when we moved in, it had already become like this over just two weeks.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「せっかくだし、掃除しようか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Well, let's get the room clean.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Well, let's get the room clean.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「はいっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Yes!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Yes!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「おっけーだよー」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Okay.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Okay.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「いやだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝No.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝No.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「えー？　私掃除やー」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Eh? I don't wanna.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Eh? I don't wanna.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「それより理樹君にヴォグヤャー！　とかブフゥグュアー！　といった地獄の雄叫びを轟かせつつエアギターでも披露して欲しい」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Instead, I want you to play air guitar making infernal shouts like ❛voguyaa!❜ or ❛bufugyaa!❜, Riki-kun.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Instead, I want you to play air guitar making infernal shouts like ❛voguyaa!❜ or ❛bufugyaa!❜, Riki-kun.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「いや、やらないけど…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝No, won't happen...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝No, won't happen...❞

MESSAGE.JP: いまいちやる気のない人が多かった。
MESSAGE.EN: Many of the members were unmotivated for the task.
MESSAGE.Translation: Many of the members were unmotivated for the task.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「とにかく、掃除は定期的にやらないとすぐドロだらけになっちゃうよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Anyway, we need to clean out the room regularly, or it'll get full of dirt in no time.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Anyway, we need to clean out the room regularly, or it'll get full of dirt in no time.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「ドロだらけの青春も…いいもんだぜ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝A dirty youth... there's nothing wrong with it.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝A dirty youth... there's nothing wrong with it.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「いやいい事言ってるようで恭介は掃除したくないだけでしょ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I know you're just saying that because you don't want to clean up...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I know you're just saying that because you don't want to clean up...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「いいじゃん別に掃除しなくたって死なないしー」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝We don't have to. It won't kill us to not clean the room, will it?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝We don't have to. It won't kill us to not clean the room, will it?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「掃除しても死なないから、ほらほら立って」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Cleaning the room won't kill you, either. Just suck it up.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Cleaning the room won't kill you, either. Just suck it up.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「じゃあ死んだら理樹くんのせいだぞー」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝When it does kill us, it'll be all your fault, Riki-kun.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝When it does kill us, it'll be all your fault, Riki-kun.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「死なないから大丈夫だよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝It's all right, nobody is gonna be killed.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝It's all right, nobody is gonna be killed.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「ええ？　掃除したら死ぬかもしれないよ!?」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Eh? You don't think you could die from cleaning!?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Eh? You don't think you could die from cleaning!?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「どういう状態で…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝How...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝How...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「例えばですネ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝For example...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝For example...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「おそうじおそうじー」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Cleaning, cleaning.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Cleaning, cleaning.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「おおっとモップ掛け中につまずいたぁーっ!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Oh no, I tripped over while I was mopping the floor!!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Oh no, I tripped over while I was mopping the floor!!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「そしてロッカーにつっこんだーっ!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝And bumped into a locker!!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝And bumped into a locker!!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「がらがらどっしゃーんっ!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Cling clang clong!!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Cling clang clong!!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「そしてそのロッカーが倒れた衝撃で部室が倒壊!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝The locker fell down, and the shock made the club room collapse!!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝The locker fell down, and the shock made the club room collapse!!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「うわあぁーっ、みんなにげろーっ!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Uwaaa, everybody run for it!!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Uwaaa, everybody run for it!!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「だめだーっ、まにあわなーいっ!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Oh my god, it's too late!!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Oh my god, it's too late!!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「ずどがががじゅばっしゃーんっ!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Zdogagagagagajuppashaaan!!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Zdogagagagagajuppashaaan!!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「うわぁーっ!!　さらに大地震が襲ってきたぁーっ!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Uwaaa!! It started a huge earthquake!!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Uwaaa!! It started a huge earthquake!!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「実はこの部室は地球の龍脈が集まる一点に建っていたんだぁーっ!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝In truth, this room was the pivotal point of Earth!!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝In truth, this room was the pivotal point of Earth!!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「それを刺激して地殻大変動が起こって日本は沈没だぁーっ!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝As it was stimulated, the earth's crust started moving and Japan sunk into the ocean!!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝As it was stimulated, the earth's crust started moving and Japan sunk into the ocean!!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「さらに日本が沈没した事によって地軸が捻じ曲がり七大陸が引き裂かれ始めたぁーっ!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝This caused the earth's axis to shift, and the continents drifted apart!!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝This caused the earth's axis to shift, and the continents drifted apart!!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「なにいーっ、世界はどうなってしまうんだーっ!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Whaaat! What in heaven's name has become of our planet!!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Whaaat! What in heaven's name has become of our planet!!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「とどめにポールシフトでグランドクロスだーっ!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝It caused the poles to shift, and for a coup de grace we get a grand cross!!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝It caused the poles to shift, and for a coup de grace we get a grand cross!!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「もーだーめーだー!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝There's nothing we can do anymore!!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝There's nothing we can do anymore!!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「ずどどでゅくしどっかぁあーーーーんっ!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Zdododuckshdokkaaaan!!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Zdododuckshdokkaaaan!!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 「こうしてお掃除の開始に端を発する大災害により地球は崩壊、人類は滅亡した…」
MESSAGE.EN: ❝Our cleaning thus caused a huge catastrophe that collapsed the Earth and wiped out mankind...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: ❝Our cleaning thus caused a huge catastrophe that collapsed the Earth and wiped out mankind...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 「第一部・完」
MESSAGE.EN: ❝Chapter 1 End.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: ❝Chapter 1 End.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「と、お掃除から地球が滅亡してしまう危険性をはらんでいるわけデス」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝So because it's so fraught with danger that even the Earth might be destroyed, we should abstain from cleaning.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝So because it's so fraught with danger that even the Earth might be destroyed, we should abstain from cleaning.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「まず最初の時点でありえないと思うんだけど」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝None of that could happen in the first place.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝None of that could happen in the first place.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「えー、あるかもしれないよ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Ehh, you don't think it might?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Ehh, you don't think it might?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「絶対ないと思う」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Absolutely not.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Absolutely not.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「もー、理樹くんは夢がないなぁ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Geez, you have no dreams.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Geez, you have no dreams.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「それは夢じゃなくて妄想だよ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝That's a delusion, not a dream...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝That's a delusion, not a dream...❞

MESSAGE.JP: そこまで壮大な言い訳をしてでもやりたくないのか…。
MESSAGE.EN: She's willing to go that far with her excuses to avoid doing it...
MESSAGE.Translation: She's willing to go that far with her excuses to avoid doing it...

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「バケツに水汲んできたよ～」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝I've got a bucket of water here～.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝I've got a bucket of water here～.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「後はモップ掛けでいいよね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Now all we have to do is mop it good.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Now all we have to do is mop it good.❞

MESSAGE.JP: …こういうことは率先してやる小毬さんが輝いて見えた。
MESSAGE.EN: ...Komari-san was shining as she took the initiative in cleaning.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...Komari-san was shining as she took the initiative in cleaning.

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「私もモップ掛けです～」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝I'm mopping, too～.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝I'm mopping, too～.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「能美女史にモップか…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Ms. Noumi mopping...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Ms. Noumi mopping...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「よし、キミがメイド姿で掃除を始めるなら、私もいくらでも掃除をする」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Okay. I'll help you guys out too if you wear a maid outfit.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Okay. I'll help you guys out too if you wear a maid outfit.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「は、はい？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝H, huh?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝H, huh?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「雑巾掛けをしている後ろをひたすら付け回したい」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝I'd love to watch you from behind as you're mopping single-mindedly.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝I'd love to watch you from behind as you're mopping single-mindedly.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「そんな妄想もしてないでさ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Knock off that kind of delusion...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Knock off that kind of delusion...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「理樹君でもいい」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Even Riki-kun will do.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Even Riki-kun will do.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「いやだよっ!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝No way!!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝No way!!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「なんだ、可愛いのに」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝What, even though you're so cute.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝What, even though you're so cute.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「可愛くないし嬉しくない…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I'm not glad to be told I'm cute...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I'm not glad to be told I'm cute...❞

MESSAGE.JP: …とは言ったものの、来ヶ谷さんや恭介に無理に『掃除しろ』なんて言いづらい。
MESSAGE.EN: ...But with that said, it'd be hard to force Kurugaya-san and Kyousuke to help us clean.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...But with that said, it'd be hard to force Kurugaya-san and Kyousuke to help us clean.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ふう…じゃあ、やってくれる人だけでやろう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Fuu... Let's handle it between us, then.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Fuu... Let's handle it between us, then.❞

MESSAGE.JP: すでに小毬さんは床のモップ掛けを始めていた。
MESSAGE.EN: Komari-san had already started mopping.
MESSAGE.Translation: Komari-san had already started mopping.

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「待てよ…なんか俺たちが悪者みたいじゃないか…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Wait... That almost makes us look as if we're evil...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Wait... That almost makes us look as if we're evil...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「まあ、冗談はこれくらいにして始めるか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Oh well, time to stop joking around and get started too.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Oh well, time to stop joking around and get started too.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 来ヶ谷さんがクドの手からモップを取る。
MESSAGE.EN: She took the mop from Kud.
MESSAGE.Translation: She took the mop from Kud.

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「じゃ、こっちは任せろ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Then, I'll clean over here.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Then, I'll clean over here.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介は小毬さんから。
MESSAGE.EN: He took the mop from Komari-san.
MESSAGE.Translation: He took the mop from Komari-san.

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「ふ、ふえ？　でもそしたら今度は私たちが悪者になっちゃうよ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Fu, fue? But now we're going to be the evil ones...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Fu, fue? But now we're going to be the evil ones...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「じゃ、その辺の備品の整理でも頼む」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Can you sort out the equipment, then?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Can you sort out the equipment, then?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「わかりましたっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Understood!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Understood!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 即座に分担が決まり、作業が開始される。
MESSAGE.EN: The workload was instantly divided between us, and we started on our tasks.
MESSAGE.Translation: The workload was instantly divided between us, and we started on our tasks.

MESSAGE.JP: …そういう手際ってのは、ふたりのほうが圧倒的に上なんだろうなぁ…。
MESSAGE.EN: ...Such a neat job; those two just might have overwhelming management skills...
MESSAGE.Translation: ...Such a neat job; those two just might have overwhelming management skills...

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「よっし、じゃあ私はみんなを応援する係に回ろうっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝All right! I'll do some cheerleading for you!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝All right! I'll do some cheerleading for you!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 立ち上がる。
MESSAGE.EN: She stood up.
MESSAGE.Translation: She stood up.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「ふぁいと～がんばれ～」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Fight～ Go for it～!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Fight～ Go for it～!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 即座に座る。
MESSAGE.EN: Then she sat back down quickly.
MESSAGE.Translation: Then she sat back down quickly.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「ふう…はるちん、がんばった」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Phew... Haruchin worked hard.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Phew... Haruchin worked hard.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「何ひとつ頑張ってないように見えるんだけど…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝It didn't look like you did anything that hard...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝It didn't look like you did anything that hard...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「何、気にするな少年」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Don't mind her, young man.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Don't mind her, young man.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「葉留佳君にはお仕置きか掃除かの選択肢があったが、彼女はお仕置きを選んだだけの事だ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝It was just a choice between punishment and cleaning, and she's chosen the former.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝It was just a choice between punishment and cleaning, and she's chosen the former.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「やりますっ!!　やらせてくださいっ!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝I'll do it!! Please let me do it!!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝I'll do it!! Please let me do it!!❞

MESSAGE.JP: …僕のモップをひったくると、ごしごしと床にモップ掛けを始めた。
MESSAGE.EN: ...She grabbed my mop and started scrubbing the floor.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...She grabbed my mop and started scrubbing the floor.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「うぅ…なんか私の人生掃除ばっかりな気がしますヨ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Uu... It feels like I'm spending my entire life cleaning...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Uu... It feels like I'm spending my entire life cleaning...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「はるちんはキレイ好きな不幸星の元に生まれたのですね…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝It's so sad... Haruchin was born under an unlucky star...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝It's so sad... Haruchin was born under an unlucky star...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「キレイ好きなのはいいことだよー」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Cleanliness is a beautiful thing.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Cleanliness is a beautiful thing.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「えー？　だって掃除めんどいじゃん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Eeh? Cleaning is such a pain.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Eeh? Cleaning is such a pain.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「でもキレイになったらすっごい気分がいいと思うよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝But it's a great feeling once it's finally clean.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝But it's a great feeling once it's finally clean.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「ん、まあそれは確かに…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Hm, I guess that's true...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Hm, I guess that's true...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「じゃあ今日からキレイ好きになればいいのかっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Then I'll be a cleaning-loving person from today!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Then I'll be a cleaning-loving person from today!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「うん、がんばってっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Yup, go for it!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Yup, go for it!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「あはははそいじゃ気合入れて掃除するぞーっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Ahahaha, I'll roll up my sleeves and clean it up!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Ahahaha, I'll roll up my sleeves and clean it up!❞

MESSAGE.JP: ものすごく単純な人だった。
MESSAGE.EN: She really has a one-track mind.
MESSAGE.Translation: She really has a one-track mind.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「じゃ、僕ぞうきん用のバケツ用意してくるよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Then I'm getting a bucket for the mops.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Then I'm getting a bucket for the mops.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「あ、バケツならここにあるよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Ah, we have one already.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Ah, we have one already.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ん、もう一個あった方がいいでしょ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Hm, I think we're going to need one more.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Hm, I think we're going to need one more.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 視線の先では、葉留佳さんがバケツにモップをつっこんでガチャガチャと揺すっている。
MESSAGE.EN: I glanced at Haruka-san, who was thrusting her mop in the bucket with all her might.
MESSAGE.Translation: I glanced at Haruka-san, who was thrusting her mop in the bucket with all her might.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「あれじゃすぐ水が汚れちゃいそうだしね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝The water in that one is going to be messy in no time.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝The water in that one is going to be messy in no time.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「あ、そうだねぇ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Uh, so it is...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Uh, so it is...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「よーしもっぷもっぱーもっぺすとー!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝All right, mop, mopper, moppest!!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝All right, mop, mopper, moppest!!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「さすが三枝さんなのですっ。もっぷの三段活用ですっ!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝That's our Saigusa-san! She even conjugated the word ❛mop❜ as though it were an adjective!!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝That's our Saigusa-san! She even conjugated the word ❛mop❜ as though it were an adjective!!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「イエースアイアムモッパー！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Yes, I am a mopper!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Yes, I am a mopper!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「ちなみにa cleanerだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝By the way, it's called a cleaner.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝By the way, it's called a cleaner.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「そして掃除をしている事はおそうじんぐといいます」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝And, 'osoujing' is how you say ❛cleaning❜ in English.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝And, 'osoujing' is how you say ❛cleaning❜ in English.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「はいっ、勉強になりますっ。れっつおそうじんぐですっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Yes, I'll remember that. Rettsu osoujing!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Yes, I'll remember that. Rettsu osoujing!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「ちなみにcleaningだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝It's just ❛cleaning.❜❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝It's just ❛cleaning.❜❞

MESSAGE.JP: …まあ、色々間違っているが掃除は着々と進行していた。
MESSAGE.EN: ...Even though there were various issues, our cleaning was making steady progress.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...Even though there were various issues, our cleaning was making steady progress.

MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Hm...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Hm...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴と西園さんのふたりが部室に入ってくる。
MESSAGE.EN: Rin and Nishizono-san showed up.
MESSAGE.Translation: Rin and Nishizono-san showed up.

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「お掃除中ですか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝Cleaning the room?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝Cleaning the room?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「おそうじんぐ!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Osoujing!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Osoujing!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「開口一番に意味不明です」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝What are you talking about?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝What are you talking about?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「お掃除進行中!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝We are osoujing!!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝We are osoujing!!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「cleaningだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Cleaning.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Cleaning.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「というわけでふたりともぞうきなーでヨロシク」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Will you two be zoukiners too?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Will you two be zoukiners too?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「雑巾はdustclothだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝That's called a ❛dustcloth.❜❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝That's called a ❛dustcloth.❜❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「ダストクロサーでヨロシクっ!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Be dustclothers then!!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Be dustclothers then!!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「だすとくろさーはとてもかっこいいですっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Dustclother sounds cool!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Dustclother sounds cool!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「…かっこいい」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝...It does.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝...It does.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「いや、でも意味は雑巾掛けをするひとだよ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝But it stands for one wiping things with a dustcloth...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝But it stands for one wiping things with a dustcloth...❞

MESSAGE.JP: そんなこんなで、小一時間ほど掃除をした。
MESSAGE.EN: We spent about an hour finishing the cleaning.
MESSAGE.Translation: We spent about an hour finishing the cleaning.

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「あらかた終わったかな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝We're almost done.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝We're almost done.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「うむ、こんなもんでいいだろう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Yeah, I think it's enough.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Yeah, I think it's enough.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「おおっ、なんか確かにすっごい気分がいいっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Ohh, I really am feeling supreme right now!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Ohh, I really am feeling supreme right now!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「よかったねー」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Good for you.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Good for you.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「ぴかぴかはとても気持ちがいいですー」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝It's so shiny and pretty.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝It's so shiny and pretty.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「じゃ、片付けようか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Let's put away the cleaning tools then.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Let's put away the cleaning tools then.❞

MESSAGE.JP: と、がちゃ、とドアが開く。
MESSAGE.EN: As I said that, the door opened.
MESSAGE.Translation: As I said that, the door opened.

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「…よう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝...Yo.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝...Yo.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 後ろ手に縛られた真人が、這いつくばったままずるずると中に入ってくる。
MESSAGE.EN: He was crawling into the room like a worm with both his hands tied behind his back with a rope.
MESSAGE.Translation: He was crawling into the room like a worm with both his hands tied behind his back with a rope.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「うわっ、なにやってんの真人…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝What are you doing, Masato...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝What are you doing, Masato...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「背筋で飛び跳ねながら移動するトレーニングを思いついてな…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝I just came up with a new training method: moving by jumping and using the back muscles only...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝I just came up with a new training method: moving by jumping and using the back muscles only...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「さらに己を戒めるために手を封印してここまで来たんだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝In order to discipline myself, I tied up my hands as well for the way here.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝In order to discipline myself, I tied up my hands as well for the way here.❞

MESSAGE.JP: …さすが、意味のわからないトレーニングに関しては他の追随を許さない。
MESSAGE.EN: ...He's truly unrivaled when it comes to crazy muscle training.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...He's truly unrivaled when it comes to crazy muscle training.

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「ふう…めちゃくちゃ時間かかっちまったぜ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Phew... It took a lot more time than I'd thought.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Phew... It took a lot more time than I'd thought.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ちょっとちょっと、ドロだらけじゃん…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Hey, you're covered with mud...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Hey, you're covered with mud...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「おお、わりいすぐ着替えるぜ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Uh, sorry. I'll change my clothes.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Uh, sorry. I'll change my clothes.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「ほっ、ほっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Ho, ho.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Ho, ho.❞

MESSAGE.JP: エビのように跳ねながら移動をする。
MESSAGE.EN: He was moving forth by jumping like a shrimp.
MESSAGE.Translation: He was moving forth by jumping like a shrimp.

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「ほっ、ほっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝Ho, ho.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝Ho, ho.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 後ろから同じように謙吾も中に入ってきた。
MESSAGE.EN: Behind him, Kengo entered the room in the same manner.
MESSAGE.Translation: Behind him, Kengo entered the room in the same manner.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ああ…謙吾まで…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Aah... Not you, too, Kengo...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Aah... Not you, too, Kengo...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「おまえもどうだ？　これはかなりのトレーニングになるぞ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝Why don't you join us? This training is very effective.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝Why don't you join us? This training is very effective.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「うん、ごめん…遠慮しておくよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Sorry, but... I think I'll pass.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Sorry, but... I think I'll pass.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「もっぱぁーーーーっ!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Mopper!!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Mopper!!❞

MESSAGE.JP: ごしごしごしごしごしっ!!!
MESSAGE.EN: *Chop*scrub*scrub*scrub*scrub*!!!
MESSAGE.Translation: *Chop*scrub*scrub*scrub*scrub*!!!

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「ぎゃああぁぁーーーっ!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Gyaaaaa!!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Gyaaaaa!!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「ぬおおぉぉおぉーーっ!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝Nuooooo!!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝Nuooooo!!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 葉留佳さんがものすごい勢いでふたりにモップ掛けを始めた！
MESSAGE.EN: Haruka-san began mopping the two guys with astonishing speed!!
MESSAGE.Translation: Haruka-san began mopping the two guys with astonishing speed!!

MESSAGE.JP: 葉留佳さんがものすごい勢いで真人にモップ掛けを始めた！
MESSAGE.EN: Haruka-san began mopping Masato with astonishing speed!!
MESSAGE.Translation: Haruka-san began mopping Masato with astonishing speed!!

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「て、てめえっ、オレが動けない事をいいことに、なんてことしやがるっ!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Y, you know I can't move freely. What are you doing, you fiend!!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Y, you know I can't move freely. What are you doing, you fiend!!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「はるちんはキレイ好きに目覚めたのだーっ!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Haruchin has been reborn as a cleaning-loving girl!!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Haruchin has been reborn as a cleaning-loving girl!!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「うおおおぉーっ!!　抵抗できねぇーっ!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Uooooo!! I can't do anything!!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Uooooo!! I can't do anything!!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「だが…悪くない」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝However... this isn't bad.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝However... this isn't bad.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「え、マジで…？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Eh, are you serious...?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Eh, are you serious...?❞

MESSAGE.JP: ごしごしごしごしごしごしっ!!!
MESSAGE.EN: *Scrub*scrub*scrub*scrub*scrub*!!!
MESSAGE.Translation: *Scrub*scrub*scrub*scrub*scrub*!!!

MESSAGE.JP: …数分後、ふたりはピカピカになった。
MESSAGE.EN: ...A few minutes later, both of them were sparkling clean.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...A few minutes later, both of them were sparkling clean.

MESSAGE.JP: ごしごしごしごしごしごしっ!!!
MESSAGE.EN: *Scrub*scrub*scrub*scrub*scrub*!!!
MESSAGE.Translation: *Scrub*scrub*scrub*scrub*scrub*!!!

MESSAGE.JP: …数分後、真人はピカピカになった。
MESSAGE.EN: ...A few minutes later, Masato was sparkling clean.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...A few minutes later, Masato was sparkling clean.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「まあ、全部綺麗になったからよかったといえばよかったけどねぇ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Well, it's okay since they turned out so beautifully clean...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Well, it's okay since they turned out so beautifully clean...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「うん、きれいなのは気持ちがいいよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Yes. It's so nice when it's clean.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Yes. It's so nice when it's clean.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「理樹君もきれい好きなんだねー」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Do you also like cleaning, Riki-kun?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Do you also like cleaning, Riki-kun?❞

MESSAGE.JP: …まあ、そういうのはいつもやってることだし。
MESSAGE.EN: ...Well, at least I'm doing it all the time.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...Well, at least I'm doing it all the time.

MESSAGE.JP: たまに全然掃除しない恭介の部屋を掃除したりもするくらいだ。
MESSAGE.EN: I sometimes clean up Kyousuke's room, because he never does that himself at all.
MESSAGE.Translation: I sometimes clean up Kyousuke's room, because he never does that himself at all.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「…来ヶ谷さんも掃除とかはあんましないタイプなのかなぁ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...I wonder whether Kurugaya-san doesn't like cleaning either...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...I wonder whether Kurugaya-san doesn't like cleaning either...❞

MESSAGE.JP: トップふたりがこうだと、毎回掃除をするのも大変かもしれない。
MESSAGE.EN: It might be tough to keep this room clean, if the two commanders are like that.
MESSAGE.Translation: It might be tough to keep this room clean, if the two commanders are like that.

MESSAGE.JP: あれ。
MESSAGE.EN: Huh?
MESSAGE.Translation: Huh?

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@『待てよ…なんか俺たちが悪者みたいじゃないか…』
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❛Wait... That almost makes us look as if we're evil...❜
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❛Wait... That almost makes us look as if we're evil...❜

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@『まあ、冗談はこれくらいにして始めるか』
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❛Oh well, time to stop joking around and get started too.❜
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❛Oh well, time to stop joking around and get started too.❜

MESSAGE.JP: 掃除を始めるとき、ふたりはこう言っていたのをふと思い出す。
MESSAGE.EN: I suddenly remembered what those two said when we started cleaning.
MESSAGE.Translation: I suddenly remembered what those two said when we started cleaning.

MESSAGE.JP: さりげなくこのふたり動かしたのって小毬さんか？
MESSAGE.EN: By chance, could Komari-san have casually pressured them into action?
MESSAGE.Translation: By chance, could Komari-san have casually pressured them into action?

MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「いや…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝No...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝No...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 最強は天然なのかもしれない…。
MESSAGE.EN: The strongest one among us might be her, the natural airhead...
MESSAGE.Translation: The strongest one among us might be her, the natural airhead...

MESSAGE.JP: ま、いっか…。
MESSAGE.EN: Well, whatever...
MESSAGE.Translation: Well, whatever...

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ごめん、ちょっとさすらってくるよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Sorry, but I'll wander for a bit.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Sorry, but I'll wander for a bit.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「おう、気をつけてな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Oh, be careful.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Oh, be careful.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「理樹、そろそろ飯行こうぜ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Riki, it's time for dinner. Let's go.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Riki, it's time for dinner. Let's go.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「あ、うん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Uh, yeah.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Uh, yeah.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「あれ、真人はどうした」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Oh, where's Masato?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Oh, where's Masato?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「また外でトレーニングじゃないかな。たぶん学食で合流できると思うよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝He should still be training outside. I suppose he'll join us in the cafeteria.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝He should still be training outside. I suppose he'll join us in the cafeteria.❞

MESSAGE.JP: というわけで、恭介と二人で学食へ向かうことに。
MESSAGE.EN: Hence, Kyousuke and I headed for the cafeteria.
MESSAGE.Translation: Hence, Kyousuke and I headed for the cafeteria.

MESSAGE.JP: …途中。
MESSAGE.EN: ...On the way there...
MESSAGE.Translation: ...On the way there...

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「あれ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Oh...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Oh...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 学食のドアの近くで、なにやら小毬さんがうろうろしていた。
MESSAGE.EN: I saw Komari-san standing by the door to the cafeteria for some reason.
MESSAGE.Translation: I saw Komari-san standing by the door to the cafeteria for some reason.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「小毬さん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Komari-san.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Komari-san.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「あー、理樹君～」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Ahh, Riki-kuuun～.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Ahh, Riki-kuuun～.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「どうした？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝What's wrong?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝What's wrong?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「うえーん、お昼寝してたら寝坊しちゃってー」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Ueen, I took a nap and woke up late.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Ueen, I took a nap and woke up late.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ああ、なるほど…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Ah, I see.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Ah, I see.❞

MESSAGE.JP: まあ、小毬さんならやりそうなことだ。
MESSAGE.EN: It's something Komari-san might do.
MESSAGE.Translation: It's something Komari-san might do.

MESSAGE.JP: …ちなみに学食は暗黙の了解と言うやつで、女子が先に、男子が後に夕食を食べる、ということになっている。
MESSAGE.EN: ...There is an unspoken understanding about the cafeteria: girls have their dinner first.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...There is an unspoken understanding about the cafeteria: girls have their dinner first.

MESSAGE.JP: 規則というわけじゃないので、別にその辺りは自由ではあるんだけど…。
MESSAGE.EN: It's not a rule or anything, so it's up to each student, but...
MESSAGE.Translation: It's not a rule or anything, so it's up to each student, but...

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「まあ、女の子ひとりじゃ入りづらい雰囲気だよねえ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝It must be hard for a girl to enter in that atmosphere now.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝It must be hard for a girl to enter in that atmosphere now.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「じゃあちょうどいいだろ。一緒に食うか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Well, it's good timing. Let's eat together, shall we?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Well, it's good timing. Let's eat together, shall we?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「うん、ありがと～」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Yes, thank you～.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Yes, thank you～.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 小毬さんも連れて、席に向かう。
MESSAGE.EN: The three of us took our seats.
MESSAGE.Translation: The three of us took our seats.

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「あれ…珍しいじゃねえか、なんで小毬がいんだ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Oh... This is a rare thing. Why are you with them, Komari?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Oh... This is a rare thing. Why are you with them, Komari?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「まあ、いろいろあってね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Well, it's a long story.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Well, it's a long story.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「まあ、詳しくは訊かんが」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝We won't pry into the details.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝We won't pry into the details.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「じゃあ、りんちゃんの隣に座るよー」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝I'll sit down next to Rin-chan, then.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝I'll sit down next to Rin-chan, then.❞

MESSAGE.JP: ちりん、と音を立てて鈴が頷く。
MESSAGE.EN: Her bell chimed as Rin nodded.
MESSAGE.Translation: Her bell chimed as Rin nodded.

MESSAGE.JP: 今日の夕食はトンカツだった。
MESSAGE.EN: The dinner today was pork cutlet.
MESSAGE.Translation: The dinner today was pork cutlet.

MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝Hm...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝Hm...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ん、どうしたの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝What's wrong?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝What's wrong?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「ソースがないな。取ってこよう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝There's no sauce. I'll go get it.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝There's no sauce. I'll go get it.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「あ、うん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Uh, yea.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Uh, yea.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾が席を離れる。
MESSAGE.EN: Kengo left his seat.
MESSAGE.Translation: Kengo left his seat.

MESSAGE.EN: ...And then.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...And then.

MESSAGE.JP: 真人が謙吾のカツを一切れかっさらう。
MESSAGE.EN: Masato pilfered a piece of cutlet from Kengo's plate.
MESSAGE.Translation: Masato pilfered a piece of cutlet from Kengo's plate.

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「あっ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Uh...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Uh...❞

MESSAGE.JP: それを見ていた小毬さんが、自分のカツを謙吾の皿に移し、その空白を埋めた。
MESSAGE.EN: Komari-san, who witnessed his theft, put a piece of her own cutlet onto Kengo's plate.
MESSAGE.Translation: Komari-san, who witnessed his theft, put a piece of her own cutlet onto Kengo's plate.

MESSAGE.JP: 真人がさらに謙吾のカツを一切れ奪い、口に運ぶ。
MESSAGE.EN: Again, Masato snatched a piece of Kengo's cutlet and gobbled it down.
MESSAGE.Translation: Again, Masato snatched a piece of Kengo's cutlet and gobbled it down.

MESSAGE.JP: …小毬さんがその穴を補充する。
MESSAGE.EN: ...Komari-san made a refill.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...Komari-san made a refill.

MESSAGE.JP: いや、そのままじゃ小毬さんの分なくなっちゃうし…。
MESSAGE.EN: At this rate, she won't have anything left to eat...
MESSAGE.Translation: At this rate, she won't have anything left to eat...

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「真人、バレてるからさ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Masato, you have to stop it.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Masato, you have to stop it.❞

MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Ah?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Ah?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「いや謙吾のカツ取りまくりだったでしょ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Don't you think you've taken enough cutlet from Kengo's plate...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Don't you think you've taken enough cutlet from Kengo's plate...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「ああ…それがよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Well... Listen to this.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Well... Listen to this.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「オレもひとつでやめるつもりだったんだが、いくら取っても減らねえんだよ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝I was first gonna get only one piece, but no matter how much I took they didn't decrease at all.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝I was first gonna get only one piece, but no matter how much I took they didn't decrease at all.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「そんで思わず実験したくなってさ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝So I just wanted to make sure what was going on.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝So I just wanted to make sure what was going on.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「いやそれ小毬さんのだから」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝You were eating Komari-san's cutlets.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝You were eating Komari-san's cutlets.❞

MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Ah?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Ah?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「あ、うん…別にいいよ、私そんなに食べないからー」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Uh, never mind it... I don't eat that much anyway.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Uh, never mind it... I don't eat that much anyway.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「何遠慮してんだよ、もっとくわねえとでかくなれねえぞ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝You don't have to be so reserved. Eat a lot and get taller.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝You don't have to be so reserved. Eat a lot and get taller.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「真人が遠慮なさ過ぎるんだけどさ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I think you ought to be a lot more reserved, Masato.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I think you ought to be a lot more reserved, Masato.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「ほれ、こっからとって食えよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Here, eat up.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Here, eat up.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾の皿のカツを小毬さんの皿に移す。
MESSAGE.EN: He rolled all the cutlets on Kengo's plate over to Komari-san's.
MESSAGE.Translation: He rolled all the cutlets on Kengo's plate over to Komari-san's.

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「ふ、ふええっ!?」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝F, fueee!?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝F, fueee!?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「…何してる、この馬鹿」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝...What are you doing, stupid?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝...What are you doing, stupid?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾が戻ってきていた!!
MESSAGE.EN: Kengo came back!!
MESSAGE.Translation: Kengo came back!!

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「ああ、遠慮がちな小毬のためにちょっとなっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Ah, just helping out an overly modest girl a little.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Ah, just helping out an overly modest girl a little.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「んなもんおまえのカツを分けてやればいいだろうがっ!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝That's not what I'm asking, why don't you just give her yours!!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝That's not what I'm asking, why don't you just give her yours!!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「ああ!?　んなことしたらオレの分が足りなくなるだろうがっ!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Ah!? Do you want me to go without food and collapse the next minute!?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Ah!? Do you want me to go without food and collapse the next minute!?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「俺の分がすでに足りないわぁあーっ!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝My portion is small enough as it is, already!!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝My portion is small enough as it is, already!!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「あああーっ、わ、私のカツあげるからけんかしないでーっ!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Ahhhh, you can have my share, just don't fight!!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Ahhhh, you can have my share, just don't fight!!❞

MESSAGE.JP: ばきぃ！
MESSAGE.EN: *WHAM*!
MESSAGE.Translation: *WHAM*!

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「うっさいわぼけーっ!!　こまりちゃん困ってるだろーっ!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Shut up, idiot!! Can't you see Komari-chan is troubled!!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Shut up, idiot!! Can't you see Komari-chan is troubled!!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「…ごめんなさい」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝...I'm sorry.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝...I'm sorry.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 顔に靴跡をつけながら謝罪。
MESSAGE.EN: He apologized with a shoe print on his face.
MESSAGE.Translation: He apologized with a shoe print on his face.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「まあ、とった分ちゃんと戻しなよ、真人」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Well, why don't you just give back as much as you took, Masato.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Well, why don't you just give back as much as you took, Masato.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「ちっ…しかたねえな…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Tsk... Okay...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Tsk... Okay...❞

MESSAGE.JP: とりあえずもう少し様子をみることにする。
MESSAGE.EN: I decided to watch the situation for a while longer.
MESSAGE.Translation: I decided to watch the situation for a while longer.

MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Hm...?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Hm...?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人が謙吾の皿を見て声を上げた。
MESSAGE.EN: Masato made a voice as he saw Kengo's plate.
MESSAGE.Translation: Masato made a voice as he saw Kengo's plate.

MESSAGE.JP: どうやら小毬さんが補充していることに気付いていないらしい。
MESSAGE.EN: It seems like he didn't notice Komari-san's refilling.
MESSAGE.Translation: It seems like he didn't notice Komari-san's refilling.

MESSAGE.JP: 取る。
MESSAGE.EN: Pick up.
MESSAGE.Translation: Pick up.

MESSAGE.JP: 補充。
MESSAGE.EN: Refill.
MESSAGE.Translation: Refill.

MESSAGE.JP: 取る。
MESSAGE.EN: Pick up.
MESSAGE.Translation: Pick up.

MESSAGE.JP: 補充。
MESSAGE.EN: Refill.
MESSAGE.Translation: Refill.

MESSAGE.JP: …あっという間に小毬さんのカツが半分なくなってしまった。
MESSAGE.EN: ...In the blink of an eye, the number of her cutlet pieces had halved.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...In the blink of an eye, the number of her cutlet pieces had halved.

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「取ってきたぞ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝I got it.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝I got it.❞

MESSAGE.JP: ソースを手に謙吾が戻ってくる。
MESSAGE.EN: Kengo came back with a sauce bottle in hand.
MESSAGE.Translation: Kengo came back with a sauce bottle in hand.

MESSAGE.JP: …小毬さんの穴埋めのおかげで、謙吾にはバレていないらしい。
MESSAGE.EN: ...Thanks to Komari-san, he didn't realize that Masato had done anything.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...Thanks to Komari-san, he didn't realize that Masato had done anything.

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「謙吾、こっちにもソース頼む」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Kengo, pass me the sauce please.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Kengo, pass me the sauce please.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「ああ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝Yeah.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝Yeah.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾が恭介にソースを手渡す。
MESSAGE.EN: Kengo handed Kyousuke the bottle.
MESSAGE.Translation: Kengo handed Kyousuke the bottle.

MESSAGE.JP: …その隙に。
MESSAGE.EN: ...In the meantime,
MESSAGE.Translation: ...In the meantime,

MESSAGE.JP: 真人ががば、と謙吾のカツを真ん中から半分持っていき、そのまま口に放りこんだ。
MESSAGE.EN: Masato stole away half of Kengo's cutlet and jammed it into his mouth.
MESSAGE.Translation: Masato stole away half of Kengo's cutlet and jammed it into his mouth.

MESSAGE.JP: 慌てて小毬さんが、自分の残りのカツを全て謙吾の皿に移す。
MESSAGE.EN: Panicking, Komari-san sent all the rest of her cutlet over onto Kengo's plate.
MESSAGE.Translation: Panicking, Komari-san sent all the rest of her cutlet over onto Kengo's plate.

MESSAGE.JP: 今度は小毬さんの移したカツが端のほうだったので、思いっきり違和感のある図になってしまっていた。
MESSAGE.EN: Since she had thrust her cutlet pieces on the edge of the plate, his dinner looked a little weird now.
MESSAGE.Translation: Since she had thrust her cutlet pieces on the edge of the plate, his dinner looked a little weird now.

MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝Hm...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝Hm...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「まあいいか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝Well, whatever.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝Well, whatever.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「あれ、食べるの早いな小毬」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Oh? You're a fast eater, Komari.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Oh? You're a fast eater, Komari.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「う、うん…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Ye, yeah...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Ye, yeah...❞

MESSAGE.JP: ソースのかかったキャベツをシャリシャリと食べ始める。
MESSAGE.EN: She started nibbling on some sauce-covered shredded cabbage.
MESSAGE.Translation: She started nibbling on some sauce-covered shredded cabbage.

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「うおっ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Uo...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Uo...❞

MESSAGE.JP: また元に戻った謙吾のカツを見て、真人が声を上げた。
MESSAGE.EN: Masato found Kengo's plate refilled with cutlet again and barked in astonishment.
MESSAGE.Translation: Masato found Kengo's plate refilled with cutlet again and barked in astonishment.

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「ん、端までソースがかかってなかったな。恭介、こっちに戻してくれ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝Hm. I still haven't any sauce. Kyousuke, pass it back.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝Hm. I still haven't any sauce. Kyousuke, pass it back.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「はいよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Here.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Here.❞

MESSAGE.JP: その隙に、さらに真人が謙吾のカツを奪う。
MESSAGE.EN: In the meantime, Masato stole yet another piece of Kengo's cutlet.
MESSAGE.Translation: In the meantime, Masato stole yet another piece of Kengo's cutlet.

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「う、うえーーんっ!!　もうないーーーっ!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝U, ueeeeen! I don't have any moreeee!!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝U, ueeeeen! I don't have any moreeee!!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「どうしたんだ、突然…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝What happened, all of a...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝What happened, all of a...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「ん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝Hm.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝Hm.❞

MESSAGE.JP: …小毬さんが補充できないので、謙吾のカツに空白が。
MESSAGE.EN: ...Since she had failed to refill the plate, he finally understood what was going on.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...Since she had failed to refill the plate, he finally understood what was going on.

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「また貴様かぁあーーーーっ!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝You bastard again!!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝You bastard again!!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「え？　あれ…いくら食ってもなくならない魔法のカツじゃなかったのかよ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Eh? Oh... I thought I had discovered an endless magical cutlet...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Eh? Oh... I thought I had discovered an endless magical cutlet...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「そんなカツがあるかぁっ!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝There's no such thing as a magical cutlet!!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝There's no such thing as a magical cutlet!!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「さっきまであったんだよっ!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝It was until just now!!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝It was until just now!!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「もういい、ぶった切ってくれるっ!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝That does it! I'll chop you up!!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝That does it! I'll chop you up!!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 二人が口論してる隙に、鈴が真人のカツを全部小毬さんの皿に移し替えた。
