MESSAGE.EN: In the meantime, Rin moved all of Masato's cutlets onto Komari-san's plate.
MESSAGE.Translation: In the meantime, Rin moved all of Masato's cutlets onto Komari-san's plate.

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「あっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Uh!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Uh!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「…どうせ馬鹿のだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝...Don't mind the idiots.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝...Don't mind the idiots.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「う、うーん…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Um, hmmm...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Um, hmmm...❞

MESSAGE.JP: とりあえず一切れ、謙吾の皿に移す小毬さん。
MESSAGE.EN: Komari-san transferred one more piece of her cutlet onto Kengo's plate.
MESSAGE.Translation: Komari-san transferred one more piece of her cutlet onto Kengo's plate.

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「ん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝Hm.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝Hm.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「…増えてるな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝...They increased.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝...They increased.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「ほれ、やっぱ魔法のカツだろうがっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝See? It is a magical cutlet!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝See? It is a magical cutlet!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「そんなことがあるのか…!?」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝How can that be!?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝How can that be!?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「ってオレのカツが一切れもねえーーーーッ!?」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Huh!? My cutlet is all gone!?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Huh!? My cutlet is all gone!?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「いやまあ、自業自得だからね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Well, you reap what you sow.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Well, you reap what you sow.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「…ありがとね、りんちゃん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝...Thanks, Rin-chan.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝...Thanks, Rin-chan.❞

MESSAGE.JP: …照れくさいのか、赤面して上目遣いで頷く。
MESSAGE.EN: ...She nodded, glancing up bashfully.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...She nodded, glancing up bashfully.

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「えへへー」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Ehehe.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Ehehe.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 小毬さんはそれを見て嬉しそうに笑う。
MESSAGE.EN: Seeing her face, Komari-san beamed radiantly.
MESSAGE.Translation: Seeing her face, Komari-san beamed radiantly.

MESSAGE.JP: …やっぱり、ふたりはもうすっかり友達みたいだ。
MESSAGE.EN: ...Those two really are complete friends already.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...Those two really are complete friends already.

MESSAGE.JP: 僕と恭介は、そんなふたりを見て笑い合った。
MESSAGE.EN: Looking at them, Kyousuke and I smiled as well.
MESSAGE.Translation: Looking at them, Kyousuke and I smiled as well.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@（…急ぐって行っても、ドアの前にいるし…）
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@(...Though I can't exactly hurry, being right in front of the door already...)
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@(...Though I can't exactly hurry, being right in front of the door already...)

MESSAGE.JP: 声を掛けようか迷っていると、小毬さんはこちらに気付くことなく去っていった。
MESSAGE.EN: Before I could decide what to do, she left without taking notice of us.
MESSAGE.Translation: Before I could decide what to do, she left without taking notice of us.

MESSAGE.JP: …なんだったんだろう。
MESSAGE.EN: ...What was she doing there?
MESSAGE.Translation: ...What was she doing there?

MESSAGE.JP: トレイを持って座る場所を探していると、珍しい組み合わせを目にした。
MESSAGE.EN: As I was looking for an empty seat, my eyes caught a rare pair of girls having dinner together.
MESSAGE.Translation: As I was looking for an empty seat, my eyes caught a rare pair of girls having dinner together.

MESSAGE.JP: クドと西園さんがテーブルで隣同士に座っている。
MESSAGE.EN: Kud and Nishizono-san were sitting next to each other.
MESSAGE.Translation: Kud and Nishizono-san were sitting next to each other.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「やあ、珍しいね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Hi. It's rare to see you girls here.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Hi. It's rare to see you girls here.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「リキ、こんにちはです」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Riki, good afternoon.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Riki, good afternoon.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「どうも」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝Hello.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝Hello.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「今日はクドと一緒だったんだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝You look to be having dinner with Kud today.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝You look to be having dinner with Kud today.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「…はい、能美さんに誘われまして」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝...Yes, she invited me here.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝...Yes, she invited me here.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「お近づきの印にちょいと一杯、というやつです」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝It's to commemorate our new partnership.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝It's to commemorate our new partnership.❞

MESSAGE.JP: …どこのオヤジだ。
MESSAGE.EN: ...What are you, an old man?
MESSAGE.Translation: ...What are you, an old man?

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ルームメイトだったっけ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝So you guys are roomies now.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝So you guys are roomies now.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「はい、一緒にベースボールもやるチームメイトでもありますから」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Yes. And teamies as well, since we're in the same baseball team.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Yes. And teamies as well, since we're in the same baseball team.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「なるほど」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I see.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I see.❞

MESSAGE.JP: クドは僕をじーっと見つめている。
MESSAGE.EN: She was looking at me intently.
MESSAGE.Translation: She was looking at me intently.

MESSAGE.JP: 何か期待されているような…。
MESSAGE.EN: Is she expecting something from me...?
MESSAGE.Translation: Is she expecting something from me...?

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「な、何？　クド」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Wha, what is it, Kud?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Wha, what is it, Kud?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「リキ、実はクラスメイトとチームメイトを掛けたはい・せんすなあめりかん・じょーくです」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Riki, to tell the truth, it was a play on the words ❛roommate❜ and ❛teammate.❜ This is a hai sensu Amerikan joku.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Riki, to tell the truth, it was a play on the words ❛roommate❜ and ❛teammate.❜ This is a hai sensu Amerikan joku.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「そ、そうなんだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Is, is that so?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Is, is that so?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「なので、笑っていただけると大喜びです。わーい」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝So, I'd be happy if you could laugh at it. Yay.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝So, I'd be happy if you could laugh at it. Yay.❞

MESSAGE.JP: クドは両手をあげて主張した。
MESSAGE.EN: She exclaimed with both her hands up in the air.
MESSAGE.Translation: She exclaimed with both her hands up in the air.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「いや…それちっともアメリカンジョークじゃないし」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝No... It's not an American joke at all.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝No... It's not an American joke at all.❞

MESSAGE.JP: というか自分で解説してすごく嬉しそうに喜んでるよね。
MESSAGE.EN: How could she enjoy explaining her own joke so much?
MESSAGE.Translation: How could she enjoy explaining her own joke so much?

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「なるほど、級友と球友と言うわけですね。確かに高度です」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝I see. By reanalyzing the word 'roomie' as a blending of the morphemes in 'roommate' you can get 'teamie' through analogous back-formation. That's clever.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝I see. By reanalyzing the word 'roomie' as a blending of the morphemes in 'roommate' you can get 'teamie' through analogous back-formation. That's clever.❞

MESSAGE.JP: えっ、そこまで深く考えての発言だったんだ。
MESSAGE.EN: Eh, I don't think she put that much thought into it.
MESSAGE.Translation: Eh, I don't think she put that much thought into it.

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「それは、気づきませんでしたっ！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝I didn't realize that at all!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝I didn't realize that at all!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「西園さんはすごいですねぇ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Nishizono-san, you are so smart...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Nishizono-san, you are so smart...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 本人もなんかしみじみ感心してるし。
MESSAGE.EN: She was really impressed about the explanation, herself.
MESSAGE.Translation: She was really impressed about the explanation, herself.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「わけわかんないよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I didn't get what you were saying at all.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I didn't get what you were saying at all.❞

MESSAGE.JP: ともかく、と僕はクドの隣に腰を降ろす。
MESSAGE.EN: I took a seat next to Kud anyway.
MESSAGE.Translation: I took a seat next to Kud anyway.

MESSAGE.JP: 西園さんは、カレーをふーふーしながら、少しずつ口の中に運んでいる。
MESSAGE.EN: Nishizono-san was blowing on every small spoonful of curry rice as she brought them to her mouth.
MESSAGE.Translation: Nishizono-san was blowing on every small spoonful of curry rice as she brought them to her mouth.

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「んっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝Hn.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝Hn.❞

MESSAGE.JP: …辛いの苦手なら、他のにすればいいのに。
MESSAGE.EN: ...Nishizono-san, if you can't handle spicy foods, why didn't you choose another dish?
MESSAGE.Translation: ...Nishizono-san, if you can't handle spicy foods, why didn't you choose another dish?

MESSAGE.JP: クドは、かけそばだった。
MESSAGE.EN: Kud was having soba.
MESSAGE.Translation: Kud was having soba.

MESSAGE.JP: そばとうどんだけは、夕食のときでも注文すれば食べることが出来る。
MESSAGE.EN: You could get soba and udon for dinner as well if you ordered them.
MESSAGE.Translation: You could get soba and udon for dinner as well if you ordered them.

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「リキもライスカレーですか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝You have curry with rice too, Riki?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝You have curry with rice too, Riki?❞

MESSAGE.JP: …微妙に昔の人っぽい言い回しだなあ。
MESSAGE.EN: ...That's a little archaic phrasing, too.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...That's a little archaic phrasing, too.

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「そうですっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝That's right!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝That's right!❞

MESSAGE.JP: クドの声に、思わずスプーンを止める。
MESSAGE.EN: Her sudden voice made me stop eating.
MESSAGE.Translation: Her sudden voice made me stop eating.

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「日本では一杯のじゃぱにーずぬーどるを分け合って食べると、友情が生まれるという言い伝えがあると聞きました」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝I've heard a legend that in Japan a friendship will bloom from sharing a bowl of noodles.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝I've heard a legend that in Japan a friendship will bloom from sharing a bowl of noodles.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 誰だ、そんな昔の大晦日の風物詩みたいな嘘を教えたのは…。
MESSAGE.EN: Who the heck taught her such a lie...
MESSAGE.Translation: Who the heck taught her such a lie...

MESSAGE.JP: …心当たりが多すぎる。
MESSAGE.EN: ...There were too many possible candidates.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...There were too many possible candidates.

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「ここは一つ、ちゃれんじどばいぬーどるですよっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝So let's tyarenjido bai nu-doru!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝So let's tyarenjido bai nu-doru!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「能美さん、それは間違ってます」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝Noumi-san, that's wrong.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝Noumi-san, that's wrong.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「えっ…そうなんですか…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Eh... It is...?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Eh... It is...?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「うう、また私カンチガイしてますか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Uu, did I misunderstand again?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Uu, did I misunderstand again?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 一瞬、クドが落ち込むけど。
MESSAGE.EN: Kud's spirits sunk for a moment.
MESSAGE.Translation: Kud's spirits sunk for a moment.

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「正確には三人で分け合うのです。ほら、ちょうど直枝さんもいますから」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝It's supposed to be shared by three people. And lo, we have Naoe-san right here.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝It's supposed to be shared by three people. And lo, we have Naoe-san right here.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「そーでしたかっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝So that's how it was!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝So that's how it was!❞

MESSAGE.JP: すぐに笑った。
MESSAGE.EN: The smile immediately returned to her face.
MESSAGE.Translation: The smile immediately returned to her face.

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「いっつ・あ・ぐったいみー」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Ittsu a guttaimi.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Ittsu a guttaimi.❞

MESSAGE.JP: グッドタイミングと言いたいらしい。
MESSAGE.EN: I guess she tried to say ❛good timing❜ in her usual manner.
MESSAGE.Translation: I guess she tried to say ❛good timing❜ in her usual manner.

MESSAGE.JP: じゃあ、まずは西園さんからということになった。
MESSAGE.EN: In other words, Nishizono-san was the instigator.
MESSAGE.Translation: In other words, Nishizono-san was the instigator.

MESSAGE.JP: …だけど。
MESSAGE.EN: ...But still.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...But still.

MESSAGE.JP: 西園さんは音も立てずに、その小さい口にそばを入れている。
MESSAGE.EN: Nishizono-san was putting the soba in her mouth without making a single noise.
MESSAGE.Translation: Nishizono-san was putting the soba in her mouth without making a single noise.

MESSAGE.JP: よくよく見ると、箸の先に一点の汚れもない。
MESSAGE.EN: Looking closely, her chopsticks weren't even wet on the edges.
MESSAGE.Translation: Looking closely, her chopsticks weren't even wet on the edges.

MESSAGE.JP: 汁の中に箸を入れても、つゆがまったくついてないんだ。
MESSAGE.EN: In other words, she was grabbing the noodles so elegantly that they didn't stick to the chopsticks.
MESSAGE.Translation: In other words, she was grabbing the noodles so elegantly that they didn't stick to the chopsticks.

MESSAGE.JP: よほどうまく箸を扱わないと、ああはいかないだろう。
MESSAGE.EN: That requires quite a bit of skill, it's not something just anyone can do.
MESSAGE.Translation: That requires quite a bit of skill, it's not something just anyone can do.

MESSAGE.JP: そばが一本ずつ、器用に吸い込まれていく。
MESSAGE.EN: She once again moved her chopsticks with great finesse.
MESSAGE.Translation: She once again moved her chopsticks with great finesse.

MESSAGE.JP: 僕もクドも見ているしかなかった。
MESSAGE.EN: The only thing Kud and I could do was just watch in awe.
MESSAGE.Translation: The only thing Kud and I could do was just watch in awe.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「…あの後だと、なんか食べにくいなあ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...It's going to be hard, eating after her.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...It's going to be hard, eating after her.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 自慢じゃないけど、箸の使い方には自信がない。
MESSAGE.EN: I'm not proud of the fact, but I'm really not too good at using chopsticks.
MESSAGE.Translation: I'm not proud of the fact, but I'm really not too good at using chopsticks.

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「日本のおそばは、大きく音を立てて食べるほど良いと聞いたことがあります」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝They say Japanese soba is supposed to be eaten with a degree of noise!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝They say Japanese soba is supposed to be eaten with a degree of noise!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「西園さんも、そのしきたりに従ってはどーでしょうかっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Why don't you follow that tradition as well, Nishizono-san?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Why don't you follow that tradition as well, Nishizono-san?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 箸を休めて、西園さんがクドを見る。
MESSAGE.EN: Nishizono-san put her chopsticks down and looked at Kud.
MESSAGE.Translation: Nishizono-san put her chopsticks down and looked at Kud.

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「…そうですか？　ではお言葉に甘えることにしましょう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝...Really? I shall do just that then, please excuse me.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝...Really? I shall do just that then, please excuse me.❞

MESSAGE.JP: どんぶりを両手に手にする。
MESSAGE.EN: She held up the bowl with both hands.
MESSAGE.Translation: She held up the bowl with both hands.

MESSAGE.JP: 端に口をつけると…。
MESSAGE.EN: And set it to her lips...
MESSAGE.Translation: And set it to her lips...

MESSAGE.JP: ずずずずずーーーっっっ…
MESSAGE.EN: Zuzuzuzuzuuuuuuu.
MESSAGE.Translation: Zuzuzuzuzuuuuuuu.

MESSAGE.JP: そばとつゆが西園さんの口に吸い込まれていった。
MESSAGE.EN: Soba and soup were sucked into her mouth.
MESSAGE.Translation: Soba and soup were sucked into her mouth.

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「ふぅ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝Phew.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝Phew.❞

MESSAGE.JP: とん、とテーブルにどんぶりを置いた。
MESSAGE.EN: She set the bowl back on the table.
MESSAGE.Translation: She set the bowl back on the table.

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「実は一度やってみたかったのです」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝I always wanted to do that just once.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝I always wanted to do that just once.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「…なかなか、その機会がなかったものですから」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝...But, there has never been an opportunity.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝...But, there has never been an opportunity.❞

MESSAGE.JP: …普通はそんな機会はないと思う。
MESSAGE.EN: ...Yeah, you usually wouldn't have a pretext for doing that.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...Yeah, you usually wouldn't have a pretext for doing that.

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「では、能美さんもどうぞ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝Now, help yourself, Noumi-san.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝Now, help yourself, Noumi-san.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「おー、日本の伝統文化ですね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Ohh, this is Japan's traditional culture.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Ohh, this is Japan's traditional culture.❞

MESSAGE.JP: ずずずずずずーーーーーっっっっっ…
MESSAGE.EN: Zuzuzuzuzuzuuuuuuuuuuuuu...
MESSAGE.Translation: Zuzuzuzuzuzuuuuuuuuuuuuu...

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「これで私と西園さんとは『同じ釜の飯を食った』というやつです」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝With this, me and Nishizono-san are living under the same roof and eating from the same bowl.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝With this, me and Nishizono-san are living under the same roof and eating from the same bowl.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 色々と違いすぎて、ツッコむ気にもなれない。
MESSAGE.EN: There were too many things wrong with that statement to comment on.
MESSAGE.Translation: There were too many things wrong with that statement to comment on.

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「さあ、リキもれっつとらいです」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Now, rettsu torai Riki.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Now, rettsu torai Riki.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「…れっつあんどごーです」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝...Rettsu and gou.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝...Rettsu and gou.❞

MESSAGE.JP: こうなったら、やらなきゃ損だ。
MESSAGE.EN: I guess I have to.
MESSAGE.Translation: I guess I have to.

MESSAGE.JP: ずずずずずずすずずーーーーーーーーーーっっっっっっ…
MESSAGE.EN: Zuzuzuzuzuzuzuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuu...
MESSAGE.Translation: Zuzuzuzuzuzuzuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuu...

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「うん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Yeah.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Yeah.❞

MESSAGE.JP: おいしい。
MESSAGE.EN: It was great.
MESSAGE.Translation: It was great.

MESSAGE.JP: 賑やかな食堂の一角で。
MESSAGE.EN: At the corner of the lively cafeteria,
MESSAGE.Translation: At the corner of the lively cafeteria,

MESSAGE.JP: こうして。
MESSAGE.EN: like this,
MESSAGE.Translation: like this,

MESSAGE.JP: ひとつのどんぶりに入ったそばを、三人でまわし呑みした。
MESSAGE.EN: the three of us shared one bowl of soba.
MESSAGE.Translation: the three of us shared one bowl of soba.

MESSAGE.JP: …また少し、仲良くなれたかも知れない。
MESSAGE.EN: ...Maybe our friendship did grow a little closer from it.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...Maybe our friendship did grow a little closer from it.

MESSAGE.JP: 邪魔しちゃ悪いかもしれないし、声を掛けるのは止めておこう。
MESSAGE.EN: I didn't want to bother them, so I decided not to talk to them.
MESSAGE.Translation: I didn't want to bother them, so I decided not to talk to them.

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介たちの待つテーブルにお盆を持って席につく。
MESSAGE.EN: I took a seat at the table where Kyousuke and the rest were waiting.
MESSAGE.Translation: I took a seat at the table where Kyousuke and the rest were waiting.

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「みんな練習したぶんもりもり食えよ。特に理樹と鈴」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Eat a lot so you can take our hard practice. Especially Riki and Rin.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Eat a lot so you can take our hard practice. Especially Riki and Rin.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「鈴、もうごちそうさまなのか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Rin, you're finished already?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Rin, you're finished already?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「うん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Yes.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Yes.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「お椀貸せよ。おかわりしてきてやるから」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Give me your bowl. I'll get you a second helping.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Give me your bowl. I'll get you a second helping.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「もうお腹いっぱいだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝My tummy's full.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝My tummy's full.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「今食わないでいつ食うんだ。今なら筋肉がつくぞ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝If you don't start eating now, when are you going to do it? You need to put on some muscle.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝If you don't start eating now, when are you going to do it? You need to put on some muscle.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 『筋肉』というワードに真人がぴくんと反応しかけたが、食べることに専念したようだ。
MESSAGE.EN: Masato's ears twitched in reaction to the word ❛muscle,❜ though he seemed to have been concentrating on his dinner.
MESSAGE.Translation: Masato's ears twitched in reaction to the word ❛muscle,❜ though he seemed to have been concentrating on his dinner.

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「とにかく貸せ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Just hand me that.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Just hand me that.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「もうおかずもないんだぞ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝But I don't have any more side dishes left?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝But I don't have any more side dishes left?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「さあ、これはなんでしょう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Look here, what do you suppose this is?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Look here, what do you suppose this is?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「ちゃーんちゃちゃーんちゃちゃちゃちゃちゃ～」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Taa-ta-daa, ta-ta-ta-ta-ta-daa～.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Taa-ta-daa, ta-ta-ta-ta-ta-daa～.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介が鼻歌を歌いながら、懐から小袋を取り出した。
MESSAGE.EN: Humming a song, he produced a pouch from his pocket.
MESSAGE.Translation: Humming a song, he produced a pouch from his pocket.

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「それは…$K71のりたま$K0!?」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝That is... $K71noritama$K0 seasoning!?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝That is... $K71noritama$K0 seasoning!?❞

MESSAGE.JP: ふりかけだった。
MESSAGE.EN: He was holding a bag of seaweed and egg rice seasoning.
MESSAGE.Translation: He was holding a bag of seaweed and egg rice seasoning.

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「なにぃ、のりたまだとぅ!?」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝Whaat, noritama!?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝Whaat, noritama!?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾まで食いついていた！
MESSAGE.EN: Even Kengo was interested in it!
MESSAGE.Translation: Even Kengo was interested in it!

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「おまえはすでにでかいからいらんだろ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝You're big enough as you are already, you don't need this anymore.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝You're big enough as you are already, you don't need this anymore.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「しまったぁぁ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝What a thing to happen...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝What a thing to happen...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 何の後悔かわからない。大きく育ってしまったことをだろうか。
MESSAGE.EN: I wasn't sure what it was he was regretting. Growing up too big, perhaps?
MESSAGE.Translation: I wasn't sure what it was he was regretting. Growing up too big, perhaps?

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴がものすごい勢いで食いついて見ている。
MESSAGE.EN: Rin ate at an earth-shattering pace.
MESSAGE.Translation: Rin ate at an earth-shattering pace.

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「じゃ、おかわりな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝All right, I'm getting another one.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝All right, I'm getting another one.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴のお椀を取り上げる。
MESSAGE.EN: He picked up her bowl.
MESSAGE.Translation: He picked up her bowl.

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「理樹、おまえものりたまでもう一杯どうだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Riki, how about you try noritama too?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Riki, how about you try noritama too?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「じゃ、僕も」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Okay, I'll have some.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Okay, I'll have some.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 立ち上がろうとすると、それを恭介が手で制し、僕のお椀も取り上げて颯爽とジャーのあるカウンターへと向かった。
MESSAGE.EN: I tried to stand up, but Kyousuke stopped me, picked up my bowl and headed to the counter with the rice cooker.
MESSAGE.Translation: I tried to stand up, but Kyousuke stopped me, picked up my bowl and headed to the counter with the rice cooker.

MESSAGE.JP: ふたつのお椀を山盛りにして戻ってくる。
MESSAGE.EN: Then he came back with two bowls heaped with rice.
MESSAGE.Translation: Then he came back with two bowls heaped with rice.

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「ほらよ、お待たせ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Here you are, sorry to keep you.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Here you are, sorry to keep you.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ありがとう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Thank you.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Thank you.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「こんなに食えるかっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝I can't eat this much!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝I can't eat this much!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 山盛りのごはんを前に鈴が言う。
MESSAGE.EN: She yelled out, faced with the mountain of rice.
MESSAGE.Translation: She yelled out, faced with the mountain of rice.

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「でも、のりたまだぜ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝But, it's noritama.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝But, it's noritama.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「うん、食えるっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Yep, I'll eat.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Yep, I'll eat.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「僕はこれだけで十分だよ。ありがとう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝This is enough for me. Thank you.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝This is enough for me. Thank you.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「なら俺がぁっ！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝Then give it to me!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝Then give it to me!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 空になったお椀を体ごとテーブルに滑り込み、恭介へ差し出す。
MESSAGE.EN: Kengo slid on the table and offered up his empty bowl to Kyousuke.
MESSAGE.Translation: Kengo slid on the table and offered up his empty bowl to Kyousuke.

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「自分でいけばいいだろ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Why don't you just go get it yourself...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Why don't you just go get it yourself...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「なるほど、確かに」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝I see, you have a point.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝I see, you have a point.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「ばかだな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝He's dumb.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝He's dumb.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 解決したようだった…。
MESSAGE.EN: Looks like the problem was solved...
MESSAGE.Translation: Looks like the problem was solved...

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「そっか、なら鈴の分だけ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Okay, I'll get only Rin's helping then.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Okay, I'll get only Rin's helping then.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 颯爽とジャーのあるカウンターへと向かった。
MESSAGE.EN: He walked to the counter with a brisk step.
MESSAGE.Translation: He walked to the counter with a brisk step.

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴のお椀を山盛りにして戻ってくる。
MESSAGE.EN: Then he came back with her bowl heaped with rice.
MESSAGE.Translation: Then he came back with her bowl heaped with rice.

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「ほらよ、お待たせ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Here you are, sorry to keep you.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Here you are, sorry to keep you.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「こんなに食えるかっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝I can't eat this much!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝I can't eat this much!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「でも、のりたまだぜ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝But, it's noritama.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝But, it's noritama.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「うん、食えるっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Yep, I'll eat!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Yep, I'll eat!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 夕飯の後、西園さんから借りた文庫を部屋で広げる。
MESSAGE.EN: After dinner, I opened the book Nishizono-san had lent me.
MESSAGE.Translation: After dinner, I opened the book Nishizono-san had lent me.

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「ふぅ、筋トレ終了…いい汗かいたぜ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Phew, I'm done with my muscle training... That was a good sweat.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Phew, I'm done with my muscle training... That was a good sweat.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「なんだ、珍しいな、読書か？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Huh? How unusual, you reading a book, Riki?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Huh? How unusual, you reading a book, Riki?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「…じゃ、遊べねぇな、と」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝...I can't play with you then.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝...I can't play with you then.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「…何をしようかな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝...What do I do...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝...What do I do...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「そうだ、筋トレをしよう！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Oh, yeah! I'll do muscle training!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Oh, yeah! I'll do muscle training!❞

MESSAGE.JP: わけがわからない…！
MESSAGE.EN: I just can't figure him out...!
MESSAGE.Translation: I just can't figure him out...!

MESSAGE.JP: さっき食べたことを忘れているおじいちゃんみたいじゃないか！と思いつつも口には出さず、本に集中することにする。
MESSAGE.EN: He's like an old man who keeps forgetting he's just eaten a while ago! ...I didn't say anything though, but concentrated on the book.
MESSAGE.Translation: He's like an old man who keeps forgetting he's just eaten a while ago! ...I didn't say anything though, but concentrated on the book.

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「ふんっ、ふんっ、ふんっ、ふんっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Humph, humph, humph, humph.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Humph, humph, humph, humph.❞

MESSAGE.JP: リズムよく鼻息が聞こえてくるが、集中、集中…。
MESSAGE.EN: Masato's rhythmical snorting resounded in the room. Ignore it, ignore it...
MESSAGE.Translation: Masato's rhythmical snorting resounded in the room. Ignore it, ignore it...

MESSAGE.JP: 『現場には血が拭き取られた痕跡がありました。犯人がとった、この当然とも思える行動が私にその人物の名を教えてくれたのです』
MESSAGE.EN: [There were signs that somebody had wiped up the blood. You might think it's a very natural thing to do, but that fact was enough to tell me who the murderer is.]
MESSAGE.Translation: [There were signs that somebody had wiped up the blood. You might think it's a very natural thing to do, but that fact was enough to tell me who the murderer is.]

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「筋肉っ、筋肉っ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Muscle, muscle.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Muscle, muscle.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 『犯人の名は…』
MESSAGE.EN: [And the name of the culprit is...]
MESSAGE.Translation: [And the name of the culprit is...]

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「オレの筋肉がっ、うなるっ！　うなりを上げる!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝My muscles are screaming! They're screaming out!!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝My muscles are screaming! They're screaming out!!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 推理を語っている細面の探偵が、いきなりマッチョになる。
MESSAGE.EN: The thin private eye in the book, who was walking through his deduction, suddenly turned into a muscular macho.
MESSAGE.Translation: The thin private eye in the book, who was walking through his deduction, suddenly turned into a muscular macho.

MESSAGE.JP: 『おまえだーーーーーーっっっっ』
MESSAGE.EN: [It's youuuuuuuuuuuu!!!]
MESSAGE.Translation: [It's youuuuuuuuuuuu!!!]

MESSAGE.JP: そして始まる探偵と犯人の人智を超えた壮絶なバトル。
MESSAGE.EN: And so, the epic battle between the revealed criminal and the detective began.
MESSAGE.Translation: And so, the epic battle between the revealed criminal and the detective began.

MESSAGE.JP: …ダメだ。
MESSAGE.EN: ...It's no good.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...It's no good.

MESSAGE.JP: 僕には集中力が足りない。
MESSAGE.EN: I can't concentrate.
MESSAGE.Translation: I can't concentrate.

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「え？　もう読んだのか？　はえーな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Eh? You finished already? So fast.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Eh? You finished already? So fast.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「さて、オレもこれくらいにしておくか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Well, I think this is enough.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Well, I think this is enough.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 静かだ…。
MESSAGE.EN: It was quiet...
MESSAGE.Translation: It was quiet...

MESSAGE.JP: 見れば真人が、部屋のど真ん中で大の字に寝転がっていた。
MESSAGE.EN: I found Masato lying spread-eagle in the middle of the room, panting.
MESSAGE.Translation: I found Masato lying spread-eagle in the middle of the room, panting.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「あれ、筋トレしないの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Huh, aren't you doing muscle training?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Huh, aren't you doing muscle training?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「あれ、筋トレはもう終わったの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Huh, did you already finish your muscle training?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Huh, did you already finish your muscle training?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「ああ…たまにこうして休みを入れて、筋肉に酸素を行き渡らせるんだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Yeah... You need to rest like this every once in a while to let your muscles absorb oxygen.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Yeah... You need to rest like this every once in a while to let your muscles absorb oxygen.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「そうすることによって翌日からのトレーニングがより効果の出るものになる、と本に書いてあったぜ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝By doing that, you can get better effects from your training the next day. That's what it said in a book.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝By doing that, you can get better effects from your training the next day. That's what it said in a book.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「へえ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝You don't say...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝You don't say...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 筋トレに関するうんちくだけはボケがない。
MESSAGE.EN: The only thing he's this serious about is his muscles.
MESSAGE.Translation: The only thing he's this serious about is his muscles.

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「恭介はこねえのか…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Isn't Kyousuke coming today...?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Isn't Kyousuke coming today...?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「そういえば、なんもないね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Now that you mention it...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Now that you mention it...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「なんだとぅ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝Whaat?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝Whaat?❞

MESSAGE.JP: ちなみに謙吾はずっといる。
MESSAGE.EN: By the way, Kengo was here all along.
MESSAGE.Translation: By the way, Kengo was here all along.

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「そもそもおまえはなんでいるんだよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Why are you here in the first place?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Why are you here in the first place?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「夜はみんなで遊ぶからじゃないか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝Because night is the time to play.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝Because night is the time to play.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「まーいつもはそうだけど、今日はこのままだとなしかな…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Well, usually yes, but it doesn't seem anything's happening tonight...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Well, usually yes, but it doesn't seem anything's happening tonight...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「なんだとぅ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝Whaat?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝Whaat?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「おまえなんなんだよ、さっきから気持ち悪ぃな…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝What the hell's with you? You make me sick...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝What the hell's with you? You make me sick...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「なんのために俺はここにきたんだよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝What did I come here for...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝What did I come here for...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「こっちが訊きてぇよ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝That's my question...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝That's my question...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「…じゃ、どうしよう？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...So, what are we gonna do?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...So, what are we gonna do?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「こっちから行ってみる？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Let's visit him, shall we?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Let's visit him, shall we?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「ああ、そうしよう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝I'm in favor.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝I'm in favor.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「ったく、しゃあねぇな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Tsk, let's do it then.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Tsk, let's do it then.❞

MESSAGE.JP: …というわけで、三人で部屋を後にした。
MESSAGE.EN: ...The three of us left the room.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...The three of us left the room.

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「嫌だ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝No.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝No.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「仕方ない。いいだろう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝Okay, it can't be helped.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝Okay, it can't be helped.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「なんて言うとでも思ったか、ばーか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝...Did you think I'd say that, dummy?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝...Did you think I'd say that, dummy?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「嫌だ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝No.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝No.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「嫌だ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝No.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝No.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「おめでとう。百回嫌だ記念だ。これをやろう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝Congratulations, you made me say ❛no❜ a hundred times. This is for you.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝Congratulations, you made me say ❛no❜ a hundred times. This is for you.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「嫌だ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝No.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝No.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 押し問答はこのぐらいにしておいて、恭介の部屋に行こう…。
MESSAGE.EN: Well, that's enough arguing about this, let's go see Kyousuke...
MESSAGE.Translation: Well, that's enough arguing about this, let's go see Kyousuke...

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「休みって決めたら、暇じゃねえか…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝I've decided to rest, but what should I do to pass the time...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝I've decided to rest, but what should I do to pass the time...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「じゃ、筋トレでもすっか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝All right, I'll do muscle training.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝All right, I'll do muscle training.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ええー（ここできたか！）」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Ehh (Is he for real!)❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Ehh (Is he for real!)❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「なんだよ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝What's the matter?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝What's the matter?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「さっき、休むとか言ってたばっかしだし、なんかうんちく語って、真人は筋トレに関してだけは詳しいなあって感心してたところだし…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Just a few seconds ago you said you would take a rest, and I was pretty impressed about your knowledge on muscles...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Just a few seconds ago you said you would take a rest, and I was pretty impressed about your knowledge on muscles...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「え？　そうか？　照れるな…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Eh? Really? You're embarrassing me...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Eh? Really? You're embarrassing me...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「いや、それはもろくも崩れ去った後なんだけど…それじゃ、どうしよう？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝No, you shattered that impression just now... So, what are we gonna do?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝No, you shattered that impression just now... So, what are we gonna do?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「こっちから行ってみる？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Why don't we pay him a visit?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Why don't we pay him a visit?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「それでもいいぜ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Fine by me.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Fine by me.❞

MESSAGE.JP: …というわけで、ふたりで部屋を後にした。
MESSAGE.EN: Thus, the two of us left the room.
MESSAGE.Translation: Thus, the two of us left the room.

MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝...Hm.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝...Hm.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 廊下で謙吾に会う。
MESSAGE.EN: We ran across Kengo in the hallway.
MESSAGE.Translation: We ran across Kengo in the hallway.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「あれ、謙吾も恭介のところ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Are you going to Kyousuke's room, too?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Are you going to Kyousuke's room, too?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「ああ…今日はなにかやらないのかと思ってな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝Yeah... I wanted to see whether he really wasn't doing anything today.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝Yeah... I wanted to see whether he really wasn't doing anything today.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「みんなもう、必ずなんかやるってのに慣れちゃってるからねぇ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝That makes sense. We're already used to something always happening...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝That makes sense. We're already used to something always happening...❞

MESSAGE.JP: というわけで、三人で恭介の部屋に。
MESSAGE.EN: The three of us headed for his room.
MESSAGE.Translation: The three of us headed for his room.

MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Hm.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Hm.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 部屋の前で、さらに鈴と合流。
MESSAGE.EN: As we reached his room, we came across Rin.
MESSAGE.Translation: As we reached his room, we came across Rin.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「鈴も恭介に用事？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝You're coming to see Kyousuke, too?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝You're coming to see Kyousuke, too?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「なんとなく暇だった」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝There was nothing to do in my room.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝There was nothing to do in my room.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「恭介が動かないとみんな暇なんだな…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝Without Kyousuke, none of us have anything to do...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝Without Kyousuke, none of us have anything to do...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「別にこのメンツでオレの発明した、筋肉さんこむらがえったで遊んでもオレはいいぜ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝I don't really care if Kyousuke isn't here. Let's play ❛Mister Muscles Got Cramps,❜ a game I invented, shall we?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝I don't really care if Kyousuke isn't here. Let's play ❛Mister Muscles Got Cramps,❜ a game I invented, shall we?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「ほぅ、どんな遊びなんだ、それは？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝Oh, what kind of game is that?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝Oh, what kind of game is that?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾が食いついてる!?
MESSAGE.EN: It caught Kengo's interest!?
MESSAGE.Translation: It caught Kengo's interest!?

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「そんなきしょい遊びやじゃっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝I don't want to play a disgusting-sounding game like that!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝I don't want to play a disgusting-sounding game like that!❞

MESSAGE.JP: まあ、みんながこうなら恭介も快く何かをはじめてくれるに違いない。
MESSAGE.EN: I'm sure Kyousuke will jump at the chance to give us something to do when he learns we're this bored.
MESSAGE.Translation: I'm sure Kyousuke will jump at the chance to give us something to do when he learns we're this bored.

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介の部屋にノックをする。
MESSAGE.EN: I knocked on Kyousuke's door.
MESSAGE.Translation: I knocked on Kyousuke's door.

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「おい、みんなで来てやったぜ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Yo, we're all here.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Yo, we're all here.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「筋肉さんこむらがえった、やろーぜ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Let's play ❛Mister Muscles Got Cramps❜!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Let's play ❛Mister Muscles Got Cramps❜!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 反応がなかった。
MESSAGE.EN: There was no reaction.
MESSAGE.Translation: There was no reaction.

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「食いついてこねぇ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝He's not interested?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝He's not interested?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「普通こないかと」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝No one normal would be.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝No one normal would be.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「…え？　さっきの俺はなんだったんだ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝...Eh? Why'd I want to do it then?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝...Eh? Why'd I want to do it then?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「え…マジで？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Eh... seriously?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Eh... seriously?❞

MESSAGE.JP: と思ったら、ドアが開いた。
MESSAGE.EN: But then the door opened.
MESSAGE.Translation: But then the door opened.

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「お、やっぱり恭介はわかってるよなっ!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Oh, that's our Kyousuke! He understands after all!!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Oh, that's our Kyousuke! He understands after all!!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「さあ、いくぜ…筋肉さんがこーむらがえーった!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Now, let's begin... Mister Muscles Got Cramps!!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Now, let's begin... Mister Muscles Got Cramps!!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `男子生徒@「え…俺？　別にこむらがえってないけど…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Male Student@❝Eh... Me? I don't have any particular cramp...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Male Student@❝Eh... Me? I don't have any particular cramp...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 見知らぬ人だった。
MESSAGE.EN: It was an unfamiliar male student.
MESSAGE.Translation: It was an unfamiliar male student.

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「うおおおっ、誰だよてめえぇっ!?」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Uoooo, who the hell are you!?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Uoooo, who the hell are you!?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `男子生徒@「はぁあ!?　なんで俺いきなりわけわかんないこと言われて怒られてんのっ!?」
MESSAGE.EN: `Male Student@❝Haaaa!? Why am I getting told off all of a sudden!?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Male Student@❝Haaaa!? Why am I getting told off all of a sudden!?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「あ、ごめんなさい…気にしないで」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Er, I'm sorry... Never mind him.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Er, I'm sorry... Never mind him.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `男子生徒@「あ、ああ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Male Student@❝O, okay...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Male Student@❝O, okay...❞

MESSAGE.JP: そうだ、このひとは恭介のルームメイトだ。
MESSAGE.EN: I recognized him as Kyousuke's roommate.
MESSAGE.Translation: I recognized him as Kyousuke's roommate.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「あれ、恭介はいないんですか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Is Kyousuke out?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Is Kyousuke out?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `男子生徒@「いや、中にいるよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Male Student@❝No, he's here.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Male Student@❝No, he's here.❞

MESSAGE.JP: ルームメイトの人はどこかの部屋に行くらしく、そのまま去っていった。
MESSAGE.EN: Seems like the roommate was on his way somewhere, he left straight away.
MESSAGE.Translation: Seems like the roommate was on his way somewhere, he left straight away.

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「くそぅ、異常なテンションで他人を出迎えてしまった…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Damn, I was abnormally excited and got the wrong person!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Damn, I was abnormally excited and got the wrong person!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「普通におまえらしかったぞ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝Isn't that your normal behavior?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝Isn't that your normal behavior?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「異常だってのは自覚してるんだな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝Oh, so you're aware of how abnormal you are?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝Oh, so you're aware of how abnormal you are?❞

MESSAGE.JP: とりあえず、中に入る。
MESSAGE.EN: We entered the room.
MESSAGE.Translation: We entered the room.

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「おーい、恭介っ!!　遊ぼうぜっ!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Hey, Kyousuke!! Let's play!!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Hey, Kyousuke!! Let's play!!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「ダメ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Nope.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Nope.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「えー」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Ehhh.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Ehhh.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「今日はこいつを片付けなきゃいけない」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝I've got to finish this today.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝I've got to finish this today.❞

MESSAGE.JP: ポン、と３０冊はあろうかという、漫画の単行本の塔を叩く。
MESSAGE.EN: He slammed his hand onto a tower of 30-some hardcover manga books.
MESSAGE.Translation: He slammed his hand onto a tower of 30-some hardcover manga books.

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「またずいぶんと買い込んだものだな…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝You bought a lot again...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝You bought a lot again...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「ああ、今日一晩で読み終えるつもりだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Yeah, it'll take all night to read them.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Yeah, it'll take all night to read them.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「なんだよ…そんなのいつだっていいだろ、暇なんだよ、遊ぼうぜ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Come on... You can do that anytime. We've got nothing to do. Let's play.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Come on... You can do that anytime. We've got nothing to do. Let's play.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「ずっと探してた本が全巻セットで手に入ったんだ。悪いが…今日だけは譲れん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝I finally got the whole series I'd been looking for. Sorry, but I can't let this pass.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝I finally got the whole series I'd been looking for. Sorry, but I can't let this pass.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「…筋肉さんがこーーむらがえーった!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝...Mister Muscles Got Cramps!!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝...Mister Muscles Got Cramps!!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「筋肉さんがこーーむらがえーった！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝Mister Muscles Got Cramps!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝Mister Muscles Got Cramps!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「うわ、謙吾まで…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Uwa, Kengo...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Uwa, Kengo...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「何を言ってるんだ、こいつらは？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝What on earth are they saying?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝What on earth are they saying?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「いや、ふたりとも恭介の気を引こうと必死なんだよ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝They're just desperately trying to get your attention...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝They're just desperately trying to get your attention...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「何を言ってるんだ、こいつは？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝What on earth is he saying?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝What on earth is he saying?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「いや、真人なりに恭介の気を引こうと必死なんだよ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝He's just desperate trying to get your attention...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝He's just desperate trying to get your attention...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「まったく…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Honestly...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Honestly...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「じゃあ、おまえらこの本より面白い事をしてみろ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Then, you guys, come up with something more interesting than this manga.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Then, you guys, come up with something more interesting than this manga.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「この俺の興味がおまえらに向けば、自ずと構いたくなるだろう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝If you can show me something interesting enough, I'll play with you.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝If you can show me something interesting enough, I'll play with you.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「なにぃ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Whaat...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Whaat...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「さっきのじゃダメなのか…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝That one wasn't good enough...?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝That one wasn't good enough...?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「それは難儀なことだな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝This is going to be tough.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝This is going to be tough.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「さっきのじゃダメなのか…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝Not good enough...?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝Not good enough...?❞

MESSAGE.JP: ふたりともブルーになっている…。
MESSAGE.EN: They both looked down...
MESSAGE.Translation: They both looked down...

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「じゃあ、おまえ行け」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝You go first.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝You go first.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人を指差す。
MESSAGE.EN: She pointed at Masato.
MESSAGE.Translation: She pointed at Masato.

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「えー、オレ、レパートリー少ないんだよ…どうすっかな…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Eeh, I don't have a big repertoire... What should I do...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Eeh, I don't have a big repertoire... What should I do...❞

MESSAGE.JP: なんだろう…ネタなんて持ってるんだろうか…。
MESSAGE.EN: I wonder... what kind of tricks does he have in store...?
MESSAGE.Translation: I wonder... what kind of tricks does he have in store...?

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「じゃあ、平静を装いつつも竹刀を振りながら徐々にテンションが高くなっていく部活中の謙吾のまね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Then, I'll mimic Kengo swinging his shinai during club activities, feigning serenity while gradually getting more and more pumped up.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Then, I'll mimic Kengo swinging his shinai during club activities, feigning serenity while gradually getting more and more pumped up.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 見えない竹刀を両手で持つ。
MESSAGE.EN: He grabbed the hilt of an invisible shinai with both hands.
MESSAGE.Translation: He grabbed the hilt of an invisible shinai with both hands.

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「メーーーーンッ！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Meeeeen!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Meeeeen!❞

MESSAGE.JP: それを振るう。
MESSAGE.EN: He swung it.
MESSAGE.Translation: He swung it.

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「メェーーーーンッ！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Meeeeen!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Meeeeen!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「ゥメーーーーンッ！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Umeeeen!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Umeeeen!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「ムメーーーーンッ！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Mumeeen!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Mumeeen!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「マーーーーーーンッ!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Maaaaan!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Maaaaan!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「マーーーン！なんて言うかっ！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝I don't say ❛maaaan❜!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝I don't say ❛maaaan❜!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「おまえ、テンションが高いと徐々にメーンがマーン！に近づいていくんだよっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝The more excited you get, the more often you shout ❛maaaan❜ instead of ❛meeen.❜❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝The more excited you get, the more often you shout ❛maaaan❜ instead of ❛meeen.❜❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「ま、これでとりあえず笑いは取れたと」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Well, that should've made him laugh.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Well, that should've made him laugh.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「はっはっは、マーーンてなんだよ、そりゃ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝Hahaha, what's with that ❛maaaan❜?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝Hahaha, what's with that ❛maaaan❜?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾ひとりが笑っている…。
MESSAGE.EN: Kengo alone was laughing...
MESSAGE.Translation: Kengo alone was laughing...

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「へっ、これでとりあえず笑いは取れたと」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝All right, that should've made him laugh.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝All right, that should've made him laugh.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「つまらん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Boring.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Boring.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「うおおぉおおぉぉぉーーーーっ!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Uoooooooooo!!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Uoooooooooo!!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 一蹴された！
MESSAGE.EN: It didn't work at all!
MESSAGE.Translation: It didn't work at all!

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介は真人の絶叫にも耳を貸さず、黙々と漫画を読み続けていた。
MESSAGE.EN: Paying no heed to Masato's screams, he kept reading his manga in silence.
MESSAGE.Translation: Paying no heed to Masato's screams, he kept reading his manga in silence.

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「まったくだ、つまらん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Totally. It was so boring.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Totally. It was so boring.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「じゃあおまえやってみろよっ!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Then you try something!!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Then you try something!!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「ふん…いいだろう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Hmph... You're on.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Hmph... You're on.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴が前に出る。
MESSAGE.EN: She stepped forward.
MESSAGE.Translation: She stepped forward.

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「おい、きょーすけ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Hey, Kyousuke.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Hey, Kyousuke.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「んー？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Hmm?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Hmm?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 漫画に目を落としたまま応える。
MESSAGE.EN: He replied but didn't stop reading.
MESSAGE.Translation: He replied but didn't stop reading.

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「隣の家に囲いが出来た」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝The neighbor got a new fence.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝The neighbor got a new fence.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「へえ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝You don't say.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝You don't say.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「かっこいー」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝That's fancy.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝That's fancy.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「うん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Yeah.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Yeah.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「バリケード、かっけーど」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Barricade, barracuda.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Barricade, barracuda.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「そうだな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Yeah, right.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Yeah, right.❞

MESSAGE.JP: …戻ってきた。
MESSAGE.EN: ...She came back to us.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...She came back to us.

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「音楽性が違う」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝His sense of music is totally different.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝His sense of music is totally different.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「何それ、解散の理由？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝What's that, the reason for a band's break-up?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝What's that, the reason for a band's break-up?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恐ろしいグダグダっぷりだった。
MESSAGE.EN: That was dreadfully bad.
MESSAGE.Translation: That was dreadfully bad.

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「どうみてもオレよりつまんねえじゃねえか…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝No matter how you look at it, her joke was more boring than mine...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝No matter how you look at it, her joke was more boring than mine...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「なにっ、ちょー面白いぞっ。あたしだったら大爆笑だっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝What, it was way funny! I'd burst out laughing!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝What, it was way funny! I'd burst out laughing!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「『かっこいー』のあたりでお茶の間はぼーーーん!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝When I say ❛fancy,❜ everybody in front of the TV goes ❛Boom!❜ with laughter!!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝When I say ❛fancy,❜ everybody in front of the TV goes ❛Boom!❜ with laughter!!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「…こっぱみじんだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝...They blow up into atoms.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝...They blow up into atoms.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「そこまでの破壊力はないかと…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I don't think it had quite that destructive an impact...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I don't think it had quite that destructive an impact...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「この場の誰ひとりとして、くすりともしていなかったじゃないか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝Not one of us here even chuckled one bit.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝Not one of us here even chuckled one bit.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「じゃあ次、おまえやれ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Then, you do it next.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Then, you do it next.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「…俺か？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝...Me?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝...Me?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「そうだ…頭がおかしくなってしまった今のおまえなら、何か笑いが取れるんじゃねえか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Right... You should be able to make him laugh, since you've turned crazy now.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Right... You should be able to make him laugh, since you've turned crazy now.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「そうだ…普段仏頂面のおまえが突然おかしなことやったら、結構笑いが取れるんじゃねえか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Right... If somebody who always looks sullen like you suddenly does something funny, that should make him laugh.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Right... If somebody who always looks sullen like you suddenly does something funny, that should make him laugh.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「お茶の間はぼーん！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Make everyone go ❛Boom❜!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Make everyone go ❛Boom❜!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「…こっぱみじんだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝...Into atoms.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝...Into atoms.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「そうだなあ…何をしたものやら…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝I don't know about that... But what should I do...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝I don't know about that... But what should I do...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾に持ちネタなんてあるんだろうか…。
MESSAGE.EN: I wonder whether he has any good material...
MESSAGE.Translation: I wonder whether he has any good material...

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「なら俺も真人の真似にしよう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝Oh yeah, I'll mimic Masato.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝Oh yeah, I'll mimic Masato.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「筋トレ中に徐々にテンションが高くなっていく真人の真似」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝This is him doing muscle training and getting more and more pumped up.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝This is him doing muscle training and getting more and more pumped up.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「ふっ、ふっ…筋肉、筋肉っ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝Hu, hu... Muscles, muscles.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝Hu, hu... Muscles, muscles.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「ふっ…ふっ…筋肉がうなる！　うなりを上げる！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝Hu... hu... my muscles are screaming! They're screaming out!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝Hu... hu... my muscles are screaming! They're screaming out!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「おおっ、すげぇうなりだ！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝Ohh, this is one huge scream!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝Ohh, this is one huge scream!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「ふっ、ふっ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝Hu, hu...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝Hu, hu...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「やべぇっ、あまりのうなりにオレ自身がついていけねぇっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝Oh my god, this screaming is too much for me to take!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝Oh my god, this screaming is too much for me to take!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「うおおっ、筋肉が暴走だ！　暴徒と化した！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝Uoooo, my muscles are running wild! They're rioting!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝Uoooo, my muscles are running wild! They're rioting!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「こいつは…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝This is...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝This is...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「筋肉革命だあぁぁぁーーーーっ!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝A muscle REVOLUUUTIOOOON!!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝A muscle REVOLUUUTIOOOON!!❞

MESSAGE.JP: すごい！　会心の出来だ！　一番そばにいる僕が太鼓判を押せる！
MESSAGE.EN: Amazing! Awesome! That genuinely captured his essence, it must be because he's the one who's spent the most time with Masato!
MESSAGE.Translation: Amazing! Awesome! That genuinely captured his essence, it must be because he's the one who's spent the most time with Masato!

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「似てるな。だが面白くはない」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝That was a great impersonation, but not funny.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝That was a great impersonation, but not funny.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ええーっ！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Ehhh!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Ehhh!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「てめぇ、オレのネタで滑るなんて、オレが寒い奴みたいじゃねえかっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝You bastard, your imitation of me didn't work at all, you're making me look like a lame person.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝You bastard, your imitation of me didn't work at all, you're making me look like a lame person.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「俺なりには頑張ったつもりなんだが力及ばなかった…すまん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝I gave it my all, but my all still wasn't enough... Sorry.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝I gave it my all, but my all still wasn't enough... Sorry.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「うん、頑張ったね、すごくわかるよ…昔の謙吾なら絶対できないようなことだからね…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Yeah, you did great... The old Kengo could absolutely never have done that...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Yeah, you did great... The old Kengo could absolutely never have done that...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「終わりか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Is it over?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Is it over?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「いや、作戦タイム。一回出ようよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝No, we're calling a strategy meeting. Let's step outside.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝No, we're calling a strategy meeting. Let's step outside.❞

MESSAGE.JP: みんなを押して、廊下に出る。
MESSAGE.EN: I pushed the three of them out into the corridor.
MESSAGE.Translation: I pushed the three of them out into the corridor.

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「ちくしょう…惨敗じゃねえか…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Goddammit... A complete defeat...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Goddammit... A complete defeat...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「もう…今日は諦めるしかないんじゃないかな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I wonder... is there nothing we can do but to give up?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I wonder... is there nothing we can do but to give up?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「なんだとぅ？　俺があそこまで頑張ったのにか!?」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝Whaat? We'd waste my hard work!?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝Whaat? We'd waste my hard work!?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「おまえのそのキャラ、なんなんだよ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Can't you do something about your character...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Can't you do something about your character...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「ほんと怪我してからばかになったな…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Yeah, you've been crazy ever since your injury.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Yeah, you've been crazy ever since your injury.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「で？　どうするんだ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝So, what are we gonna do?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝So, what are we gonna do?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「嫌だ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝No.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝No.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「仕方ない。いいだろう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝Okay, guess it can't be helped.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝Okay, guess it can't be helped.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「なんて言うとでも思ったか、ばーか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝...Did you think I'd say that, dummy?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝...Did you think I'd say that, dummy?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「嫌だ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝No.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝No.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「嫌だ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝No.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝No.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「おめでとう。百回嫌だ記念だ。これをやろう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝Congratulations. You made me say ❛no❜ one hundred times. This is for you.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝Congratulations. You made me say ❛no❜ one hundred times. This is for you.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「嫌だ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝No.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝No.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 押し問答はこのぐらいにしておいて、いい加減みんなを呼ぶとしよう…。
MESSAGE.EN: Well, that's enough arguing about this, I'd better call the other members.
MESSAGE.Translation: Well, that's enough arguing about this, I'd better call the other members.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「で、みんなを呼ぼうと思うんだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I think we should call everyone here.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I think we should call everyone here.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「それはわからんが、何をしたらいいものか…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝I don't really get it, what would be a good thing to do...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝I don't really get it, what would be a good thing to do...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「理樹、考えてくれ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝Riki, think with me.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝Riki, think with me.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「えー、僕？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Ehh, me?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Ehh, me?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「さっきのこのふたりを見てたら、ろくなことを思い付かんとわかるだろう…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝As you just saw, those two guys couldn't satisfy Kyousuke at all...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝As you just saw, those two guys couldn't satisfy Kyousuke at all...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「おまえが思いつかなかったら、俺には無理だ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝If you can't think of a good idea, it'd be impossible for me.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝If you can't think of a good idea, it'd be impossible for me.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「うーん…相手は恭介だからねぇ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Hmm... the opponent is Kyousuke...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Hmm... the opponent is Kyousuke...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 僕は精一杯、恭介のツボを考え、謙吾にネタを吹き込む。
MESSAGE.EN: I thought hard about Kyousuke's weaknesses, and gave my suggestion to Kengo.
MESSAGE.Translation: I thought hard about Kyousuke's weaknesses, and gave my suggestion to Kengo.

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾が改めて、恭介と正対する。
MESSAGE.EN: Yet again Kengo confronted Kyousuke.
MESSAGE.Translation: Yet again Kengo confronted Kyousuke.

MESSAGE.JP: ふぅと息を吸い、掲げた手を振るう。
MESSAGE.EN: He deep took a breath, raised his hand, and swung it.
MESSAGE.Translation: He deep took a breath, raised his hand, and swung it.

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「メーーーーンッ！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝Meeeen!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝Meeeen!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「ドォーーーーッ！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝Douuuu!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝Douuuu!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「コテェーーーッ！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝Koteee!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝Koteee!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「すね毛ーーーッ！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝Leg hair!!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝Leg hair!!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「うぶ毛ーーーッ！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝Fuzzy hair!!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝Fuzzy hair!!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「耳のうぶ毛ーーーッ！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝Fuzzy hair in the ear!!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝Fuzzy hair in the ear!!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「…理樹の入れ知恵か？　最後うぶ毛で畳みかけたところは評価するが笑うまでには至らないな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝...Was that Riki's suggestion? The fuzzy hair bit at the end is good, but there's not enough impact to make me laugh.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝...Was that Riki's suggestion? The fuzzy hair bit at the end is good, but there's not enough impact to make me laugh.❞

MESSAGE.JP: やっぱりか…。
MESSAGE.EN: I knew it...
MESSAGE.Translation: I knew it...

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「さすが、本家のマーーン！は違うぜ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝The authentic ❛maaan!❜ shout really is awesome.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝The authentic ❛maaan!❜ shout really is awesome.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「どう聴いたら、今のがマーーン！なんて聞こえるんだっ！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝No matter how you were listening to it, I did not yell ❛maaan!❜ just now!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝No matter how you were listening to it, I did not yell ❛maaan!❜ just now!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「騒ぐだけなら外でやってくれないか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝If you guys just want to make noise, will you get out of here?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝If you guys just want to make noise, will you get out of here?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「まあまあふたりとも落ち着いて、ひとまずでようよ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝You guys need to calm down. And let's step outside for now, anyway...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝You guys need to calm down. And let's step outside for now, anyway...❞

MESSAGE.JP: ふたりを押して、廊下に出る。
MESSAGE.EN: I pushed the two guys out into the corridor.
MESSAGE.Translation: I pushed the two guys out into the corridor.

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「ちくしょう…惨敗じゃねえか…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Dammit... A complete defeat...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Dammit... A complete defeat...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「今日は諦めるしかないんじゃない？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Is there nothing we can do but to give up...?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Is there nothing we can do but to give up...?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「ここまで来て負けたままってのも癪だ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝I don't want it to end in defeat after coming this far...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝I don't want it to end in defeat after coming this far...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「いや、そもそも勝敗がついてたかどうかも微妙だけど」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I don't think there's anything to win or lose in the first place.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I don't think there's anything to win or lose in the first place.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「で…どうするんだ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝So... What are we going to do?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝So... What are we going to do?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「なんだ、理樹、何かあるのか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝What is it, Riki, you have an idea?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝What is it, Riki, you have an idea?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「賑やかなみんななら、なんとかしてくれるんじゃないかって」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝If we call everyone else, maybe someone will come up with something.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝If we call everyone else, maybe someone will come up with something.❞

MESSAGE.JP: …あんまりみんなを巻き込むことでもないと思うけど…。
MESSAGE.EN: ...Though I'm not sure if I should be involving everyone...
MESSAGE.Translation: ...Though I'm not sure if I should be involving everyone...

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「なるほど。全面攻勢ってわけだな。いいじゃねぇか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝I see. A full frontal assault, huh? I like that.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝I see. A full frontal assault, huh? I like that.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 言って、携帯を取り出す。
MESSAGE.EN: Saying this, he produced his cellphone from his pocket.
MESSAGE.Translation: Saying this, he produced his cellphone from his pocket.

MESSAGE.JP: というわけで、全員に集合を掛けた。
MESSAGE.EN: Thus, everybody gathered together.
MESSAGE.Translation: Thus, everybody gathered together.

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「…真人少年からとはまた珍しい」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝...It's rare to get called by you, young man Masato.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝...It's rare to get called by you, young man Masato.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「一体なんの用だ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝What on earth do you want?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝What on earth do you want?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「棗さんがいらっしゃらないようですが…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝Natsume-san is not here...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝Natsume-san is not here...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「おう、理樹そっちもってくれよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Hey, Riki, hold that side.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Hey, Riki, hold that side.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「あ、うん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Uh, okay.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Uh, okay.❞

MESSAGE.JP: いつもの恭介の真似をして、横断幕を用意してきたらしい。
MESSAGE.EN: Imitating Kyousuke's usual course of action, Masato had prepared a banner by himself.
MESSAGE.Translation: Imitating Kyousuke's usual course of action, Masato had prepared a banner by himself.

MESSAGE.JP: 同じように、だーと走って広げる。
MESSAGE.EN: And in the usual manner, we spread it out.
MESSAGE.Translation: And in the usual manner, we spread it out.

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「第一回・恭介の野郎にギャフンと言わせてやろう選手権～」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝The 1st Let's Make Kyousuke Wave the White Flag Championship～!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝The 1st Let's Make Kyousuke Wave the White Flag Championship～!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「はい拍手～」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Okay, applause～!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Okay, applause～!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「よしきたぁぁー！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝Yeee-haaa!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝Yeee-haaa!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 盛り上がってるのは謙吾ひとりだけだった…。
MESSAGE.EN: Kengo alone was excited about it...
MESSAGE.Translation: Kengo alone was excited about it...

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「ありがとよ、謙吾…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Thanks, Kengo...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Thanks, Kengo...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「かわいそうだからみんなも、フォローしてあげてよ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Can't the rest of you follow his example, that was a poor performance...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Can't the rest of you follow his example, that was a poor performance...❞

MESSAGE.JP: …まったく拍手が上がらなかった。
MESSAGE.EN: ...Even so, no one else clapped.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...Even so, no one else clapped.

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「なんだよっ!!　ちょっとは反応してくれよっ!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Come on!! Give me some response!!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Come on!! Give me some response!!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「いや…だってですネ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Er... but...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Er... but...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「うーん、ものすごく難しそうだよ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Hmmm, it sounds terribly difficult...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Hmmm, it sounds terribly difficult...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「恭介さんは無敵な気がします～」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝I think Kyousuke-san is invincible～.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝I think Kyousuke-san is invincible～.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「ところでその横断幕、『第一回』が『策一回』になっているが」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝By the way, you miswrote ❛1st❜ as ❛1th.❜❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝By the way, you miswrote ❛1st❜ as ❛1th.❜❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「え、マジで？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Huh, seriously?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Huh, seriously?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「あ、ほんとだ…策一回だ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Ah, she's right... 1th...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Ah, she's right... 1th...❞

MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝.........❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝.........❞

MESSAGE.JP: 西園さんが無言で、額に貼る冷却シートを真人に差し出していた。
MESSAGE.EN: Without saying anything, Nishizono-san handed Masato an adhesive cooling pad.
MESSAGE.Translation: Without saying anything, Nishizono-san handed Masato an adhesive cooling pad.

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「…スッキリ、しますよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝...This will make you feel better.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝...This will make you feel better.❞

MESSAGE.JP: ぐ、と親指を立てる。
MESSAGE.EN: She gave him a thumbs-up.
MESSAGE.Translation: She gave him a thumbs-up.

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「あ、ありがとよ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Th, thanks...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Th, thanks...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「…まあ、そんな体たらくでは話にならんな。悪いが抜けさせてもらう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Well, in this sorry state you're not worth talking to. Sorry but I'll take my leave.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Well, in this sorry state you're not worth talking to. Sorry but I'll take my leave.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「あの棗兄に勝てるとは思えんよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝I don't think the Natsume brother would lose to us.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝I don't think the Natsume brother would lose to us.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「では、わたしも」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝Then, I will as well.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝Then, I will as well.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「じゃ、私もぱーっす」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝I'll pass too, then!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝I'll pass too, then!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「え、ちょっと…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Huh, wait a second...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Huh, wait a second...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 早速三人抜けていった。
MESSAGE.EN: We instantly lost three of the girls.
MESSAGE.Translation: We instantly lost three of the girls.

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「この調子じゃ無理だな。俺も抜ける」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝I think this is going to be impossible. I'm going back to my room.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝I think this is going to be impossible. I'm going back to my room.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「あたしも」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Me too.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Me too.❞

MESSAGE.JP: さらに幼なじみまでも去っていった。
MESSAGE.EN: Even the childhood friends were split up.
MESSAGE.Translation: Even the childhood friends were split up.

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「真人君、どんまいだよ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Masato-kun, don't mind...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Masato-kun, don't mind...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「どんまいなのです～」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Don't mind～.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Don't mind～.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「どんまいだ、真人」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝Don't mind, Masato.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝Don't mind, Masato.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 残った三人に慰められる。
MESSAGE.EN: The three remaining people cheered him up.
MESSAGE.Translation: The three remaining people cheered him up.

MESSAGE.JP: 残ったふたりに慰められていた。
MESSAGE.EN: The remaining two cheered him up.
MESSAGE.Translation: The remaining two cheered him up.

MESSAGE.JP: …というか、このふたりにしても慰めに残っただけなのだろう…。
MESSAGE.EN: ...More like, that was probably the only reason they stayed...
MESSAGE.Translation: ...More like, that was probably the only reason they stayed...

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「真人…びっくりするほど人望がないね…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Masato... What a wonderful lack of personal magnetism...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Masato... What a wonderful lack of personal magnetism...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「理樹…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Riki...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Riki...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「オレの肉体は鋼のようだが、心はティッシュのようにやわなんだから、もう少しサランラップに包んでいってくれ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝My body may look strong as steel, but my heart is as soft as tissue. Can't you wrap your words in Saran wrap just a little?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝My body may look strong as steel, but my heart is as soft as tissue. Can't you wrap your words in Saran wrap just a little?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「なんだ？　レンジにでもかけるのか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝Huh? Are you going to microwave them?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝Huh? Are you going to microwave them?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「え？　レンジにでもかけるの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Eh? Are you going to microwave them?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Eh? Are you going to microwave them?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「うーん、ぎゃふんとってなにをやるの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Umm, what's this about waving a white flag?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Umm, what's this about waving a white flag?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 横断幕を見下ろしていた小毬さんが訊く。
MESSAGE.EN: She asked looking down at the banner.
MESSAGE.Translation: She asked looking down at the banner.

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「はっ、ぎゃふんといわせるなら、歯車と粉を見せればいいのではないでしょうか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Ah! If we want to make a white flag, we could use a broom and a t-shirt.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Ah! If we want to make a white flag, we could use a broom and a t-shirt.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「ふたつ合わせて『ぎやー・ふん』なのですっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Then Kyousuke can lead a parade waving it with all his might!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Then Kyousuke can lead a parade waving it with all his might!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「いや、それも違うと思うけどさ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝No, that's not what this is about...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝No, that's not what this is about...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「わふー、そうなのですか…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Wafuu, it isn't...?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Wafuu, it isn't...?❞

MESSAGE.JP: ひとまず、これまでの経緯をふたりに話した。
MESSAGE.EN: I explained to them what had transpired before their arrival here.
MESSAGE.Translation: I explained to them what had transpired before their arrival here.

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「それだったらなんとかなりそうだよ～」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝If that's the case, I think we can work something out.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝If that's the case, I think we can work something out.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「え、ほんと？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Really?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Really?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「みんな恭介さんとケンカみたいに思ったから、手伝ってくれなかったんじゃないかな？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝I think the others didn't want to help you out, because they assumed you guys were going to fight against Kyousuke-san.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝I think the others didn't want to help you out, because they assumed you guys were going to fight against Kyousuke-san.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「くそう…オレの説明不足か…人の上に立つってのは難しいぜ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Dammit... My explanation wasn't any good...? It's not easy being a leader...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Dammit... My explanation wasn't any good...? It's not easy being a leader...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「どんまい、真人」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝Don't mind it, Masato.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝Don't mind it, Masato.❞

MESSAGE.JP: またなぐさめられている…。
MESSAGE.EN: Kengo encouraged him again...
MESSAGE.Translation: Kengo encouraged him again...

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「もう一回みんなを呼んで説明すれば、きっとだいじょうぶだよ～」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝If we call everyone back and explain it properly, I'm sure they'll understand.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝If we call everyone back and explain it properly, I'm sure they'll understand.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「じゃあ、メール出すね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝I'll email them.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝I'll email them.❞

MESSAGE.JP: …小毬さんのほうが余程人望があるようだった。
MESSAGE.EN: ...I have a feeling Komari-san's popularity might be much higher than Masato's.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...I have a feeling Komari-san's popularity might be much higher than Masato's.

MESSAGE.JP: 再び全員集合。
MESSAGE.EN: Everyone was here again.
MESSAGE.Translation: Everyone was here again.

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「というわけなのです」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝...And there you have it.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝...And there you have it.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 小毬さんからみんなに説明があった。
MESSAGE.EN: She explained the situation to them.
MESSAGE.Translation: She explained the situation to them.

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「で、策一回大喜利大会か」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝So, it's about time we started on the ONETH Championship, no?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝So, it's about time we started on the ONETH Championship, no?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「てめぇに指摘されたから直してきたよ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Because you were bitching about that, I fixed it...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Because you were bitching about that, I fixed it...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「よしっ、見やがれっ!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Aight, lo and behold!!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Aight, lo and behold!!❞

MESSAGE.JP: ばっ、と再び広げる。
MESSAGE.EN: He opened up the banner again.
MESSAGE.Translation: He opened up the banner again.

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「今度は『弟一回』か」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Now it says ❛First-th❜... so there will be a second ❛th❜ too, huh?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Now it says ❛First-th❜... so there will be a second ❛th❜ too, huh?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「わざとだな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝It must be intentional.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝It must be intentional.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「はっは、さすが真人だ。笑わせてくれる」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝Ahaha, that's our Masato. You never fail to make us laugh.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝Ahaha, that's our Masato. You never fail to make us laugh.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「ああ、これはわざとだ、間違いない」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝Yes, it's intentional, no doubt about it.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝Yes, it's intentional, no doubt about it.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「はいはい天然ですよオレが頭わるうございましたぁーーっ!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Yeah yeah, that's me, I'm so sorry I'm stupid in the head!!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Yeah yeah, that's me, I'm so sorry I'm stupid in the head!!❞

MESSAGE.JP: これはフォローのしようがなかった。
MESSAGE.EN: I couldn't think of any supportive words for him.
MESSAGE.Translation: I couldn't think of any supportive words for him.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「まあ笑わせればいいんだよね？　だったらこの私の出番だねっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Well, we just need to make him laugh, right? Then it's time for my debut!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Well, we just need to make him laugh, right? Then it's time for my debut!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「頑張るのですっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Let's do our best!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Let's do our best!❞

MESSAGE.JP: やる気まんまんのふたり。
MESSAGE.EN: Those two girls were really into it.
MESSAGE.Translation: Those two girls were really into it.

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「わたしはつまらないので皆さんにお任せします」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝I'm a boring person, so I'll leave it to you.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝I'm a boring person, so I'll leave it to you.❞

MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝.........❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝.........❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「でも、ちょっと楽しげなときもありますよ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝But it's not that I never have an interesting moment, you know?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝But it's not that I never have an interesting moment, you know?❞

MESSAGE.JP: よくわからないフォローだった。
MESSAGE.EN: I wasn't sure what exactly it was that she wanted to say.
MESSAGE.Translation: I wasn't sure what exactly it was that she wanted to say.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「みおちんツッコミ上手いよね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝You're good at making ripostes, Mio-chin.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝You're good at making ripostes, Mio-chin.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「…そうですか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝...You think so?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝...You think so?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「よっし、じゃあトップバッターは私＆美魚ちゃんでレッツラゴーっ!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝All right, I and Mio-chan will be the top batters. Let's go!!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝All right, I and Mio-chan will be the top batters. Let's go!!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「滑ったらツッコミでフォローヨロシクっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝I'm looking forward to your follow-ups.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝I'm looking forward to your follow-ups.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「と、言われても…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝Even if you say that...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝Even if you say that...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「いつもみたいに『あかんや～んっ！』ずゅべしっ！　って感じにやってくれればだいじょうぶですヨ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝All you have to do is smack me saying ❛that's no good!❜ like you always do.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝All you have to do is smack me saying ❛that's no good!❜ like you always do.❞

MESSAGE.JP: いや、今まで西園さんがそんな風につっこんだことあったっけ…。
MESSAGE.EN: No, I'm pretty sure I've never seen Nishizono-san do that up until now...
MESSAGE.Translation: No, I'm pretty sure I've never seen Nishizono-san do that up until now...

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「やってみましょう…」
