MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝I'll give it a try...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝I'll give it a try...❞

MESSAGE.JP: ハイテンション＆ローテンションのふたりが向かっていった。
MESSAGE.EN: The ever-excited Haruka-san and always composed Nishizono-san stepped inside.
MESSAGE.Translation: The ever-excited Haruka-san and always composed Nishizono-san stepped inside.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「ヘイ、ミスターキョウスケ…
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Hey, Mister Kyousuke...
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Hey, Mister Kyousuke...

MESSAGE.JP: ぷふーっ」
MESSAGE.EN: pfoo!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: pfoo!❞

MESSAGE.JP: やる前から自分で笑ってしまっていた!!
MESSAGE.EN: She cracked up herself before actually doing anything!!
MESSAGE.Translation: She cracked up herself before actually doing anything!!

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「んー…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Hmm...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Hmm...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介は相変らず漫画に集中しっぱなしだった。
MESSAGE.EN: Kyousuke was concentrating on his manga as before.
MESSAGE.Translation: Kyousuke was concentrating on his manga as before.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「ちょっとお話があるんですヨ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝I need to have a serious talk about my future.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝I need to have a serious talk about my future.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「おはなし？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝A talk?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝A talk?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「で、この手をちょっと掴んでください」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝So, please take my hand for a moment.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝So, please take my hand for a moment.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介は漫画に目をやったまま手を伸ばす。
MESSAGE.EN: He stretched out his arm without taking his eyes off the book.
MESSAGE.Translation: He stretched out his arm without taking his eyes off the book.

MESSAGE.JP: そして、手が葉留佳さんに触れた瞬間。
MESSAGE.EN: As soon as he touched her...
MESSAGE.Translation: As soon as he touched her...

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「お離しっ!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Don't let me go!!!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Don't let me go!!!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「ぷふっあはははははははははっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Pfoo... kuha... ahahahahaha!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Pfoo... kuha... ahahahahaha!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介は無反応。
MESSAGE.EN: No reaction from Kyousuke.
MESSAGE.Translation: No reaction from Kyousuke.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「あ、あれ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Ah, huh?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Ah, huh?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「お離しっ!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Don't let me go!!!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Don't let me go!!!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「これは『お話』と離せっていう『お離しっ』を掛けたギャグで…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝This is a pun-based gag... ❛Letting you go❜ can also mean getting fired...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝This is a pun-based gag... ❛Letting you go❜ can also mean getting fired...❞

MESSAGE.JP: ついに説明まで始めた…。
MESSAGE.EN: She finally began explaining her joke...
MESSAGE.Translation: She finally began explaining her joke...

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「全く面白くありません」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝That's not funny at all.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝That's not funny at all.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「なにーっ!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Whaat!!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Whaat!!❞

MESSAGE.JP: ツッコミが来た。
MESSAGE.EN: Haruka-san was slashed with a harsh riposte.
MESSAGE.Translation: Haruka-san was slashed with a harsh riposte.

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「前振りがまず最悪です。ネタも使い古されたネタです。しかもヒネリもなにもありません」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝You had the worst possible lead-up. And the joke itself is worn out. It wasn't even adapted in the least.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝You had the worst possible lead-up. And the joke itself is worn out. It wasn't even adapted in the least.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「う、うえええっ!?」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝U, ueeee!?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝U, ueeee!?❞

MESSAGE.JP: …容赦ないツッコミだった。
MESSAGE.EN: ...Nishizono-san had no mercy.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...Nishizono-san had no mercy.

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「…残念ながら、才能が感じられません。１００点満点中なら５点です」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝...I'm afraid you have no talent. I give you a rating of 5 out of 100.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝...I'm afraid you have no talent. I give you a rating of 5 out of 100.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「な、なんだってぇーっ!?」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Wha, what!?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Wha, what!?❞

MESSAGE.JP: ずがーん、という書き文字が葉留佳さんの頭上に浮かんだようだった。
MESSAGE.EN: You could almost see Nishizono-san's words float above Haruka-san's head and literally strike her down.
MESSAGE.Translation: You could almost see Nishizono-san's words float above Haruka-san's head and literally strike her down.

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「あ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝Ah.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝Ah.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「あかんやーん、ずゅべしっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝That's no good! *Smack*.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝That's no good! *Smack*.❞

MESSAGE.JP: …申し訳程度に打ち合わせ通りに実行された。
MESSAGE.EN: ...As an afterthought, she did as agreed upon.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...As an afterthought, she did as agreed upon.

MESSAGE.JP: そんな状況でも恭介はまったく動じることもない…。
MESSAGE.EN: Kyousuke didn't really react to the whole event...
MESSAGE.Translation: Kyousuke didn't really react to the whole event...

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「…邪魔をしました」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝...Sorry to bother you.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝...Sorry to bother you.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 硬直したままの葉留佳さんの手を引いて、西園さんが戻ってきた。
MESSAGE.EN: Dragging along the stiffened Haruka-san, she returned to the corridor.
MESSAGE.Translation: Dragging along the stiffened Haruka-san, she returned to the corridor.

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「つっこんでみましたが…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝I tried doing it as she told me...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝I tried doing it as she told me...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「いやまあ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Yeah, well...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Yeah, well...❞

MESSAGE.JP: ある意味面白くはあるけど…。
MESSAGE.EN: That was pretty funny in some ways...
MESSAGE.Translation: That was pretty funny in some ways...

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「しかし、生半可な事じゃ興味を引く事すら出来ないな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝I think we require a more concrete plan to make him laugh.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝I think we require a more concrete plan to make him laugh.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 確かに、恭介は漫画から眼を離すこともなく、一冊読み終えて次の巻に取り掛かるところのようだった。
MESSAGE.EN: True enough, Kyousuke hadn't really even looked up from his manga. He had just finished a volume and was about to start another.
MESSAGE.Translation: True enough, Kyousuke hadn't really even looked up from his manga. He had just finished a volume and was about to start another.

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「全然気にしてないみたいです～」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Looks like he doesn't notice us at all～.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Looks like he doesn't notice us at all～.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「よぉーし、じゃあ次は私が行くよー」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝All right, I'll be next.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝All right, I'll be next.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「…大丈夫なのか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝...Are you going to be all right?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝...Are you going to be all right?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「うん、はるちゃんがヒントくれたからだいじょうぶだよっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Yes. Haru-chan gave me a hint, so I'll be okay.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Yes. Haru-chan gave me a hint, so I'll be okay.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「じゃあいってきますねー」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Here I go.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Here I go.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「がんばれ、こまりちゃん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Do your best, Komari-chan.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Do your best, Komari-chan.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「うん、りんちゃんありがと～」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Thank you, Rin-chan～.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Thank you, Rin-chan～.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 小毬さんが向かう。
MESSAGE.EN: Komari-san entered the room.
MESSAGE.Translation: Komari-san entered the room.

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「ヒントってなんだ…？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝What kind of hint did she get...?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝What kind of hint did she get...?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「さ、さあ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Not sure...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Not sure...❞

MESSAGE.JP: とりあえず、小毬さんの学習能力は折り紙付だ。
MESSAGE.EN: Anyway, her learning ability is certifiable.
MESSAGE.Translation: Anyway, her learning ability is certifiable.

MESSAGE.JP: もしかすると、さっきの葉留佳さんの失敗から何かものすごい事を学び取ったのかもしれない…。
MESSAGE.EN: Just maybe she's learned something helpful enough from Haruka-san's failure to get his attention...
MESSAGE.Translation: Just maybe she's learned something helpful enough from Haruka-san's failure to get his attention...

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「恭介さん恭介さんっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Kyousuke-san, Kyousuke-san.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Kyousuke-san, Kyousuke-san.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「んー？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Hmm?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Hmm?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 相変らずの生返事。
MESSAGE.EN: He made a half-hearted reply again.
MESSAGE.Translation: He made a half-hearted reply again.

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「お話がありますっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝We need to talk about your future.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝We need to talk about your future.❞

MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Eh...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Eh...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「いや、まさか…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝No...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝No...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「これは…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝This is going to be...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝This is going to be...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「ちょっとこの手をとってくださいなー」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Can you take my hand please?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Can you take my hand please?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「うわあああーーーっ!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Uwaaaaaaa!!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Uwaaaaaaa!!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 外したネタをかぶせてきたーっ!!
MESSAGE.EN: She's going to do the same gag!!
MESSAGE.Translation: She's going to do the same gag!!

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「おはなしっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝I let you go!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝I let you go!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「よかったな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Good for you.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Good for you.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「ふ、ふええっ!?」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Fu, fueeee!?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Fu, fueeee!?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 当然のように恭介の興味は０だ。
MESSAGE.EN: As we thought, Kyousuke showed zero interest.
MESSAGE.Translation: As we thought, Kyousuke showed zero interest.

MESSAGE.JP: …戻ってきた。
MESSAGE.EN: ...She's back.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...She's back.

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「う、うーん…自信あったんだけど～」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Hmmm... I had confidence in that one～.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Hmmm... I had confidence in that one～.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「いや、あれで自信持てる小毬さんがすごいよ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝How could you have confidence in that... Komari-san...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝How could you have confidence in that... Komari-san...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「オレでもわかるぜ…今のはありえねえ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Even I knew that wouldn't work...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Even I knew that wouldn't work...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「だ、だってはるちゃん面白かったよ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝B, but I thought it was funny when Haru-chan did it...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝B, but I thought it was funny when Haru-chan did it...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「それに、ちょっと仕草も変えてみたんだけど…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝And I even changed it a little...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝And I even changed it a little...❞

MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝.........❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝.........❞

MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝...Four points.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝...Four points.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「うあああああーーーんっ!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Uwaaaaaaaaaaaaah!!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Uwaaaaaaaaaaaaah!!❞

MESSAGE.JP: …ラーニングする事柄も選ばなければならない、と思った。
MESSAGE.EN: ...You need to choose wisely the things you learn, I thought to myself.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...You need to choose wisely the things you learn, I thought to myself.

MESSAGE.JP: …鈴が何かフォローしたそうだったが、ネタがあまりにもぐだぐだだったせいで、声を掛け難いようだ。
MESSAGE.EN: ...Although Rin seemed to want to try and cheer her up, she was clearly having a hard time thinking of anything positive to say about the gag.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...Although Rin seemed to want to try and cheer her up, she was clearly having a hard time thinking of anything positive to say about the gag.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「じゃ、ここで真打登場してもらいましょうかっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Okay, time to call up our best.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Okay, time to call up our best.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「姉御、ここはひとつおねがいしやすっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Anego, let us witness your technique.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Anego, let us witness your technique.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「…私か？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝...Me?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝...Me?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「ですヨ。恭介さんに勝てるのは姉御しかいませんっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝That's right. If you can't defeat Kyousuke-san, no one can!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝That's right. If you can't defeat Kyousuke-san, no one can!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「ふむ…棗兄に乗せられるのもあまり愉快ではないがな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Hmm... I'm not too happy about playing along with the Natsume brother...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Hmm... I'm not too happy about playing along with the Natsume brother...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「え？　恭介に？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Playing along with him?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Playing along with him?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「ちげえだろ。恭介を乗せようって話だろ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝That's wrong. WE are trying to make him play with us.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝That's wrong. WE are trying to make him play with us.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「そうだそうだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝That's right.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝That's right.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「まあいいさ。やってみよう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Well, anyway. Here I go then.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Well, anyway. Here I go then.❞

MESSAGE.JP: …来ヶ谷さんが向かっていった。
MESSAGE.EN: ...She entered the room.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...She entered the room.

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「恭介氏、ちょっといいか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Mr. Kyousuke, have a moment?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Mr. Kyousuke, have a moment?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「なんだ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝What?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝What?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「お便りがきている」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝A letter for you.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝A letter for you.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「『湾岸スキーヤーとしてビッグウェイブにシュプールを残した伝説を持つ恭介先輩に質問です。一体どんな道具を使ったんですか？』」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝❛A question to Kyousuke-senpai famous for skiing on a big wave on the coast and leaving his ski tracks on it. What sort of equipment did you use to do that?❜❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝❛A question to Kyousuke-senpai famous for skiing on a big wave on the coast and leaving his ski tracks on it. What sort of equipment did you use to do that?❜❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「まず、スキー板は発泡スチロールで作った。浮力があるからな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝First of all, I used Styrofoam for the skis, because it floats on water.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝First of all, I used Styrofoam for the skis, because it floats on water.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「ストックは風呂をかき混ぜる棒で代用だ。そしてアロハにグラサン、麦藁帽子という夏らしいスタイルでビッグウェイブに挑んだのさ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝For ski poles I used those sticks you stir hot water in the bathtub with. I wore a Hawaiian shirt, sunglasses and a straw hat and then aimed for a big wave.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝For ski poles I used those sticks you stir hot water in the bathtub with. I wore a Hawaiian shirt, sunglasses and a straw hat and then aimed for a big wave.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「まずはボーゲンからはじめた。慣れたころにはスラロームもこなし、最後には１００メートルジャンプまでこなして見せたぜ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝I first started in the Bogen style, and once I got accustomed to it I started slaloming. Then I finished it all with a 100 meter ski jump.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝I first started in the Bogen style, and once I got accustomed to it I started slaloming. Then I finished it all with a 100 meter ski jump.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「そんな俺をみて、ベテランサーファーのボブが唸ったさ。『Hummm...ナツメ・イズ・グレートスキーヤー！　マサニ・ナツノ・モウシゴデース。HEHEウマイコトイッタ～』とな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Bob, a veteran surfer who happened to see it, said ❛Hmm, Natsume is a great skier! He is truly a child of summer. Hehe, I said something great, didn't I?❜❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Bob, a veteran surfer who happened to see it, said ❛Hmm, Natsume is a great skier! He is truly a child of summer. Hehe, I said something great, didn't I?❜❞

MESSAGE.JP: …戻ってきた。
MESSAGE.EN: ...She came back to us.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...She came back to us.

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「満足した」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝A satisfactory conclusion.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝A satisfactory conclusion.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「いや、来ヶ谷さんだけ満足しても」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝No, you're the only one who was satisfied.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝No, you're the only one who was satisfied.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「しかし、相変らず無茶苦茶言うな、恭介…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝But, that sure was something incredible we just heard...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝But, that sure was something incredible we just heard...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「あいつはいつだってむちゃくちゃだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Yeah, he's always super duper crazy.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Yeah, he's always super duper crazy.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「いやもーくちゃくちゃだっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝No, he's duper duper crazy.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝No, he's duper duper crazy.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「おっと新語だ…流行るといいねぇ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Oh, you've made a new phrase... it'd be cool if it became popular...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Oh, you've made a new phrase... it'd be cool if it became popular...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「しかもあんだけ流ちょうに語っておきながら、漫画への集中はまったく切らしてなかったぜ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝But even though he was talking fluently, he didn't stop reading that manga even once...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝But even though he was talking fluently, he didn't stop reading that manga even once...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「じゃあ、残ったのは…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝So, the last person is...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝So, the last person is...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「はいっ、私なのですっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Yes! It's me!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Yes! It's me!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「じゃ、かえろっか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Okay, let's call it a night.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Okay, let's call it a night.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「ガーンっ!?　全く期待されてませんっ!?」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Gahhhn!? It's like everybody thinks I'm completely useless!?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Gahhhn!? It's like everybody thinks I'm completely useless!?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「だってクド公だしナァ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝I mean, it's Little Kud we're talking about.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝I mean, it's Little Kud we're talking about.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「うん、ちょっとクドには難しいと思うよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Yeah, I think it'd be a bit difficult for you, Kud.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Yeah, I think it'd be a bit difficult for you, Kud.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「心配には及びません。実は私にはおじい様から伝えられた、秘伝の笑っちゃう感じの必殺技があるのですっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Worry not. To tell the truth, I've acquired a secret skill from my grandpa that's guaranteed to make anybody laugh.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Worry not. To tell the truth, I've acquired a secret skill from my grandpa that's guaranteed to make anybody laugh.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「それを使えばどんな人でも抱腹絶倒・気伝招来なのですっ!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝It's a sure-fire way to produce side-splitting laughter, a Mythical Summoning!!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝It's a sure-fire way to produce side-splitting laughter, a Mythical Summoning!!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「おおっ、意味はよくわからんがなんかすごそうだっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Oh, I'm not sure what she's saying, but it sounds kinda awesome.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Oh, I'm not sure what she's saying, but it sounds kinda awesome.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「すべてはおまえに託されたっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝You are our last hope.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝You are our last hope.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「クーちゃんかっこいいよ～」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Kuu-chan, you're cool～.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Kuu-chan, you're cool～.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「はいっ、カッコよく決めてくるのですっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Yes! I'm going to make it coolly!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Yes! I'm going to make it coolly!❞

MESSAGE.JP: …向かっていった。
MESSAGE.EN: ...She entered the room.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...She entered the room.

MESSAGE.JP: …こそこそと恭介に向かっていく。
MESSAGE.EN: ...She snuck around to his back.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...She snuck around to his back.

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「今なのですっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝It's now!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝It's now!❞

MESSAGE.JP: ばっ。
MESSAGE.EN: Boo-ya!
MESSAGE.Translation: Boo-ya!

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介に襲い掛かる。
MESSAGE.EN: She flew at him.
MESSAGE.Translation: She flew at him.

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「こちょこちょこちょ～」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Coochy-coochy-coo～.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Coochy-coochy-coo～.❞

MESSAGE.JP: わきの下をくすぐり始めた。
MESSAGE.EN: She started tickling his armpits.
MESSAGE.Translation: She started tickling his armpits.

MESSAGE.JP: 無反応。
MESSAGE.EN: No reaction.
MESSAGE.Translation: No reaction.

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「わ、わふーっ、全然効かないのですっ!?」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Wa, wafu-! It's not working at all!?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Wa, wafu-! It's not working at all!?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 戻ってきた。
MESSAGE.EN: She came back to us.
MESSAGE.Translation: She came back to us.

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「大失敗でした～」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝A great failure～.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝A great failure～.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「あー、恭介はくすぐりには強いからね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Ah, Kyousuke's resistant to tickling.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Ah, Kyousuke's resistant to tickling.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「このガッカリダメダメワンコっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝You're a good-for-nothing poochie!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝You're a good-for-nothing poochie!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「わ、わふ～っ、ご、ごめんなさいーっ！　私だったら１なのせかんどもがまんできないのにーっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Wa, wafu～, I'm sorry-! If I were him, I wouldn't have been able to resist for even a nanosecond!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Wa, wafu～, I'm sorry-! If I were him, I wouldn't have been able to resist for even a nanosecond!❞

MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝So...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝So...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人が全員の顔を見回す。
MESSAGE.EN: He looked at each of us.
MESSAGE.Translation: He looked at each of us.

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「うおおっ…ぜ、全滅かよっ!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Uooo... We, we got wiped out!!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Uooo... We, we got wiped out!!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「まあ、そういうことになるな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Well, it appears that way.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Well, it appears that way.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「楽しかったか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Had fun?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Had fun?❞

MESSAGE.JP: …恭介が部屋から顔を出してきた。
MESSAGE.EN: ...Kyousuke came out of his room.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...Kyousuke came out of his room.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「あれ…どういうこと？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Huh... What's going on?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Huh... What's going on?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「え？　漫画に集中してたんじゃないんですか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Eh? You were just concentrating on manga, weren't you?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Eh? You were just concentrating on manga, weren't you?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「ああ、してたさ。もう半分は読み終えた」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Yes, I was. I already finished half of them.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Yes, I was. I already finished half of them.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「ついでにおまえらの暇つぶしもできて一石二鳥だったろ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝And I helped you kill time at the same time. It's killing two birds with one stone.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝And I helped you kill time at the same time. It's killing two birds with one stone.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「えーっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Ehhh!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Ehhh!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「ふええっ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Fuehh?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Fuehh?❞

MESSAGE.JP: つまり…。
MESSAGE.EN: In other words...
MESSAGE.Translation: In other words...

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「また恭介に乗せられた？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Kyousuke was leading us by the nose again?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Kyousuke was leading us by the nose again?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「なんだとぅ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝Whaat?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝Whaat?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「まあ、そんな感じだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Well, something like that.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Well, something like that.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「ん？　どーいうかんじだ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Hm? Something like what?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Hm? Something like what?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴はさっぱり状況を理解していない。
MESSAGE.EN: Rin had trouble grasping the turn of events.
MESSAGE.Translation: Rin had trouble grasping the turn of events.

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「ところで恭介氏がそこまで読みたがっていた漫画というのは気になるな。今度読ませてくれ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝By the way, I became interested in those manga you were dying to read so badly, Mr. Kyousuke. Mind if I check them out?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝By the way, I became interested in those manga you were dying to read so badly, Mr. Kyousuke. Mind if I check them out?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「ああ、読み終わったら全巻貸してやるよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Sure. I'll lend them all to you after I'm finished.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Sure. I'll lend them all to you after I'm finished.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 余裕しゃくしゃくに答える。
MESSAGE.EN: He spoke calmly.
MESSAGE.Translation: He spoke calmly.

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「…確かに、もういい時間ですね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝...Yes. I think it's time.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝...Yes. I think it's time.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「帰りましょうか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝We should go back.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝We should go back.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「ああ。俺も続きを読むからな。今日はこれで解散だ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Yeah. I'm going to keep on reading. Let's call it a night here.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Yeah. I'm going to keep on reading. Let's call it a night here.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「ちくしょう…こいつには一生かかっても勝てない気がするぜ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Goddammit... I don't think I'll ever get a victory against him...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Goddammit... I don't think I'll ever get a victory against him...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「まあ、バカのし合いならいつでも相手になってやるぜ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Well, if you want to fool around, I'm always ready to play along.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Well, if you want to fool around, I'm always ready to play along.❞

MESSAGE.JP: くっくっく、と笑う恭介が印象的だった。
MESSAGE.EN: Even the way he laughed sounded impressive to me.
MESSAGE.Translation: Even the way he laughed sounded impressive to me.

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「嫌だ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝No.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝No.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「仕方ない。いいだろう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝All right, guess it can't be helped.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝All right, guess it can't be helped.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「なんて言うとでも思ったか、ばーか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝Did you really think I would say that, dummy?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝Did you really think I would say that, dummy?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「嫌だ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝No.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝No.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「嫌だ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝No.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝No.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「おめでとう。百回嫌だ記念だ。これをやろう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝Congratulations. You made me say ❛no❜ one hundred times. This is for you.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝Congratulations. You made me say ❛no❜ one hundred times. This is for you.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「嫌だ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝No.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝No.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 押し問答はこのぐらいにしておいて、いい加減みんなを呼ぶとしよう…。
MESSAGE.EN: Well, that's enough arguing about this, I'd better call the other members.
MESSAGE.Translation: Well, that's enough arguing about this, I'd better call the other members.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「で、みんなを呼ぼうと思うんだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I think we should call everyone here.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I think we should call everyone here.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「くだらない…先に帰るぞ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝This is worthless... I'll go back to my room.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝This is worthless... I'll go back to my room.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾が立ち去る。
MESSAGE.EN: Kengo left.
MESSAGE.Translation: Kengo left.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「今日はどうしようもないね。僕らも戻ろう。課題もあるしね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝There's nothing more we can do today. Let's go back too. We've got homework to do.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝There's nothing more we can do today. Let's go back too. We've got homework to do.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「そうだな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝That's true.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝That's true.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「ちっ、面白くねぇ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Tsk, that's no fun.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Tsk, that's no fun.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 僕らも部屋に戻ることに。
MESSAGE.EN: We each went back to our rooms.
MESSAGE.Translation: We each went back to our rooms.

MESSAGE.JP: ふう、今日も一日が終わった…。
MESSAGE.EN: Phew, today is over...
MESSAGE.Translation: Phew, today is over...

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「おっとやべえ、忘れもんだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Oh crap, I forgot something.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Oh crap, I forgot something.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「ちょっと行ってくるぜ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝I'm going out for a bit.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝I'm going out for a bit.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「え？　どこで何を？　…って、もう行っちゃった…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Eh? You forgot what where? ...And he's already gone.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Eh? You forgot what where? ...And he's already gone.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 遅いなぁ…。
MESSAGE.EN: It sure is late...
MESSAGE.Translation: It sure is late...

MESSAGE.JP: はっと気づく。
MESSAGE.EN: I suddenly realized something.
MESSAGE.Translation: I suddenly realized something.

MESSAGE.JP: もしかして、忘れ物って、教室じゃ…!!
MESSAGE.EN: Maybe the thing he forgot was in the classroom!!
MESSAGE.Translation: Maybe the thing he forgot was in the classroom!!

MESSAGE.JP: ってことは、あの危険地帯に真人が…!!
MESSAGE.EN: That means Masato is in a dangerous area!!
MESSAGE.Translation: That means Masato is in a dangerous area!!

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「しまったぁっ、なんて迂闊だったんだ僕は…!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Dammit, I was careless!!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Dammit, I was careless!!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 急いで救出に向かおう…!!
MESSAGE.EN: I have to go save him!!
MESSAGE.Translation: I have to go save him!!

MESSAGE.JP: でも、一体僕に何が出来る!?
MESSAGE.EN: But what the hell can I do by myself!?
MESSAGE.Translation: But what the hell can I do by myself!?

MESSAGE.JP: 助けに行って、何も出来ずに僕はやられてしまうかもしれない…。
MESSAGE.EN: If I run off to help him and can't do anything, I might get killed too...
MESSAGE.Translation: If I run off to help him and can't do anything, I might get killed too...

MESSAGE.JP: いや、何を考えてるんだ。
MESSAGE.EN: No, I have to think of something.
MESSAGE.Translation: No, I have to think of something.

MESSAGE.JP: …真人は友達だ。
MESSAGE.EN: ...Masato is my friend.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...Masato is my friend.

MESSAGE.JP: それを見殺しになんて出来るはずがない。
MESSAGE.EN: I can't just stand by and let him get killed.
MESSAGE.Translation: I can't just stand by and let him get killed.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「行くしかない…!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I have to go!!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I have to go!!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 僕は立ち上がる。
MESSAGE.EN: I stood up.
MESSAGE.Translation: I stood up.

MESSAGE.JP: 焼け石に水だろうけど、出来る限りの装備を持っていこう。
MESSAGE.EN: It might be like spitting on a fire, but I'll take what equipment I can.
MESSAGE.Translation: It might be like spitting on a fire, but I'll take what equipment I can.

MESSAGE.JP: …それも手早くだ。真人が危険にさらされている。
MESSAGE.EN: ...And I need to be quick. Masato is in danger.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...And I need to be quick. Masato is in danger.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「この中華なべ、鎧になるな…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝This pot could be armor....❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝This pot could be armor....❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「包丁を武器にしよう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I'll use this kitchen knife as a weapon.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I'll use this kitchen knife as a weapon.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 準備が整った。
MESSAGE.EN: I was prepared.
MESSAGE.Translation: I was prepared.

MESSAGE.JP: 歩くたびにがらんがらんと鍋が音を立てる。
MESSAGE.EN: The pot made a clanking noise every time I took a step.
MESSAGE.Translation: The pot made a clanking noise every time I took a step.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「よし、今すぐ行くよ…待ってて、真人!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Alright, I'm going... wait for me Masato!!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Alright, I'm going... wait for me Masato!!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「ただいまー」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝I'm back.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝I'm back.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「なにやってんだ、理樹」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝What are you doing, Riki?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝What are you doing, Riki?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「え、いや…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Uh, well...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Uh, well...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「真人、夜の校舎に行ってたんじゃ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝You went to the school building at night...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝You went to the school building at night...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「ああ。愛用のハンドグリップを忘れてな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Oh, I forgot my favorite hand grippers.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Oh, I forgot my favorite hand grippers.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「…無事だったの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...You're okay?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...You're okay?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「あ、ああ…見てのとおりだが」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Y-yeah... as you can see.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Y-yeah... as you can see.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「こんな武装必要ない？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I didn't need this weapon and armor?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I didn't need this weapon and armor?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「いや…多分がらんがらん音がして近所迷惑なんじゃねえか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝No... wouldn't your clanking around cause trouble for the neighbors?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝No... wouldn't your clanking around cause trouble for the neighbors?❞

MESSAGE.JP: いや、いいじゃないか…真人が無事だったんだから。
MESSAGE.EN: Well, it's fine... Masato is safe.
MESSAGE.Translation: Well, it's fine... Masato is safe.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「でもでもっ、夜の校舎は今、すごくきけ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝But, but, the school building at night is super dangerous....❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝But, but, the school building at night is super dangerous....❞

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「ふう、忘れ物をして夜の校舎まで行ってきてしまったぞ。いやー、まいったまいった」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝Phew, I forgot something and went to the school building at night. Man, I'm beat.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝Phew, I forgot something and went to the school building at night. Man, I'm beat.❞

MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Eh!!!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Eh!!!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「なんだ理樹…そんなにがらんがらんさせて」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝What's going on, Riki... you're clanking a lot.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝What's going on, Riki... you're clanking a lot.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「謙吾も夜の校舎、無事だったの!?」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝You went to the school building at night too and were okay?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝You went to the school building at night too and were okay?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「無事も何も、教室まで行って帰ってきただけだが」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝Of course I'm okay. I just went to the classroom and back.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝Of course I'm okay. I just went to the classroom and back.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「そうそう、帰ってくるときに鈴も見かけたな。猫を連れてたいそう怖がっていたが」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝Oh yeah, On the way back I saw Rin. She had cats with her and looked scared.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝Oh yeah, On the way back I saw Rin. She had cats with her and looked scared.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「えええーっ!?　まずいよっ!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Eeee!? That's not good!!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Eeee!? That's not good!!❞

MESSAGE.JP: すぐに携帯で連絡しなきゃ!!
MESSAGE.EN: I need to call her right away!!
MESSAGE.Translation: I need to call her right away!!

MESSAGE.JP: 出た。
MESSAGE.EN: She picked up.
MESSAGE.Translation: She picked up.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「あっ、鈴！　校舎って行ったの!?　今どこ!?　大丈夫!?」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Ah, Rin! Did you go to the school building!? Where are you!? Are you okay!?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Ah, Rin! Did you go to the school building!? Where are you!? Are you okay!?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@『なんだ？　行ってきたし今は寮の部屋で大丈夫だぞ』
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@[What's with you? I went and I'm safe and sound in my room now.]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@[What's with you? I went and I'm safe and sound in my room now.]

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@『ところでなにが一体こんなにがらんがらんしてるんだ？』
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@[By the way, what the heck is that clanking sound?]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@[By the way, what the heck is that clanking sound?]

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「うん…鈴が無事ならそれでいいんだ。ありがとう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Right... if you're okay, that's good enough. Thank you.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Right... if you're okay, that's good enough. Thank you.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 切る。
MESSAGE.EN: I hung up.
MESSAGE.Translation: I hung up.

MESSAGE.JP: さらにメールに着信が。
MESSAGE.EN: I soon got a text.
MESSAGE.Translation: I soon got a text.

MESSAGE.JP: 小毬さんからだ。
MESSAGE.EN: It was from Komari-san.
MESSAGE.Translation: It was from Komari-san.

MESSAGE.JP: 『わすれ物してこうしゃにはいってきちゃったよー。すごくこわかったけどだいじょうぶだったよー（＾▽＾）』
MESSAGE.EN: [I went to the school building to get something I forgot. It was really scary, but I'm okay. （＾▽＾）]
MESSAGE.Translation: [I went to the school building to get something I forgot. It was really scary, but I'm okay. （＾▽＾）]

MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Seriously!!??❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Seriously!!??❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「なんだ理樹、いつになく真に迫った激しいツッコミじゃねえか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝What's going on, Riki? You're taking the role of the straight man unusually seriously.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝What's going on, Riki? You're taking the role of the straight man unusually seriously.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「うん…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Yeah...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Yeah...❞

MESSAGE.JP: どういうことだ…？
MESSAGE.EN: What does this mean..?
MESSAGE.Translation: What does this mean..?

MESSAGE.JP: 四人が四人、校舎に行って無事だったってことは…。
MESSAGE.EN: Four people went to the school building separately and returned safely...
MESSAGE.Translation: Four people went to the school building separately and returned safely...

MESSAGE.JP: しかも、その中にちょっとドジな小毬さんまで含まれているということは…。
MESSAGE.EN: Furthermore, the ditzy Komari-san was one of them...
MESSAGE.Translation: Furthermore, the ditzy Komari-san was one of them...

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ひょっとして夜の校舎って、もう安全だったのか…？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Could it be that the school building is safe at night now...?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Could it be that the school building is safe at night now...?❞

MESSAGE.JP: あの恐怖地帯だった場所が…。
MESSAGE.EN: That place that was so terrifying...
MESSAGE.Translation: That place that was so terrifying...

MESSAGE.JP: とりあえず、鍋を外そう…。
MESSAGE.EN: For now let me take off the pot...
MESSAGE.Translation: For now let me take off the pot...

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@（そうか、きっともう危険な期間は過ぎたんだな…）
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@(Oh yeah, the danger has definitely already passed...)
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@(Oh yeah, the danger has definitely already passed...)

MESSAGE.JP: あれ…。
MESSAGE.EN: Huh...
MESSAGE.Translation: Huh...

MESSAGE.JP: 安全だって思ったら、なんか夜の校舎がすごく魅力的な場所に思えてきたぞ…。
MESSAGE.EN: If it's safe, then the school building at night could be a really charming place...
MESSAGE.Translation: If it's safe, then the school building at night could be a really charming place...

MESSAGE.JP: いや、ひょっとしてすごく楽しい場所なんじゃないか？
MESSAGE.EN: No, couldn't it be a really fun place?
MESSAGE.Translation: No, couldn't it be a really fun place?

MESSAGE.JP: 行ってみたい…。
MESSAGE.EN: I'm gonna check it out...
MESSAGE.Translation: I'm gonna check it out...

MESSAGE.JP: ていうか、夜の校舎ってドキドキする！　絶対面白い!!
MESSAGE.EN: I mean, the school building at night will make my heart race! It'll definitely be interesting!!
MESSAGE.Translation: I mean, the school building at night will make my heart race! It'll definitely be interesting!!

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「ん、どうしたんだ理樹？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝Hm, what's wrong Riki?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝Hm, what's wrong Riki?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ちょっと僕も忘れてきた何かを取りに行ってくるよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I'm going to go get something that I forgot.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I'm going to go get something that I forgot.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「そうか、気をつけてな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝Oh, be careful.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝Oh, be careful.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「うんっ!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Yeah!!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Yeah!!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「なんだ？　異常に楽しそうだな…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝What? You seem to be enjoying yourself an awful lot...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝What? You seem to be enjoying yourself an awful lot...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「うわあっ、暗いや!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Uwaa, it's dark!!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Uwaa, it's dark!!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「でも何も起きない!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝But nothing is happening!!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝But nothing is happening!!❞

MESSAGE.JP: なんだかすごく楽しくなってきた!!
MESSAGE.EN: This is a lot of fun!!
MESSAGE.Translation: This is a lot of fun!!

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ひゃっほーーーーーっ!!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Yahoooooooo!!!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Yahoooooooo!!!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ふう、ただいま」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Phew, I'm back.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Phew, I'm back.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「おう、なんかすげえ晴れやかな顔だが、楽しかったか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Oh, you look really happy, did you have fun?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Oh, you look really happy, did you have fun?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「超楽しかった!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝It was so much fun!!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝It was so much fun!!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「そうか…なにか奇声のようなものも聞こえたが」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝Oh... did you hear anything like a strange voice?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝Oh... did you hear anything like a strange voice?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「え？　校舎中駆け回ってきたけど何もなかったよ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Huh? I ran around the building, but there wasn't anything.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Huh? I ran around the building, but there wasn't anything.❞

MESSAGE.JP: とにかく、これでもう危険なことは何もないんだろう…。
MESSAGE.EN: Anyway, now there's nothing dangerous anymore...
MESSAGE.Translation: Anyway, now there's nothing dangerous anymore...

MESSAGE.JP: 今までどおりの平穏な日常が帰ってきたようだ。
MESSAGE.EN: It seemed like our peaceful days had returned.
MESSAGE.Translation: It seemed like our peaceful days had returned.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ふう…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Phew...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Phew...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 布団に入り、一息つく。
MESSAGE.EN: I got into my futon and took a deep breath.
MESSAGE.Translation: I got into my futon and took a deep breath.

MESSAGE.JP: 目を閉じると真人のいびきが聞こえてきた。
MESSAGE.EN: When I closed my eyes I could hear Masato snoring.
MESSAGE.Translation: When I closed my eyes I could hear Masato snoring.

MESSAGE.JP: 僕もさっさと寝よう…。
MESSAGE.EN: I think I'm going to fall asleep soon too...
MESSAGE.Translation: I think I'm going to fall asleep soon too...

MESSAGE.JP: そうして今夜も更けていく…。
MESSAGE.EN: It was yet another rowdy day...
MESSAGE.Translation: It was yet another rowdy day...
